The game is awesome, except for the fact that to be truly.competetive they are asking for absurd amounts of money that in some countries even in Europe are equal to monthly salaries... And that just for the possibility to get same heroes as other "richer" players :(

Very pricy game with limited game play. You will spend a lot of money to advance. There is no other reasonable way to play. Too many moderators/players( they play for free) who steal/destroy resources causing you to spend even more money. The game is a money pit. Stay away.

Please fix the launch. I cant log in. i have reinstalled it multiple times. If it is a maintenance thing or update,shouldnt you at least talk about it in your facebook page or forum?If I lose my account because of this....

To compete even fairly with the others, it's either you SPEND TONS OF MONEY or play the game for a long time, patience is needed here (not even joking, grind hard, pray hard for rng).  While it's a P2W game, I assure you it is fun and addicting for just casual play. Lots of contents in the game to keep you playing.  Finally, DEAR DEVELOPERS kindly reduce the stamina consumption and the number of soul stones needed for raising stars. This helps us, casual players, a lot.

descriptionHTML:
War is coming – Will you be ready? Summon heroes to defend your kingdom and charge the enemy in this one-of-a-kind RTS adventure!
Magic Rush: Heroes is a revolutionary combination of skill-aiming controls, a thrilling, real-time PvP Ladder Tourney mode, exciting multiplayer World Map battles, simple yet addicting Tower Defense, and more! Experience the fun of multiple different genres all wrapped up in one extraordinary game.

Rush forth on an unforgettable adventure that you won’t forget!

Features

Summon Powerful Attacks With Skill-Aiming
- Manually choose targets or directions when casting skills. You call the shots!
- Summon attacks to stun, silence, knock airborne, heal and even interrupt enemy skills using precise controls
- Strategy and speed combine. Master them both, and victory is truly in your hands!

Hero Training Powers You Up to Defend the Kingdom
- Role play as diverse hero types, including dozens of unlockable heroes with hundreds of distinctive skills.
- Heroes can be combined in different ways and take the opposition by storm.
- Upgrade your defender with equipment enhancing, rune inlaying, and unique upgrades and abilities for every kind of weapon.
- RPGs and RTS combine to bring you the ultimate Equipment System.

PvP Games in the Ladder Tourney
- Charge to war in a global, cross-server PvP Arena with a turn-based ban/pick phase to level the playing field.
- Defend your victory by strategically banning your opponent’s heroes depending on your own battle plan.
- PvP combat offers awesome rewards for every season!

War Strategy and RTS Gameplay
- RTS combat challenges you to build your tower, upgrade your tech, and dispatch your armies to plunder resources from enemies.
- Defend the kingdom together! Create alliances with millions of players from around the world to thrive in this war-torn landscape.
- RTS battles let you conquer enemies to become the dominant alliance!

Hero Tower Defense Combines Your Favorite Strategy Genres
- An all-new “Hero Tower Defense” concept cleverly combines the heroes of the game with dozens of exquisitely designed Tower Defense stages.
- Drop tower emplacements and activate Hero abilities in real time during exciting battles that you won’t want to put down!
- Defend your based on one-of-a-kind map creations.

Constant Updates Offer
- New heroes
- In-game events
- Weekly updates based on your feedback and suggestions!
- Hard-working developers are constantly updating and improving the gaming experience with new gameplay!

Are you the defender this kingdom needs? Download Magic Rush: Heroes and join the RTS war today!

PLEASE NOTE! Magic Rush is free to download and play, however some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you do not want to use this feature, please set up password protection for purchases in the settings of your Google Play Store app. Also, under our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, you must be at least 13 years of age to play or download Magic Rush.

Have any questions or issues with the free tower defense RPG adventure game from Elex Tech?
Reach us at: magicrush.help@gmail.com
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/MagicRushOnline
Twitter: @MagicRushHeroes
Official Forum: http://f.elex.com/forums/35-Magic-Rush-Heroes

descriptionHTML:
From the makers of Candy Crush Saga, Bubble Witch Saga & Farm Heroes Saga comes Bubble Witch 2 Saga!

Stella and her cats need your help to fend off the dark spirits that are plaguing their land. Travel the realm bursting as many bubbles as you can in this exciting bubble shooting puzzle adventure. Win levels and free Witch Country piece by piece. Play this epic saga alone or with friends to see who can get the highest score!

Bubble Witch 2 Saga is completely free to play but some optional in-game items will require payment.

By downloading this game you are agreeing to our terms of service; http://about.king.com/consumer-terms/terms

Bubble Witch 2 Saga features:
• The next exciting instalment to the Bubble Witch franchise
• New and improved game modes
• Enchanting graphics that will leave you spellbound
• Hundreds of magical bubble shooting levels – more added every 2 weeks!
• Easily sync the game between devices when connected  to the Internet
• Leaderboards to watch your friends and competitors!
• Collect stars to unlock special items to help you on your quest
• Special boosters & bubbles to help you pass those tricky levels
• Free & easy to play, challenging to master!
• Available to play on iPhone and iPad devices

Visit https://care.king.com/ or contact us in game by going to Settings > Customer Care if you need help!

comments: Really enjoy playing this game so addictive. I currently play it on a samsung galaxy phone and I'm over 400 levels played. I am  going to be changing phones over to iphone and wondered if I could download game and carry on where I left off, or would I have to start all over again? Hope not.

I was a devoted player to Blast solitaire but this game has it beat. I love the challenge games as well as the journey to getting more gardens. Wish there were ways to get free wildcards? I hate paying that six grand for a help card. But I am addicted and I highly recommend it!

Love the game but I think the bonus levels to unlock gold crops should be heaps cheaper to play. Some of them are hard and you run out of money to keep trying them as they cost as much as a normal level to play.

It looks good and the gameplay is fun. Unfortunately that fun only lasts so long before the game devolves into micro transaction hell. Each round gets so expensive that I can only play one or two unless I were to buy coin packs. These guys should be ashamed.

Really fun game but costs too many credits to play and the extra five cards and wild are over priced considering the cost of credits per game round. Could be better if these issues get resolved I would edit my review to five stars all around.
It is a fun game. BUT, the levels cost so many coins that it's very slow. Unless you plan to pay real money or can win every level 1st try, expect to play maybe 1 game an hour.

comments: Love this little game! I wish we had five life's, Three just gets me started. But overall, it's a great game. Getting like Candy Crush the higher the level the more impossible it gets to finish. Please don't make it so hard to win. I keep having to use coins to buy lives. Can never build up enough to amount to anything. Also you can give cash on the scratch off card. PLEASE !!!

Very hard and not as fun as the other games but  because you cannot even solved one level in a 3 lives. My friends do not want to play when I showed them how it is being played. I've noticed that the first part of level 3 is more fun now than before. But still the 2nd and 3rd level is very hard. I admire those who completed the whole cities. They must be geniuses in algorithms in solving the 9 moves in one level. The most amazing part of this game are the graphics.  Awesome really awesome.  Very well done. Still playing this game but also still cannot convince my friends to get out of CC and other games. Will keep on trying though.

This game is set up to STEAL a certain number of lives before you can win a level. Some levels, like Venice, level 79 may never be won. I have bought extra lives twice, extra moves twice, I REFUSE to make anymore purchases. If this was a truly user friendly game, it would BANK any extra moves, lighting, and other bonuses you've earned but did not use. But no, it throws them out. STEALS what you have earned. BANK it for me, I earned it, I should get to keep it. I'm done with this game.

I am glad for the staff at big fish they did a wonderful job getting me back play after all my levels where lost.. They found them all and it made me happy that i can play where i was.. I can not play to often sometimes and had taken me a long time but look forward to every new city i get to open a new and all the challenges i get to participate in.  Thank you all for this game

Fantastic game!  I love the graphics and interesting bits of trivia shared every time a landmark is built.  I also like the extra daily challenges and the special events that open up every so often.  Gummy Drop is challenging but can be played without needing to make any in-app purchases.  One con: the game starts you with three lives (lives replenish after 20 minutes), but in order to permanently increase your lives to five, you must pay $10.

Surprisingly fun! I was setting the ads for this game everywhere but thought they were really unappealing. Work on your ads a little to emphasize the fun prizes for completing levels, the enjoyable hunt for tour letters in old levels, the history of the buildings you save! So many great things happening in this game.

comments: The game is amazing, addicting and a lot of fun just to collect and level up dragons. The events that are constantly coming on always make you feel like you have something to do. However when of the events are very unbalanced and, if you are against one of these people, not very fun. The heroic races are a great way to compete with other players to add a powerful dragon to your collection but some people take the fun out of it by spending 100's of gems to ensure that they come first. The ability to use gems during these races should be removed as it is highly unbalanced, or at least add another way of collecting the heroic dragons without having to compete with people who pay to win.

I love this game. Its very addicting and fun, but I find that there are barely any female dragons. This upsets me very much and I would like for this to change. The only females I see are the dragons with names like  motherly dragon, belle dragon, viktoria dragons, and sleeping beauty dragons. There are also descriptions like "add some girly pink to your collections with the gummy dragon"(which is also coincidently a girl). Then I see cool legendary dragons, but OH plot twist they're all boys. This is a very fun game no doubt on that, but please, stop with the sexism and make cool female dragons. Thank you.

Still Having Lot's of Fun! Cool to mix different dragons just to see what u get!  I just opened my 6th island, When I first started playing this game I think there were only 3 or 4 islands & maybe about 300 to 400 dragons. I'm having trouble keeping them long enough to get the next island!üòâüòÑüòÅ!!

Game would be great except for the fact that you can't do certain things without bugging people on Facebook for help. I just want to play the game. I can't level my dragons past 10 without building a special building which you build without gems or bugging people. No way to get gems other than extremely slowly by completing achievements which take days to complete and give 1-3 gems. Supposedly you can watch videos for gems but there is absolutely no place on the game that allows this. If your friends on Facebook don't play this game they can't help you and you are screwed if you truly want to enjoy the game. You can't win battles with level 10 dragons. You can't breed more than one dragon at a time without gems. You can't expand past 2 islands without gems. If you get the required gems to level your dragons past 10, then there is another super expensive building to level them past 15, and get, guess what, you need gems for that too. Other games allow in game friends which this one doesn't and that is frankly ridiculous as it's a "social" game. Other games allow other ways to obtain gems like watching videos or trying other games which this one doesn't. There isn't enough time to complete special events for special limited dragons unless you can get gems. Overall, the game would be fantastic if gems were easier to come by and you could make in game friends instead of having to rely on Facebook friends!

Just a few gripes. 1st of all I LOVE DRAGON CITY. Been playing for years. About your survey, I would never. You ask for too many permissions. Tree of life....when I get a Dragon here comes the same Dragon adding up for hatching. Like why? 815+ dragons are more than enough. Why do u keep adding, adding, adding. We could NEVER get all of them as it is. Why more? Love me some Dragon City like a said in the beginning.

THIS IS THE BEST GAME EVER!!! I totally recommend it to EVERYONE who loves addictive games and dragons. I find myself constantly playing this game all the time! I honestly feel like I can't say how much I LOVE this game with words. Again, this is the best game a player can have. Just one thing, I wish there were more ways to get gems instead of just buying 'cause I can't buy anything. So please make gems more easier to get. Also please make the islands worth less gems.üòä
description: Ready to take on the hottest role playing game out there and bend fire-breathing dragons to your will? Are you the one to claim the title of top Dragon Master in the world? Accept the challenge and prove your might!Build a Dragon City on floating Islands and fill it with farms, habitats, buildings‚Ä¶ and dragons! Collect and train your cute babies and evolve them into impressive beasts that will defend you in the PvP Arenas!Join forces with other Dragon Masters in Alliances, interact in the chat and obtain rewards from the Alliance Chest.Combine dragons of Fire, Nature, War, Legend and lots of other elements to hatch rare hybrids and expand your collection. You can also obtain dragons from exclusive events!FEATURES- Complete the Dragon Book! descriptionHTML:
Ready to take on the hottest role playing game out there and bend fire-breathing dragons to your will? Are you the one to claim the title of top Dragon Master in the world? Accept the challenge and prove your might!

Build a Dragon City on floating Islands and fill it with farms, habitats, buildings… and dragons! Collect and train your cute babies and evolve them into impressive beasts that will defend you in the PvP Arenas!

Join forces with other Dragon Masters in Alliances, interact in the chat and obtain rewards from the Alliance Chest.

Combine dragons of Fire, Nature, War, Legend and lots of other elements to hatch rare hybrids and expand your collection. You can also obtain dragons from exclusive events!

FEATURES

- Complete the Dragon Book! There are over 500 dragons to breed and collect.
- New dragons join the game every week through breeding events and special islands.
- Challenge yourself at the Dragon Quests and fight against other Masters in the PvP Arenas to collect exclusive dragons, claim Warrior’s Chests, and climb up the leaderboards!
- Summon dragons of the at the Tree Of Life and try their skills.
- Unlock advanced features like the Ancient World and the Guardian Dragons.
- Be social: Join Alliances to play with other masters, chat with them, and open Alliance Chests.
- Log in with Facebook to save your game and play on all your devices - That way you can take your baby dragons everywhere.

There are over 80 million Dragon Masters. What are you waiting for? Join the fun!

If you already love our dragons… Drop us a nice review :)

Dragon City is FREE to download and FREE to play. However, you can purchase in-app items with real money. If you wish to disable this feature, please turn off the in-app purchases in your phone or tablet’s Settings.

Follow us on Twitter: @DragonCityGame
Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/DragonCity
Subscribe to our Youtube channel: https://www.youtube.com/user/DragonCityChannel

Check out other cool games by the creators of Dragon City: Monster Legends and World Chef!

descriptionHTML:

descriptionHTML:
Tiered of far too same games, stories and experiences? Looking for something thrilling and unique? You’ve found it!

Welcome to The Island – place where there’s no time to be bored. Where two lost kids urgently need your help to survive. Where numerous hidden treasures are waiting for you to hunt for them. Where ancient Archipelagos pop up from nowhere to be explored. Where hundreds of quests, missions and puzzles makes you feel challenged every day. You’ll dig it.

But remember! – The Island has The Secret.

Island Experiment features:

♥ Help two lost kids survive on The Island
♥ Turn an abandoned beach into a flourishing farm
♥ Grow food, craft equipment, build a seaside city
♥ Explore the Island and its Heartland
♥ Hunt for hidden treasures
♥ Travel to ancient Archipelagos
♥ Reveal a mystery of a Pyramid
♥ Complete thrilling quests & challenging missions
♥ Gain unique rewards
♥ Collect lovable local pets
♥ Play with your friends and make new ones
And… have fun!

The game is free to play and addictive. Be careful!

https://islandexperiment.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

Update and start treasure hunting!

comments: the new fusion medals added make it so you can not fuse heros without spending money this game is officially broken theres no free way to advance anymore dont download. its very sad i like the idea behind the medals but whos going to grind with 0 progress for 8 months and still not get thier first 6 star .... its messed up

All in all a fun game which u dont have to pay for.. on lvl 104 now and still enjoying the game and actually progressing too.. thumbs up from me! Update: dropped down to 3* after update. Totally been made to p2w now by adding stupid fusion medals.. was a hrund before but now almost unplayable.. greed have ruined the game for me and will probably uninstall.. many others also when u go in chat room.. not good epic summoners, not good at all.. good game ruined again :(

Latest update with fusion medals ruined the game. Got stuck like many other players. Fusing was hard enough without them (ie collecting 4 same 4 star heroes plus 4 same 3 star, PLUS random 4 star heroes... Ridiculous) to get 5 star one, now you stuck waiting to lvl up your current ones to pass stage boss and MAYBE get fusion medals... Ruined very good game.

What the hell is the matter with you people??? Why make a slow game slower with something like fusion medals? I can't figure it out! It's annoying to the max! I saved up a bunch of heroes for fusion events and then you go and do that! And then not say how to gain more! I'd like to talk to who thought it was a good idea to do this!

What the hell are you people thinking,.  Fusion Medals are the most ridiculous thing to add to the game.   It was bad enough the game cost so much to play, but then you really screw us over good with Fusion medals.   Crooks,. You guys should be in jail. Class action law suit.  Horrible,.   Don't play this game, waste of your time and big money.

They absolutely ruined this game with the last 2 updates! Be prepared to spend a fortune to be competitive! They took away the best parts of the Game! Added another item you need to make heroes that are very difficult to get! Then they reduced the number of dark soul you get when disassembling heroes! I'm a paying customer, don't mind supporting development but not when you feel taken advantage of! Don't recommend this game! Very Very Greedy company! Planners should Be Fired!

comments: Really enjoy this game but its very hard to do well unless you pay real money to buy extras! There should be more benefits without paying for them and each comoleted challenge should provide more money and diamonds than it currently does! And it should be easier to move up levels- I've played for months now and still only at level 5! People will just get bored of playing

So this game Is fun and addicting BUT it favors those with money to spend. I understand that the creators of the app want money from it but at least make it fair for the players when it comes to voting on outfits and such l. The hair accessories in this game cost $10 which is 1 accessory for 3 -5 hairstyles. That's a rip off.

The app is really good. It's addictive. But, I really feel they should give out cash or diamonds more easily. If we could earn diamonds or cash for watching a video then it would be great. Cause it takes time for the looks to get voted and until then we cannot play and wait for the diamonds. It's kinda sad. Hope they'll look into this.

A very addicting, interesting game. The graphics are very real and there are hundreds of styles and brands to choose from. One problem is, it is very hard to budget your money. You get diamonds and tickets every day, which helps, but it is still hard to keep a good income. Otherwise, Covet Fashion is a great game, and I would definitely recommend it.

So the new GM for Covet has blatantly admitted that they are pandering to LCV/new players now. I have spent THOUSANDS on this game to get myself to hcv in 11mos and now I'm being screwed over for it? What kind of business favors new customers over established ones that spend the most money? These are the same players that have openly admitted to voting against us!

Love this game. Only thing I don't like is that when you buy something it only gives you one item. In the Design game it gives you several when you purchase an item. I find it hard to play this game bc I run out of money and diamonds too quick. If that aspect changed I would give it 5‚òÜ

comments: Nice game but the way they select the game players within the same "strenght" is unfair. Because they use infamy to measure your lv but at the same time you can get infamy even when you die in the first seconds of a match. In that way you are obligated to face strong enemies because your team is good enought to win the battle without you. In that case the game delievers a bad experience for the player.

Plz push an update to hide chat button during battles, while battle the screen should be much cleaner with minimum icons on screen or transparent eg weapon icon. Auto on off header which shows ship names icons etc to enjoy the game screen on mobile.  Ship score is added but how know the quality / grade /% over the other strong ships where do our ships stand on that point of the certain ship levels.   Sea texture and colour need to be more improved, i really love the water in the poke'go. The way it appers its great. Plz add weather effects lightings nights Strom snowy etc head lights to ships, Reload animations, ship colour paint jobs decals,

Could you fix the guild rivalry page. After battles when people go to check the quests etc. it does not pull up. Have to exit game and restart. Happens a lot and gets frustrating. Other than that it's a very good game
Good changes, but could you guys bring back the big ol' red BATTLE button? The new one doesn't quite evoke that same 'YAAAARRGH!' feeling of going into battle. Thanks:)

Bear with me here.  How about introducing a pulse that stuns? A yellow item, radius 5, 1 slot point and stun duration probably shorter than the Tesla stun in the respective training level.  OR!  have the fixers pulse gain the ability (training maybe) to stun enemies for like 1-2sec. Same duration as when a Tesla shield is forcefully taken down. (not so sure about the second one, but the first seems good)

I love this game and the fact that all the pictures of the game above aren't hyped up. They are the real game. The game is good and I love being able to select my weapons I'm still figuring the system out completely but it's great overall. The only thing I might ask for is a slightly better tutorial
description: Face off against real opponents and own the waves in real-time team battles ‚Äì it‚Äôs sink or win.A real-time multiplayer battle arena in your pocket. Choose a ship, slap some guns on it and take to the tides with your fleet of teammates to trounce live opponents in five-on-five contests of seafaring strategy and firepower.Mobile MOBAThe thrilling competition of a team battle arena right on your mobile device. Join a fleet of allies and take on competitors the world over in bite-sized battles among the rolling waves ‚Äì all while you wait for the bus. descriptionHTML:
Face off against real opponents and own the waves in real-time team battles – it’s sink or win.

A real-time multiplayer battle arena in your pocket. Choose a ship, slap some guns on it and take to the tides with your fleet of teammates to trounce live opponents in five-on-five contests of seafaring strategy and firepower.

Mobile MOBA
The thrilling competition of a team battle arena right on your mobile device. Join a fleet of allies and take on competitors the world over in bite-sized battles among the rolling waves – all while you wait for the bus.

Choose A Ship
Choose between different classes of ships, each with their own speciality – the Enforcer packs a powerful offensive punch, the Defender is a nearly indestructible floating tank, the Shooter can equip more weapons than you will ever need, the Speeder is… speedy, and the Fixer keeps your teammates floating. Level up your ships for more healing, defense, speed, and firepower!

Weapons, Armor, Items, Abilities
Cannons, torpedoes, grenades – Collect, fuse and modify items to almost infinite variations. Choose from an arsenal of destructive or defensive items to fit your fighting style. Whatever it takes to keep you and your team stay afloat.

Get Strategic
Attack your enemies with a full on offensive assault, or play defense and capture the point. With different classes of ships to choose – each with their own unique abilities, and a motherload of weapons, armor, items, and perks, there is plenty of room for a wide range of battle strategies.

Join a Guild
Team up with your friends in a guild and chat with your guildmates while you send your opponents to the depths. Guild leaderboards pit your crew against other bands of blast-happy captains. Who will rise to the top?

Terms of Use: http://www.rovio.com/eula

Privacy Policy: http://www.rovio.com/privacy

comments: This game is a lot of fun get to customize some great cars . A lot of my favorites and i was surprised to see some cool muscle cars . Very unique collection of cars. This is actually better than their console games. Well recent carbon and most wanted are amazing. The newest are hot garbage. This one is fun.reallywish there was free roam or a sand box room where you can admire and test drive  what you have grinded out so many hours to get. Only bad thing. Also the boxes are too expensive leaving having to grind way too much just for absolutely anything. By the time you get anything good this game servers will be empty.

Thank you for making this awesome game, I love it! I've not had this much fun playing a Need For Speed game in years.. Update 2.9.1 is fantastic. Although after updating, I'm having trouble connecting to the game servers... :/ Hope it gets sorted soon! nevertheless, I look forward to future updates. ;)

It's a great game, graphics are ok, smooth playing. But. There are some ideeas that may do something different. Think about a chat room, or a place where players can do some trades. Think about adding the possibility for players to get vip points for watching videos, or maybe one day..open world gameplay. And there could be a lot more features. Thumbs up if you agree.

The gameplay/races r so short. It takes less than a minute to finish it. And the police cars than u see in the gameplay don't even do anything they just keep going on on there own, sometimes getting to finish line before u. So basically this would be a perfect game for a three year old but incredibly boring for anyone over the age of 7

I just bought a golden crate for 100 golds, only to get a muscle ECU uncommon part. Disappointing,  no blue prints. Even in a free crate you get blue prints.  Frustrating the reward system is horrible. Am never going to buy any golden crate. Players should be given choices to buy golden crate but you get trusted upon with useless worthless part. Otherwise good game

The game is pretty good, being a free mobile game, it is not trying to hide it's PTW features, but you can do mostly everything without having to spend a penny. One suggestion I think needs to be put in place is a confirmation window when you go to skip a level, because I was doing the speedhunter event for the Mazda MX-5, and accidentally hit the skip race button and lost a lot of gold, maybe not letting me even get the upgraded car now.
description: Race for dominance in the first white-knuckle edition of Need for Speed made just for mobile ‚Äì from the developer that brought you Real Racing 3. Build your dream ride with an unbelievable range of cars and customizations. Launch yourself between chaos and control as you hit the loud pedal and roll into underground car culture. Win races, up your rep, then kick into more races, more customizations, and more cars. Make your choices and never look back. Tonight we ride!This app offers in app purchases. You may disable in app purchases using your device settings.CUSTOMIZE EXTREME RIDESPick up the real-world cars you‚Äôve always wanted, from the Subaru BRZ to the BMW M4, McLaren 650s, Porsche 911, and more. Then trick them out with the hottest customization system on mobile, from spots like the Mod Shop and the Black Market, giving you over 2.5 million custom combos to play with. Your rides are waiting ‚Äì take them to the stages or streets to go head-to-head versus the competition and prove yourself.  DRIVE FAST ‚Äì AND FEARLESS Steer onto the streets of Blackridge, driving reckless and juiced as sparks fly. Accelerate over jumps and around debris, into traffic, against walls, and through high-speed Nitro Zones. comments: I love playing this game. It is now my favorite phone game of all times. I have seen other reviews about waiting for energy takes too long. It does take a long time but to me that is part of it. It makes you slow down and enjoy simple fun. Too be honest all of us need to slow down and enjoy life around us. I play it on my breaks at work. The way you play this game allows for  short or long periods of play . Also it's quite fun seeing the little guy demolish tiles. It truly is an awesome game. I have recommended it to family and friends.

I deleted all of my games except for Diggy's Adventure. This is my favorite game. I am going to play this game until me and Diggy win, and then I'm going to play it again from scratch. Google should make a whole lot of games like this. They are way better than match 3 puzzle games. I love cats I wish they could make a kitty's Adventures game like Diggy's Adventure.

I've played this game for almost 2 years and have not once had a problem and have spent a lot of money. For some reason it's now crashing every few mins. I don't lose progress or anything but it's getting frustrating to have to keep restarting. I've even updated the app on my Android. Please help? It's my favorite app and I just want to dig!

I really like this game but... It has been glitching A LOT for me lately. While I am playing it will freeze my phone. If I walk away for just a few seconds it freezes. My favorite glitch is after I watch a video for energy and before I use it the game kicks me out. Upon my return the energy is gone and I can't get energy for 2 more hours. üòê

Very addictive game but you spend more time waiting for energy than playing. When you have unavoidable tiles of over 400 points it doesn't take long to lose all your stored energy. I thought games were for playing, not waiting around. It's play for 5 minutes wait for an hour. It's a shame because some of the puzzles are quite good.
Would be better of the android app version had the same features as the full site.  I've been wondering how i can get friends logged onto a laptop and saw so many different features
description: Search for hidden treasures, solve puzzles, fulfil godly quests and reveal the greatest mysteries of the past in Diggy‚Äôs Adventure. Diggy's Adventure Features:- #1 Rated Adventure Game- 1000+ Riddles & Puzzles to solve- 500+ Labyrinths to escape from- 100+ Funny characters to interact with- 5 Mythological locations with loads of forgotten treasures- Regular weekly updates full of fun events- 18 languages to play in- Dedicated team working tirelessly to tease your brain and challenge your skillsJoin the family of Diggy, Professor, Linda and Rusty on their journey to explore the world full of ancient civilizations and mysteries.No secret may remain hidden!Diggy's Adventure is a perfect game for all types of players. Get ready for a greatly written story full of plot twists while progressing through thousands of brain-teasers and beautiful locations as Egypt, Scandinavia, China or Atlantis. Enjoy the creative side of the game - craft items and match various ingredients to help you digging, build your camp or decorate it. Developing your camp is vital since each maze and riddle require energy to get through the blocks and advance into the other location or mine.Solve riddles & puzzles to gain rewardsGain rewards and experience points to improve rate of energy regeneration or maximum energy capacity by digging through the mines and fulfilling in-game quests assigned by Gods and other characters. Each special event brings you a big content update as well as a lot of tiny improvements to make the game even more challenging and entertaining.Note: A network connection is required to playNote: Diggy's Adventure is completely free to play, however some game items can also be purchased for real money.Do you have any suggestions or problems? We would love to hear from you!Contact us at support@pixelfederation.com!
descriptionHTML:
Search for hidden treasures, solve puzzles, fulfil godly quests and reveal the greatest mysteries of the past in Diggy’s Adventure.

Diggy's Adventure Features:
- #1 Rated Adventure Game
- 1000+ Riddles & Puzzles to solve
- 500+ Labyrinths to escape from
- 100+ Funny characters to interact with
- 5 Mythological locations with loads of forgotten treasures
- Regular weekly updates full of fun events
- 18 languages to play in
- Dedicated team working tirelessly to tease your brain and challenge your skills

Join the family of Diggy, Professor, Linda and Rusty on their journey to explore the world full of ancient civilizations and mysteries.

No secret may remain hidden!
Diggy's Adventure is a perfect game for all types of players. Get ready for a greatly written story full of plot twists while progressing through thousands of brain-teasers and beautiful locations as Egypt, Scandinavia, China or Atlantis.

Enjoy the creative side of the game - craft items and match various ingredients to help you digging, build your camp or decorate it. Developing your camp is vital since each maze and riddle require energy to get through the blocks and advance into the other location or mine.

Solve riddles & puzzles to gain rewards
Gain rewards and experience points to improve rate of energy regeneration or maximum energy capacity by digging through the mines and fulfilling in-game quests assigned by Gods and other characters. Each special event brings you a big content update as well as a lot of tiny improvements to make the game even more challenging and entertaining.

Note: A network connection is required to play
Note: Diggy's Adventure is completely free to play, however some game items can also be purchased for real money.

Do you have any suggestions or problems? We would love to hear from you!
Contact us at support@pixelfederation.com!

comments: Love it to pieces. The characters are loveable and the stories are fun. I got through three to four in a few days I can't put it down. The only downside is certain decisions cost gems. Major ones are fine and expected but to have to be a jerk to someone because you don't have enough kind of sucks a little. But it's not often and by no means a deal breaker.

Actually, I came here because I'm a fan of Jakayla Toney. I'm a reader from wattpad, and I'm checking out her story here as game. üòÇ Anyways, I finished one chapter and I'm enjoying so far. Gotta check out other book after I'm done. Looking forward to this app, though I don't really like the choices costing gems.But its okay, still like it. üòä

Every GOOD choice involved money.  Hard to find one interactive story game that doesn't involve money so much.  I don't mind paying for extra bonus scenes in the end but at least give us some GOOD selection WITHOUT charging!  Then maybe I'll rate it higher

I've really enjoyed reading All the Wrong reasons.  The author is very talented, a true story teller.  As I was reading I felt like part of the story I was so enveloped in the lives of the characters they were alive and real. I was sad when the story ended wanted to keep reading.  I was overjoyed when K. I. S. S.  came out by that very sane author who transported me to a whole new world yet again. I look forward to reading more from this amazingly talented storyteller!!

I'm frustrated by the fact that this is supposed to be a choose your own adventure game, but all the choices that make the most sense to me are stuck behind a paywall, requiring me to purchase those choices with a currency called diamonds. I get the story passes, and I would have been fine if that was the only barrier to read the story, but to require you to pay money for making what you feel are the right choices is just greedy.

The only reason I'm giving 3 stars is because the chapters update too late that you lose interest and sometimes forget what's happening in the story. If the chapters were to update on a regular basis then readers would feel the need to keep this app and will constantly play instead of playing the waiting game. However the content is good and most storylines get you hooked.
description: Choose your story with Chapters, the interactive story game that lets you choose your path in every story. Read through pages and pages of fun interactive stories that fit your mood, from romance to suspense!Choose your story from our top collection of romance, fantasy, sci-fi, young adult, comedy, and drama series! Chapters combines a unique style of choose your own story gameplay with fiction stories that you simply can't put down!YOU get to make the choices in each story. Decide on hard life choices such as falling in love, discovering secrets, or unravelling deep mysteries! Make your choices wisely; every ending is different!Chapters Features:- Choose your story! Dive in and start making choices that affect the overall outcome!- Adventures start with you choosing your name and style to reflect your personality.- All stories come with info directly from the author!- Celebrate Spring with our limited-time offers!  50% Off starting March 20th until March 30th!Our exclusive collection of choose your story games include:ROMANCE - ALL THE WRONG REASONS- Romance story unfolds when YOU have a one night stand with the city's most notorious playboy.- Drama unfolds after a one night stand suddenly explodes into many more nights of forbidden passion.- Make the choice between what‚Äôs more important ‚Äì letting go of your insanely jealous boyfriend or keeping the complicated love affair going?DRAMA - PRINCE WITH BENEFITS- Fantasy story mixed with comedy! Play as the hopeless romantic that never seems to catch a break.- Make bold choices and decide how your romantic story unfolds with your almost knight in shining armor.- Drama arises when you find out that he's the Prince of England. For real.SUSPENSE - KIDNAPPING THE PRINCESS- Choose your life as a supermodel by day and a kidnapper extraordinaire by night.- Make the choice to play as the hero or villain who kidnaps the only heir to a whole country.- Make choices to pull off the biggest kidnapping ever while keeping your feelings for the Princess in check.HOLLYWOOD STORY - STARSTRUCK- Try surviving high school after a world-renowned actress suddenly puts her career on hold and enrolls in YOUR high school- Hollywood life isn‚Äôt what it seems, and you realize there's more to this media darling than meets the eye.- Romance is in the air, but can YOU avoid your crazy ex long enough to figure out this mess? ROMANCE - BAD BOY BLUES- Your life choices led to you becoming a master at playing the piano and fleeing problems.- These choices lead you to Adriano, a brooding mob boss, who steals your heart and the rest of you.- Romance blossoms and you decide to jazz things up and stand your ground.- Have your life choices made you tough enough to rescue your handsome kidnapper and make the murderous rival family dance to your tune?"SUPERNATURAL ROMANCE - MR. DEVIL- When your boyfriend falls terminally ill, you make a deal to save him: spend the rest of your life together or surrender your soul to Hell.- Then you discover your boyfriend is cheating on you, so do you break up with him? The Devil comes to collect his prize...you.- Transported to Hell, you face difficult choices that determine whether you will survive fire and brimstone, fallen angels, and hot gossip.- And more importantly, can you find everlasting love, not in Heaven or on Earth, but with Mr. Devil himself?And more interactive story games with fun choices!Chapters: Interactive Stories will bring a unique and fun twist to choose your own story adventures. Whether you're an avid reader of drama, comedy, fantasy, sci-fi, young adult, romance, or even a gamer, you‚Äôll love making choices in this interactive story game!Please note that Chapters: Interactive Stories is an online game that requires an internet connection to play.Follow us on: facebook.com/ChaptersInteractiveStories
descriptionHTML:
Choose your story with Chapters, the interactive story game that lets you choose your path in every story. Read through pages and pages of fun interactive stories that fit your mood, from romance to suspense!

Choose your story from our top collection of romance, fantasy, sci-fi, young adult, comedy, and drama series! Chapters combines a unique style of choose your own story gameplay with fiction stories that you simply can't put down!

YOU get to make the choices in each story. Decide on hard life choices such as falling in love, discovering secrets, or unravelling deep mysteries! Make your choices wisely; every ending is different!

Chapters Features:
- Choose your story! Dive in and start making choices that affect the overall outcome!
- Adventures start with you choosing your name and style to reflect your personality.
- All stories come with info directly from the author!
- Celebrate Spring with our limited-time offers! 50% Off starting March 20th until March 30th!

Our exclusive collection of choose your story games include:

ROMANCE - ALL THE WRONG REASONS
- Romance story unfolds when YOU have a one night stand with the city's most notorious playboy.
- Drama unfolds after a one night stand suddenly explodes into many more nights of forbidden passion.
- Make the choice between what’s more important – letting go of your insanely jealous boyfriend or keeping the complicated love affair going?

DRAMA - PRINCE WITH BENEFITS
- Fantasy story mixed with comedy! Play as the hopeless romantic that never seems to catch a break.
- Make bold choices and decide how your romantic story unfolds with your almost knight in shining armor.
- Drama arises when you find out that he's the Prince of England. For real.

SUSPENSE - KIDNAPPING THE PRINCESS
- Choose your life as a supermodel by day and a kidnapper extraordinaire by night.
- Make the choice to play as the hero or villain who kidnaps the only heir to a whole country.
- Make choices to pull off the biggest kidnapping ever while keeping your feelings for the Princess in check.

HOLLYWOOD STORY - STARSTRUCK
- Try surviving high school after a world-renowned actress suddenly puts her career on hold and enrolls in YOUR high school
- Hollywood life isn’t what it seems, and you realize there's more to this media darling than meets the eye.
- Romance is in the air, but can YOU avoid your crazy ex long enough to figure out this mess?

ROMANCE - BAD BOY BLUES
- Your life choices led to you becoming a master at playing the piano and fleeing problems.
- These choices lead you to Adriano, a brooding mob boss, who steals your heart and the rest of you.
- Romance blossoms and you decide to jazz things up and stand your ground.
- Have your life choices made you tough enough to rescue your handsome kidnapper and make the murderous rival family dance to your tune?"

SUPERNATURAL ROMANCE - MR. DEVIL
- When your boyfriend falls terminally ill, you make a deal to save him: spend the rest of your life together or surrender your soul to Hell.
- Then you discover your boyfriend is cheating on you, so do you break up with him? The Devil comes to collect his prize...you.
- Transported to Hell, you face difficult choices that determine whether you will survive fire and brimstone, fallen angels, and hot gossip.
- And more importantly, can you find everlasting love, not in Heaven or on Earth, but with Mr. Devil himself?

And more interactive story games with fun choices!

Chapters: Interactive Stories will bring a unique and fun twist to choose your own story adventures. Whether you're an avid reader of drama, comedy, fantasy, sci-fi, young adult, romance, or even a gamer, you’ll love making choices in this interactive story game!

Please note that Chapters: Interactive Stories is an online game that requires an internet connection to play.

Follow us on: facebook.com/ChaptersInteractiveStories

2051 JUNCTION AVENUE #212

KNIGHT IN SHINING SUIT: Chapters 11-13

description: Join players around the world in this epic RTS MMO game to reclaim an ancient kingdom on the Arabian Peninsula. You, my lord, are called by the people to take on the great challenge to become the next king in the hope of bringing peace and prosperity back to this land. With more eyes on the throne than you can possibly imagine, you must be strategic and make your claims to resources and troops fast, even if it means war. It‚Äôs time to demonstrate your leadership skills and diplomatic strengths to surpass your opponents in the quest for supreme power. Show them no mercy.Engage in Epic Battles Command the finest troops and fight your way to the top. Strike your enemies hard and leave them far behind. With a powerful army, equipped with the most advanced technologies, you will dominate the world in no time. Explore the Vast Arabian DesertThe desert is fun place, and a dangerous one, too. Go on monster hunts and explore the ancient relics if you fancy the wild. You will find plenty of resources among other useful items. The rewards are worth the efforts.More Resources More ProblemsThe world is watching. Your enemies will find ways to eat into your success. There will be times when allies are needed. Choose your Alliance members wisely, because they may be the determining factor for your conquest to the throne. The War of Throne is not a single man‚Äôs fight. Invite your friends to playThis is a game where you will make lots of new friends. But don‚Äôt forget to invite your old friends to join the fun too. They will share your visions and dream. With more friends by your side, you will be more than you can be. Support:If you have any feedback, please write to us at serviceros@www.onemt.comPrivacy Policy: http://www.onemt.com/policy.htmlTerms of Service: http://www.onemt.com/terms.html
descriptionHTML:
Join players around the world in this epic RTS MMO game to reclaim an ancient kingdom on the Arabian Peninsula. You, my lord, are called by the people to take on the great challenge to become the next king in the hope of bringing peace and prosperity back to this land. With more eyes on the throne than you can possibly imagine, you must be strategic and make your claims to resources and troops fast, even if it means war. It’s time to demonstrate your leadership skills and diplomatic strengths to surpass your opponents in the quest for supreme power. Show them no mercy.

Engage in Epic Battles
Command the finest troops and fight your way to the top. Strike your enemies hard and leave them far behind. With a powerful army, equipped with the most advanced technologies, you will dominate the world in no time.

Explore the Vast Arabian Desert
The desert is fun place, and a dangerous one, too. Go on monster hunts and explore the ancient relics if you fancy the wild. You will find plenty of resources among other useful items. The rewards are worth the efforts.

More Resources More Problems
The world is watching. Your enemies will find ways to eat into your success. There will be times when allies are needed. Choose your Alliance members wisely, because they may be the determining factor for your conquest to the throne. The War of Throne is not a single man’s fight.

Invite your friends to play
This is a game where you will make lots of new friends. But don’t forget to invite your old friends to join the fun too. They will share your visions and dream. With more friends by your side, you will be more than you can be.

comments: Appsilutely amazing. Awosome gameplay, and amazing detail and graphics. Its like I'm inside the movie itself experiencing everything. Keep up the good work, only 1 problem. It keeps downloading every time I log in each day. Can you plz fix this?

It was good at the beginning then I  got to a high level and it started kicking me out. I still have the same problem. I tried uninstalling and reinstalling it even went onto their Facebook page and explain but there was still no fix. I give this game 2 stars. No point in trying to advance if problem is not fixed.

It's a great game.  The problem I have is you get screwed out of your prizes from time to time.  And then when you contact support you have to wait for 2 days.  Then you get a message assuming you dont understand how the game works and a thanks for understanding.  So the poor customer support is what got this game it's 2 stars from me and the prize screws.

I have 1 level 20 T. Rex, 1 level 10 T. Rex, and a level 10 Pteradon and I STILL can't beat it. It's pissing me off. Do I need to have 3 fully maxed out T. Rexes in order to beat this stage? It's stupid.

Hey this game is good but whenever i start this game this game start downloading 500 mb or 400 mb.It takes very loong time to start game.Hey improve this.Now i clear cache and then it asked about 1000 mb why. Improve the game.why thi game is downloading all again and again.I also pre regester   New game and improve this.I have full internet but this game is saying that please check your connection.Iprove this.

Good game but... I played it on my tablet then it broke so I bought a phone insted and downloaded it again so I can play it but then when ever I tried play it I would finish the tutorial then it would crash imedetly afterüò©üò©üò© please fix Ludia I LOVE the game there's no better dinosaur game out there!!!üòçüòçüòçI would LOVE to play the game and become a subscriber to the game # number 1 fan!!!!!!!

descriptionHTML:
Return to Isla Nublar with the creators of the smash hit Jurassic Park™ Builder for your next adventure: Jurassic World™: The Game, the official mobile game based on this summer’s epic action-adventure. Bring to life more than 150 colossal dinosaurs from the new film and challenge your opponents in earth-shaking battles. Construct the theme park of tomorrow in this unrivaled build-and-battle dinosaur experience.

In order to build a winning Battle Arena team, you’ll need to design the most efficient and effective park, one that will allow your dinosaurs to thrive and evolve. Discover new and amazing species of dinosaurs by acquiring surprise-filled card packs. Join Owen, Claire and your favorite characters from the film as, daily, you feed and genetically enhance your dinosaurs. Now that the park is open, it’s time to make Jurassic World™ your own!

In Jurassic World™ The Game you will:

* Defy the laws of science as you COLLECT, HATCH & EVOLVE more than 150 unique dinosaurs!
* CONSTRUCT & UPGRADE iconic buildings & lush landscapes inspired by the film.
* CHALLENGE opponents from around the world in earth-shaking BATTLES!
* INTERACT with characters from the film as you navigate exciting new storylines & thrilling missions!
* ENHANCE your experience with Hasbro® Brawlasaurs™ toys – scan each toy dinosaur & battle with it directly in the game!
* CHOOSE from multiple card packs; each can bring a special dinosaur to life!
* EARN daily rewards such as coins, DNA & other essential resources.


Membership

* Jurassic World The Game offers a monthly subscription at USD $9.99, please note prices may vary depending on sales taxes or countries.
* The user will be asked to login to his Google account (if not already) prior to the purchase.
* The payment will be charged to Google Account at confirmation of purchase.
* Additional information will be provided afterward stating that subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period.
* We also mention there that subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase.
* The account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period.
* No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during active subscription period.
* Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication.

Privacy policy can be found at http://legal.ludia.net/mobile/privacy_black.php

Terms of service can be found at http://legal.ludia.net/mobile/terms_black.php


By installing this application you agree to the terms of the licensed agreements.

Like us on Facebook for fan giveaways, the latest news and updates! (facebook.com/jurassicworldthegame)

Jurassic World™ is a trademark and copyright of Universal Studios and Amblin Entertainment, Inc. Licensed by Universal Studios Licensing LLC. All rights reserved.

Please note: Jurassic World™: The Game is completely free to play but offers some game items for purchase with real money.

comments: One of the best game i've played, so many reward systems, good control and great graphics. Keep up the gpod work, hope to see more new hero. One last thing, the co-op mode has some bug where u created the room but unable to start the game even when u have enough player. Please fix that, thank you.

I think it's a good game. Suck that you have to pay money to go up against other people that already have SS Hero's. Just wanted to say y'all should make at least more S hero's that are FTP so y'all can get people to get back into the game I don't want this game to die off.

The game is really addictive. Hours of game play and activities. I really like it. However, since it's international the time for coop game should be more flexible so i can join with my friends at suitable time. Tournament matching is a little bit unbalanced, either it's a raid or it's a total defeat. And heroes skills should  give more details on stats, so we can plan effectively. Thank you for such a good game.

They are about to make it more of a money trap with an update that screws f2p and budgeted p2w. They say they have free events and events so part time p2w have fun. Then why are people talking about quitting? These are high paying players. I know you plan on making it so hero's bought for special skills like stun and silence won't work if there's a big gap. You've made it so hero's bought for the purpose of moving these budgeted p2w are useless. So it's in favor of real p2w. It should be a reverse. Make the lower people have a better chance not a worse one.

I found an issue, when I defeat the boss by bleed damage, the victory screen doesn't show up. It just stuck at the boss level with its dead body lying on the ground. I hope you fix this. Great game by the way.

Heroes Night Watch unique skill is not working. It stated any enemies that hit the magic barrier will be stopped immediately but when I use it in arena enemies pass the barrier like nothing. It had been a month and nobody seems bother about this.
description: TAP, SWIPE & SLING your heroes to send them smashing towards hordes of monsters, unleashing explosive power on impact and looting epic treasures!ALSO FEATURES‚Ä¢Simple Control, Super Fun:Issue orders, take aim and cast skills, all easily controlled by a finger swipe!‚Ä¢Turn-based combat and tactical thinking:Plan your moves, adjust formations and build up combos to overcome your enemies!‚Ä¢Strategic Team-building & Hero Collection: Each hero comes with a set of unique stats & skills that greatly affects how your plan & plan!Try out different setups to gain the upper hand!‚Ä¢Multiplayer Game Modes: Fun With Friends & Prove Your StrengthPlay Co-op levels with up to 3 buddies, share the extra loot & fun!Or battle head-to-head against other players in real-time PVP duels!Hyper Heroes is free to download and play, however, some in-game items can be purchased with real money.If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases in your device's settings.A network connection is required to play, and Wifi connection is recommended for multiplayer games.Like us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/hyperheroesOur service mailbox: hyperheroes@90kmile.com‚Ä¢ Device Permissions:[WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE]:  We need this permission to write and read users save files that stored locally on the device.[READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE]:  We need this permission to write and read users save files that stored locally on the device.
descriptionHTML:
TAP, SWIPE & SLING your heroes to send them smashing towards hordes of monsters, unleashing explosive power on impact and looting epic treasures!

ALSO FEATURES

•Simple Control, Super Fun:
Issue orders, take aim and cast skills, all easily controlled by a finger swipe!

•Turn-based combat and tactical thinking:
Plan your moves, adjust formations and build up combos to overcome your enemies!

•Strategic Team-building & Hero Collection:
Each hero comes with a set of unique stats & skills that greatly affects how your plan & plan!
Try out different setups to gain the upper hand!

•Multiplayer Game Modes: Fun With Friends & Prove Your Strength
Play Co-op levels with up to 3 buddies, share the extra loot & fun!
Or battle head-to-head against other players in real-time PVP duels!

Hyper Heroes is free to download and play, however, some in-game items can be purchased with real money.
If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases in your device's settings.

A network connection is required to play, and Wifi connection is recommended for multiplayer games.

Like us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/hyperheroes

Our service mailbox: hyperheroes@90kmile.com

• Device Permissions:
[WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE]: We need this permission to write and read users save files that stored locally on the device.
[READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE]: We need this permission to write and read users save files that stored locally on the device.

comments: Latest update ruined orc jobs. Played for almost half a year but now i can't find a reason to play this used to be good game.
Update killed any desire to play, invalidated previous progress and made event rewards harder to get. Completely p2w now
Progression is slow unless you are willing to throw away some money on this.
The new update has ruined the game. The VIP system is geared towards high roller people with money to throw away. The highest VIP ranking costs 18k in REAL money..That's insanity.
What a joke now roll back the update
Awesome game no issues.
description: Certain that it will help overthrow Sauron and raise himself as a force for good in his place, Celebrimbor has forged a new ring of power.  Alongside this ring of power, he has forged a series of minor rings that are bound to its fate and call to Champions across Middle-earth; wage the Shadow War and overthrow Sauron's armies.Continue Talion's journey through Mordor and wage real-time battles to turn Sauron's army against him with the Champions of Middle-earth and your own personal Orc army.COMMAND ICONIC MIDDLE-EARTH CHAMPIONS-Collect, equip, and upgrade iconic characters from Shadow of War and The Lord of the Rings such as Talion, Celebrimbor, Gimli, and Galadriel, all controlled by the new rings of power.FIGHT REAL-TIME BATTLES-Battle your way across hostile regions of Mordor.-Direct your team's combat tactics in real-time and launch powered-up special attacks when it matters most.AMASS AN ARMY OF ORCS AND NEMESES-Dominate your Orc nemeses or accumulate a trail of dead.  Each Orc you face remembers your decisions, creating a unique experience for every player with the award-winning Nemesis System.JOIN A FELLOWSHIP-Strategize with your friends and request/share upgrades to help your journey
descriptionHTML:
Certain that it will help overthrow Sauron and raise himself as a force for good in his place, Celebrimbor has forged a new ring of power. Alongside this ring of power, he has forged a series of minor rings that are bound to its fate and call to Champions across Middle-earth; wage the Shadow War and overthrow Sauron's armies.

Continue Talion's journey through Mordor and wage real-time battles to turn Sauron's army against him with the Champions of Middle-earth and your own personal Orc army.

COMMAND ICONIC MIDDLE-EARTH CHAMPIONS
-Collect, equip, and upgrade iconic characters from Shadow of War and The Lord of the Rings such as Talion, Celebrimbor, Gimli, and Galadriel, all controlled by the new rings of power.

FIGHT REAL-TIME BATTLES
-Battle your way across hostile regions of Mordor.
-Direct your team's combat tactics in real-time and launch powered-up special attacks when it matters most.

AMASS AN ARMY OF ORCS AND NEMESES
-Dominate your Orc nemeses or accumulate a trail of dead. Each Orc you face remembers your decisions, creating a unique experience for every player with the award-winning Nemesis System.

JOIN A FELLOWSHIP
-Strategize with your friends and request/share upgrades to help your journey

More information on our forums. https://community.wbgames.com

title: Middle-earth: Shadow of War

comments: Do not spend any money on this game. This used to be one of the best slot games until the developers got greedy. Payouts are small and events are nearly impossible. They try to make it all sound good but it's not. They also changed the customer service on here where it's hard to get anyone. You cannot message them on Facebook if you have a problem and if you say anything negative about the game you will be blocked. Hope this review saves some of you some time so you can find a better game!

What the hell kind of question is that?  "Is it beautiful".... meaning the game! HOW NOT PERTAINING TO ANY GAMES!  Anyway,  this game is hands down the best Slot game EVER!  Have played slots in and out of casino's for over 20 years and this is the one to play! A huge variety of Casino games,  easy to maneuver and a lot of really nice people.

I used to love this game but something they did changed it. Winning is nearly impossible even if you are a paying customer. I know it is a game of luck but when you purchase 85 silver tickets you should be able to complete puzzles when you only need 1 piece for each of them. Make winning a little easier and people will be happy to spend money.  I think the game is broken. I was just playing in a room on Billionaire with a person who was playing on Huge Casino. I know it's the same developer but I don't think that is supposed to happen. I know the person was playing Huge Casino because it was my husband playing it. May want to look into it.

Customer relations are horrible even non existent. If you spend money you will lose far more than you win, in their eyes you will spend even more. If you send a message they will hide behind a canned "industry standard" response. This is not a free standing casino there are no freebies and you can't collect any winnings. Yet they have their games dialed in so you lose in hopes you will spend money. Horrible company.

I just started this account in hopes of recovering my lost one. If it goes smoothly, I am happy with the app to date. The slots don't pay as much as they used to, a little tite , otherwise a fun app. The events they choose for you to play, daily, do steal a lot of chips. If u want to remain in a successful club, you must do them, is the main downfall. I would recommend it to my friends.

This is an interesting game. After I played it for awhile it became very boring. Haven't gotten a big or any good win for the past 70 million. I guess if you buy chips you might win more often. It doesn't give you all the bonuses, and it takes gifts and doesn't give them to the gamers you gave it to. So all in all it's just okay. I've never been able to get anywhere with their support team as they added to my reply. I'd give it a one star but if you buy chips it might be better.

comments: For a free game? I can't complain too much especially if i don't pay for it. The containers are actually a good addition to this game since you get containers for free. If you're lucky enough you can win a premium tank and those things are not cheap! But wargaming actually give them away for free. The event is impossible to finish if you don't pay with gold and to win a tank you must pay a huge amount of $$$. But for casual and f2p players? I think you'll enjoy it. It's a game guys, play for fun!

The game is good compared to the game i often play online. I could have rated this game all five stars. The controls for driving must have other options to choose from. And its not suitable for android phones that has 5 inches sreen display. My thumb keeps slipping off whenever i try to maneauver the  vehicle. On Pc's much more easier to handle using a keyboard and a mouse.

Hello. I love WOT and trying to play together witg my son. But we've chosen different servers (Europe & Russia) and now i cant find him in the players list to be able to join one platoon. I also cant connect to his server and he cant connect to mine cause system doesnt allow it. can you please suggest how we can join one platoon in this case? Thank you.

Best mobile game I've played, more fun than the PC world of tanks for sure. Only real complaint is that it takes up a lot of space on my phone... It's worth the investment in memory though. Make sure you're in a good wifi spot and have a portable battery and happy tanking

Not a bad game.  I'm a little sick of the unrealistic tanks.  Also the unrealistic play in some ways.  I wish there was a mode that limited you to real tanks of the same time period and had more realistic damage based on the weapons.  For example, I don't want to see the Dracula tank and the 88mm on my Tiger should blow a Sherman away in 1 shot at point blink range, not 6 shots...

Why is 6 of my team on one area while I am in the other. Because of this spawning system I died literally 5 seconds after the battle started. Great game though. Why is there so much lag. And why are my controls frozen. I move forward a  little and then I move 50 feet away from my spot. Fix this and then you get a big fat 5 stars.
description: Meet the legendary tank shooter. Join more than 90 million players! Fight in 7vs7 team battles alone or with friends, research and upgrade armored vehicles, try different tactics and win. Choose a tank and join the battle!GAME FEATURES‚Ä¢ A huge world of tanks. Witness historical vehicles and models from other popular universes face off on the battlefield. The game features more than 250 unique vehicles!‚Ä¢ Dynamic 7vs7 battles in different modes and in more than 20 game locations. Every battle is unpredictable: the outcome depends on you and your team.‚Ä¢ A well-developed progression system. Explore the full range of vehicles from Tier I light tanks to humongous Tier X heavies. Change guns, install equipment, apply camouflage‚Äîtune your vehicle to match your playstyle.‚Ä¢ Spectacular graphics that are automatically optimized for your device. Manual tuning helps find a balance between vibrant colors and high FPS.‚Ä¢ Team game. descriptionHTML:
Meet the legendary tank shooter. Join more than 90 million players! Fight in 7vs7 team battles alone or with friends, research and upgrade armored vehicles, try different tactics and win. Choose a tank and join the battle!

GAME FEATURES
• A huge world of tanks. Witness historical vehicles and models from other popular universes face off on the battlefield. The game features more than 250 unique vehicles!
• Dynamic 7vs7 battles in different modes and in more than 20 game locations. Every battle is unpredictable: the outcome depends on you and your team.
• A well-developed progression system. Explore the full range of vehicles from Tier I light tanks to humongous Tier X heavies. Change guns, install equipment, apply camouflage—tune your vehicle to match your playstyle.
• Spectacular graphics that are automatically optimized for your device. Manual tuning helps find a balance between vibrant colors and high FPS.
• Team game. Create platoons with your friends or join a clan to fight with like-minded people, then participate in tournaments with prizes!

To install the game, you need at least 3 GB of free space and an internet connection.


For more information please visit http://wotblitz.com/

comments: I'm not a fan of mobile gaming, but this game is truly something else. I love The Walking Dead, so I gave this a shot, however, after playing Road to Survival (or whatever it's called- it's the TWD game based off of the comics), my expectations were pretty low. This game though, is not Road to Survival; it's so much more. This is how you do a free to play game with microtransactions right. You can buy a lot in this game with money, but you can easily obtain everything on your own, and quite frankly, it's more fun to do that anyways. This game is super addicting and gives me something fun to do when I've got a few minutes. I've been playing it for months, and I don't plan on stopping anytime soon.

Just a suggestion, it'll be SO MUCH MORE AWESOME probably 10 stars for TWD fans if you could do better missions or events that allow us to get better opportunities to farm for TWD character tokens or class tokens, and also more chance for farming or creating weapons instead of the current set up now. Don't quite like the fact that when deals are awesome but they cost a ton! Try lessen the value a little bit and im sure some players dont mind spending (just my opinion). But overall review, its awesome for TWD fans out there!

It's got good action in graphic. Been playing for a 2 years in 10 month's now.Stay human and Survive.  Up dates all the time love it keep them coming Robert Cregman. Thanks for making the Walking  dead show And game. New stuff to do all the time. In wow all these new survivers. There are some loading issues action issues movement issues alot more mission.

Originally gave you 4 stars, but its one of only a couple of mobile games I have never deleted since installing. Constant content coming in, great use of TWD licence! Keep up the great work- seriously from someone who hates most mobile games!
I've been playing for over 2 years. A few more new maps would be nice and stop nerfing our great traits like interrupt and wrestler! Other than that, great game and great community.
Really good strategy game. The thing that lost it the 5th star is that when I started a second game on another device, it won't play ads for free stuff
description: Celebrate Spring with our limited-time offers!Play now with Daryl, Rick, Michonne and many other characters of AMC‚Äôs The Walking Dead! Collect Heroes through radio calls and unlock special abilities and valuable leader traits. Complete Episode 1 for free Daryl tokens and unlock the first Hero of your team!The Walking Dead: No Man‚Äôs Land is a thrilling, action-packed RPG where tactical choices make the difference between life and death. Only the strongest will survive so choose your team wisely: bring Michonne and dominate in close-quarter combat or send Rick to dispatch enemies from afar. Or perhaps you‚Äôll choose to snipe from a distance with Daryl‚Äôs crossbow, or mow the herd down with Abraham‚Äôs assault rifle. ‚Ä¢ FIGHT through hordes of deadly enemies in tactical turn-based combat‚Ä¢ COLLECT and upgrade your favorite characters from AMC‚Äôs The Walking Dead‚Ä¢ CHOOSE the right team and the equipment for each mission‚Ä¢ HUNT walkers in Terminus, The Prison and other familiar locations from AMC‚Äôs The Walking Dead ‚Ä¢ JOIN other players in deadly weekly challenges and PVP combat for exclusive rewards‚ÄúThrow in some pretty swish graphics, lovely animations and blood splatters, and you have one of the most carefully fleshed out zombie games we've seen on mobile. It looks lovely, and plays great too.‚Äù - Pocketgamer‚ÄúEach aspect of survival on AMC's The Walking Dead has been parallel to the series' official mobile game, subtitled No Man's Land.‚Äù - Mashable‚ÄúImagine your favorite mobile base-building strategy game, mix in a dash of XCOM, and then paint on a fresh coat of AMC‚Äôs The Walking Dead. That‚Äôs No Man‚Äôs Land in a nutshell.‚Äù - GamezeboFor more, please visit:http://www.facebook.com/thewalkingdeadnomanslandhttp://twitter.com/twdnomanslandhttp://www.thewalkingdeadnomansland.comhttp://www.youtube.com/nxtgmsFor player support, please visit:nextgames.helpshift.com
descriptionHTML:
Celebrate Spring with our limited-time offers!

Play now with Daryl, Rick, Michonne and many other characters of AMC’s The Walking Dead! Collect Heroes through radio calls and unlock special abilities and valuable leader traits. Complete Episode 1 for free Daryl tokens and unlock the first Hero of your team!

The Walking Dead: No Man’s Land is a thrilling, action-packed RPG where tactical choices make the difference between life and death. Only the strongest will survive so choose your team wisely: bring Michonne and dominate in close-quarter combat or send Rick to dispatch enemies from afar. Or perhaps you’ll choose to snipe from a distance with Daryl’s crossbow, or mow the herd down with Abraham’s assault rifle.

• FIGHT through hordes of deadly enemies in tactical turn-based combat
• COLLECT and upgrade your favorite characters from AMC’s The Walking Dead
• CHOOSE the right team and the equipment for each mission
• HUNT walkers in Terminus, The Prison and other familiar locations from AMC’s The Walking Dead
• JOIN other players in deadly weekly challenges and PVP combat for exclusive rewards

“Throw in some pretty swish graphics, lovely animations and blood splatters, and you have one of the most carefully fleshed out zombie games we've seen on mobile. It looks lovely, and plays great too.” - Pocketgamer

“Each aspect of survival on AMC's The Walking Dead has been parallel to the series' official mobile game, subtitled No Man's Land.” - Mashable

“Imagine your favorite mobile base-building strategy game, mix in a dash of XCOM, and then paint on a fresh coat of AMC’s The Walking Dead. That’s No Man’s Land in a nutshell.” - Gamezebo

For more, please visit:

http://www.facebook.com/thewalkingdeadnomansland
http://twitter.com/twdnomansland
http://www.thewalkingdeadnomansland.com
http://www.youtube.com/nxtgms
