comments: I've love playing this game since I began. The main issue I have is that when you buy a new device to play on, none of your progress is saved and you have to starts back at the very beginning. I had more than 80% of the venues open, over 1.2M coins,  and nearly 100 gems. I bought a new phone and nothing was saved. That sucks! Can someone respond, find a way to save your progress so if you switch devices to play on,  you won't lose what you've gained and maybe return my earnings!

The game is awesome, as for the loyal players like myself your game isn't fair with the diamonds on the casino spin üò¢ I play everyday at least 8hr or more and only receive 15 gems every two days or so. Please try to rectify the situation I have never received double or triple diamonds on a spin and I've been playing for a year or so. Why?????

UPDATE 4 the NEW BUILDINGS PLSSSsss? TY... Cant Wait. Hope its coming real real soon and REALLY hope theres MORE to come after. U HAVE A WINNER GAME HERE. i bought ALOT of games, & this one is on the top 5 list. Keep up the great work guys/gals. Awaiting the new buildings. lol.    :-)   TY

This game is good and addicting it just sucks with the fact you need to use gems from everything. I wish it was more things to use just money for. I have all this money and run through gems quick and it takes too long to obtain so I end up not playing for a while. A good way of doing this is through earnings that you collect from your restaurant. You can receive 1 gem

Game is very fun and addictive. But you shouldn't have to spend few hundred dollars to play through the game and play all of the restaurants. Yes you can earn gems for free but would take an insane amount of time with each restaurant requiring more and more for each upgrade as you go on.

There's no way to contact customer service for this game. I just bought the new restaurant with the noodles and duck and my sauce cooker doesn't work. I swipe it and swipe it and nothing. I'm doing it the way the tutorial showed but mine doesn't work. I might get lucky and it will come on but I'm losing all of my customers. I think they need to change it so we just have to tap it. I hoping they'll see this so they can work out the glitches for this new restaurant.
description: Cook delicious meals and desserts from all over the world in this FREE addictive time-management game! With a choice of 19 unique locations, from Desserts and Fast Food to an Oyster Bar and Oriental Restaurant, you will be able to practice your skills in a variety of settings and cooking techniques. Use more than a hundred ingredients to cook several hundred tasty dishes. Try all the possible kitchen appliances, from coffee makers and rice cookers to pizza ovens and popcorn makers. Decorate your restaurants to attract more clients. Make your own freebies, such as cookies or cupcakes, to make your customers‚Äô experience more personal and memorable ‚Äì just like in real life! Upgrade your kitchen and produce an even greater variety of dishes. Oh, and did we say that this game is as addictive and as engrossing as fever? Have fun cooking and don‚Äôt forget to share your delicious meals with your friends on Facebook!IMPORTANT NOTE:Cooking Fever now requires access to the internet in order to play. The game uses a small amount of data for features like our Cooking Fever daily rewards, restoring lost game progress, and other gameplay improvements. We hope that you have a great time running our latest restaurant! Features:* More than 400 dishes to cook using 150 ingredients* 19 unique locations* More than 400 levels to complete* Hundreds and hundreds of upgrades for your kitchen appliances and interiorCooking Fever asks permission to fully enable some functions:* Access location ‚Äì to provide region specific in-game offers* Access external storage ‚Äì to correctly save your progress
descriptionHTML:
Cook delicious meals and desserts from all over the world in this FREE addictive time-management game! With a choice of 19 unique locations, from Desserts and Fast Food to an Oyster Bar and Oriental Restaurant, you will be able to practice your skills in a variety of settings and cooking techniques. Use more than a hundred ingredients to cook several hundred tasty dishes. Try all the possible kitchen appliances, from coffee makers and rice cookers to pizza ovens and popcorn makers. Decorate your restaurants to attract more clients. Make your own freebies, such as cookies or cupcakes, to make your customers’ experience more personal and memorable – just like in real life! Upgrade your kitchen and produce an even greater variety of dishes. Oh, and did we say that this game is as addictive and as engrossing as fever? Have fun cooking and don’t forget to share your delicious meals with your friends on Facebook!

IMPORTANT NOTE:
Cooking Fever now requires access to the internet in order to play. The game uses a small amount of data for features like our Cooking Fever daily rewards, restoring lost game progress, and other gameplay improvements. We hope that you have a great time running our latest restaurant!

Features:
* More than 400 dishes to cook using 150 ingredients
* 19 unique locations
* More than 400 levels to complete
* Hundreds and hundreds of upgrades for your kitchen appliances and interior

Cooking Fever asks permission to fully enable some functions:
* Access location – to provide region specific in-game offers
* Access external storage – to correctly save your progress

description: THIS GAME IS LIFE-RUININGLY FUN!From the writers of The Simpsons, comes the city building game that lets you create your own living, breathing Springfield! When Homer accidently causes a meltdown that wipes out Springfield, it‚Äôs up to you to clean up his mess‚Ä¶ we mean, help him rebuild it!                                                                                                                                                                                           Collect Your Favorite Characters                                                                                                                  Help reunite Homer with his loved ones - Marge, Lisa, Maggie (and even sometimes Bart) ‚Äì as well as his not so loved ones, like Ned Flanders. Re-populate Springfield with your favorite characters, from Barflies (Barney Gumble) to Wise Guys (Fat Tony). Add them all, we won‚Äôt judge! Dress your characters to the nines with options like Daredevil Bart or Lizard Queen Lisa, and relive scenes from your favorite episodes of The Simpsons! descriptionHTML:
THIS GAME IS LIFE-RUININGLY FUN!
From the writers of The Simpsons, comes the city building game that lets you create your own living, breathing Springfield! When Homer accidently causes a meltdown that wipes out Springfield, it’s up to you to clean up his mess… we mean, help him rebuild it!
Collect Your Favorite Characters
Help reunite Homer with his loved ones - Marge, Lisa, Maggie (and even sometimes Bart) – as well as his not so loved ones, like Ned Flanders. Re-populate Springfield with your favorite characters, from Barflies (Barney Gumble) to Wise Guys (Fat Tony). Add them all, we won’t judge! Dress your characters to the nines with options like Daredevil Bart or Lizard Queen Lisa, and relive scenes from your favorite episodes of The Simpsons!
Take Charge of Your Springfield
Can’t control your own life? Now you can control the lives of the citizens of Springfield instead! Make Apu work ridiculously long shifts at the Kwik-E-Mart, have Moe smuggle illegal animals, or make Homer toil poolside all day… that last one might not be so bad.

Build Your Own Springfield
Think Homer deserves to live next door to Moe’s? Or the monorail can survive a few more sharp twists and turns? Or Krustyland needs 40% more cartoon violence and 40% fewer health inspectors? Well you can finally make Springfield just the way you want it! Expand your town to the Waterfront, grow its businesses with the glamourous shops of Springfield Heights, and enjoy its sights, all with only a few taps.

Experience Unique Simpsons Stories
Catch exclusive animated scenes and new hilarious stories from the writers of The Simpsons. You know they’re good because they write for The Simpsons! Tapped Out is the most life-ruiningly fun Simpsons game you can play!

Always Something New for Your Favorite Town
Springfield might perpetually be on the verge of destruction, buy hey, at least it’s never boring. Whether it’s Halloween monster invasions, superheroes run amok, or chaos caused by one of Homer’s “great” ideas, you’ve got never-ending options to tap!


**This game downloads additional content on first launch that can be up to 1.5GB based on device. We recommend connecting to WIFI the first time you play. This game is also supported with regularly occurring content updates that require additional downloads when released. Please be patient while it loads (we promise it’s worth the wait).**

comments: I really enjoy this game has been the only game that has kept my attention for more than a week. Working on week 3 now, most of the game is free but if you want to grow your port quickly than you will need to play into the game. The game really starts to slow down after level 50, I'm up in the high 60 levels now. I do really enjoy all the quests and they do add bonus quests from time to time to help build up your port.

A fun, easy-going game. No crazy-pace required and easy to advance.  The amount of unique ships is crazy, I think only fan of nautical history would really enjoy this aspect. The list of active ships should be available from your town, instead of only from map view. Other than that, it's quite enj9yable and not a complete time-sucker like many 9ther games. Well done.

I just started the game a couple of days ago, but I'm already hooked.  Like most games, you kind of learn as you move along, but a little more guiding would be very helpful. Thanks for making a fun game! I am having a problem getting past the loading screen though. I tried clearing cache, forced stop, delete files, even uninstalling and reinstalling again.

Easy to learn with loads of variables to keep it interesting. Graphics are stellar. As with most 'free' games, there are lots of incentives for you to get out your wallet; if you're as unwilling to do so as I am, you'll have to be patient. Can't fault the developers. Fish gotta swim, birds gotta eat.

If you want a game you can tap on a few things then come back a few hours later, this is it. Not any real goals though so after a while you do feel what's the point but the graphics are good and the events are good too but it needs better goals to help you achieve something. I just do what I want for now. Still play it though

I don't mind spending money on micro transactions if I like the game, and I do like this game.  But the jems in this game are outrageous, if you wanted to buy jems to buy one ship it would cost you $10-$20, depending on the ship.  Because of this, this developer won't be getting any more than the $4 I've spent on it unless they lower their prices.

comments: First off to all those saying too many ads, there aren't any ads. What you're seeing is game packs that can be purchased to help you advance within the game. I love the game. Everythingis great. I just wish they would give everyone time to adjust to previous items before creating something new. And also the pricingis too high. $20-$50 is fine but $99 is way too much.

This game has become a cash cow for the developers at MZ. New features are added making the game more complex and diverse weekly. Costing players money. While old features players are familiar with and depend on break down  After contacting MZ you get a nice form letter stating thank you for bringing it to there attention but they hope you understand these things take time to fix.

This game should be awesome, but the updates just come too fast now. I bought 2 packs this week and still got zeroed as soon as i dropped shield. By the time you spend 2 days clicking upgrades, someone is stronger than you and just waiting for you to try to use your new stuff.

This game was fun about two years ago before MZ started trying to milk players each month for money.  If you buy a package from them,  which ranges from $14.99 to $399.99, make sure you get what you pay for. ..many times you don't get everything they promise; especially with the BOGO packages.   MZ will do little if anything to correct the matter.  Also, even after you spend tons of money, if you wait long enough they will give you the same stuff for free to all players.   My advice...find another game to play. ..something more fun and worthwhile. ..and not sponsored by MZ.

If you want to be at top of this game then be prepared to spend more than the price of a top end BMW in one year. I am not kidding. MZ releases major game changing upgrades every day for several $99.99 packs. Then you get tge worst customer support in the industry. Terrible software quality control and business practices that mirror drug cartels.

Mz took a once decent game and ruined it.  The weekly changes are senseless change is to be gradual.  Im finally walking away.  Im done with ur bots, done with admin accts and done with daily chances.  More and more people have quit and droves more will follow.  Choke on the money u got from all  of the foolish people who actually paid.  You deserve none of it

comments: This is definitely a pay to win game.  And I agree with previous reviews saying it favors Chinese players.  The developers claim it's not, but if it wasn't true, then why are 99% of the servers dominated by Chinese players?  Plus the Chinese to English translations are terrible.  You will barely understands what they're saying.
The game could use more tool tips and information to properly explain all of the content. If I hadn't played a similar style game before this would be difficult to understand for a beginner.

BEWARE!  They will take the system down and give you when it will be back up.  Only problem is they bring it up before the advertised time.  Meaning you are left vulnerable.  They do not follow their own rules.  They do not compensate players for their mistakes.  They let Chinese player buy packs cheaper and use at accounts.  If you are a Westerner do not play or pay on this game.  Their customer service sucks.  They will only steal from you.

The graphics are great and the game play is interesting but it's very independent to new players; from other players as well as the system itself. Like things that have been improved on in this genre of game in other apps are still frustrating here. Oh well, what can I expect from a freemium game? Overall it's enjoyable but I have to take it in doses; basically until I get frustrated by the gameplay or other players. All in all, there are worse was to spend your time.

Great game. Gold prize is high but there is a weekly pack that is fair prize. Ive played the game for over a year now and the devs are good when it comes to improvemennts to the game. I am still waiting on a visual change to the ark home screen and a beter view on the map screen.   All in All i love this game.

comments: This game has been great to me forever, and I never had a complaint but this recent update has driven me here. The trophy cap is a real kick in the nuts and ruins the game for casual gamers like me. You now HAVE to advance through the games prestige system and keep resetting all your work just to help out a gang. And if you are in a strict gang like I am, they require 100 trophies a day. If I keep advancing, I won't be able to keep up with that. This is all a money grab by zepto now. They want you to have to pay to keep your machines strong so you can compete.

I love this game. I have been playing it for a very long time. I play it every single day. I like the new updates however it seems you are getting away from the original game and focusing more on ultimate machines. Increasing the prestige levels was awesome but you need to also add additional upgrades with them as well. I have over 100 paw upgrades that are completely useless to me at the moment.

Look this was a great game, worthy of it's previous accolades. Sadly since then it's been progressively ruined by an ever more aggressively enforced attempt to move to a pay to win model. Previously you could achieve anything in the game with a bit of hard work, then they tweaked it and you could achieve anything with a bit of hard work and team work. Sadly though what's happened is soft paywalls have been introduced, things you can't outright buy, but will only manage with financial outlay and change after change is being introduced with new soft paywalls and new ways to try and cash grab. The game is on a steady but rapid downward decline and to any new players I would avoid picking it up and investing your time in it now.

Great game, easy to play and a good time waster. One thing I would like to see in a future update  is a scroll bar for the parts in your garage. It would make it a lot easier than swiping through them, especially for those who have a lot of spare parts like myself. Other than that, awesome game.

This game sucks. First it is really hard to get good equipment. Then it is also very laggy. Everytime im playing the game it freezes right when im doing something. (Mainly when im customizing my car). Think about it when you are getting ths game to take up storage. If you'll excuse me now I've got a game to delete.

I had a bad day but this game fixed it,... Well enough. I've bin looking for a good game to play for a couple months now but until, like 2 days ago nothing had shown its self to me or caught my interest! This game is 11/10 to me! For probably about the next two month!

comments: When you get to 40 you can not go any further unless friends help. To me this is a bad thing to do because some people delete the game. I asked my friends and they done delete it also.

It was great UNTIL at level 180 I connected to Facebook and LOST EVERYTHING!!! All my boosters and things I had collected since the beginning. Even said connect to Facebook so you don't lose your progress. Makes me want to delete the whole app!!!!

This app keeps me wanting to find out what the next level has waiting ahead. I some times find my self having hours passing by me and not even know that the time has already passed by and even though I have realized that the time has passed by I stillI keep playing.
Just shouldn't have to pay so much so I only gave a 4 star. My only problem is it cost to much to go to the next level and to many days to wait if you're not on Facebook.
I like this game as a pastime. But the fact that we have purchase the gold bars we earned is killing the vibe. Do something and I'd give you five stars.
I used to play this game a while back and got bored. It's much better now. Thanks for my new pastime

descriptionHTML:
Pyramid Solitaire Saga, from the makers of Candy Crush Saga & Farm Heroes Saga!

Challenge awaits you in this magical Solitaire game.

Join Helena and her loyal companion Kingsley on their journey to reveal the wonders of the Ancient World.

Find the clues by catching the Scarabs hidden beneath the Cards. You can match a Card that is one greater or lower than the one on your deck.

Catch the running Scarabs and uncover clues to help you on your journey and reveal the long-hidden treasures and magic of the Ancients.

Complete each episode to reveal a hidden treasure and transport to magical new worlds on a quest to reignite Khepri's prophecy.

Explore the lost places of the world where epic adventures await you in The Hidden Tomb, The Emerald Dream and beyond!

Take on this Saga alone or play with friends to see who can get the highest score! 

Pyramid Solitaire Saga is completely free to play but some in-game items such as extra moves or lives will require payment.

By downloading this game you are agreeing to our terms of service; http://about.king.com/consumer-terms/terms

Pyramid Solitaire Saga features:
• Experience a new way of playing Solitaire with rich and exotic graphics set in Ancient Times
• Transport to magical new worlds with Helena the Treasure Hunter and Kingsley the cunning gerbil
• Powerful boosters to help with challenging levels
• Journey through exciting levels to unlock boosters and hidden treasures!
• Easy and fun to play, challenging to master 
• Hundreds of adventurous levels to complete – more to come!
• Leaderboards to watch your friends and competitors!
• Easily sync the game between devices and unlock full game features when connected to the Internet
• Available to play on mobile and tablet devices

Already a fan of Pyramid Solitaire Saga? Like us on Facebook or follow us on Twitter for the latest news: 
facebook.com/PyramidSolitaireSaga
twitter.com/PyramidSaga

Last but not least, a big THANK YOU goes out to everyone who has played Pyramid Solitaire Saga!

comments: I love this game. It's very dynamic and the gameplay is good too. The only problem I have is every single time I do PvP... It pairs me with an opponent far greater than what I can hope to beat. Sure, that's great for improving, but it disheartens me and makes me feel like a horrible player when I can't even beat ONE PvP opponent, ever, while playing the game. I would suggest to the devs that the matching system be a little more flexible when pairing. Give us a matching system that will actually give us lesser prepared players too so we can have the fun of winning, as well. Also, I am disconnected every single time I do PvP battles and bounties. Quite unstable, unfortunately.

Amazing shooter game, awesome hero collecting game, great multiplayer game. Definitely suggest that you at least try it out. But one thing you should look out for, it's pretty easy to sink between 5 and 20 dollars a week into this. Sometimes even 40 to 60. But, it's pretty free-to-play friendly if you can't afford to buy some gold.

I really like the game. It's fun and has enough activities and quests to keep you occupied for a while. My only complaint is how they match people up for the PVP missions. Sometimes you get matched up with people with far higher power and Team level menu which makes it nearly impossible to win. other than that I really enjoy the game

Super fun game. I haven't got bored of the game because there's always events going on which is good. One of the better if not the best shooting game I've played. I think there is a slight glitch when using Steele. Sometimes after I activate his open fire skill he doesn't shoot when I press the shoot button.

Latest update definitely made the game harder. I used to run 4 gauntlet levels with little issue but now I can't get through 1 without losing people. Resurrected characters are completely unwelcome and unfair in pvp when you tell on kills for money. Probably going to uninstall, you're welcome for the money Hothead

Starts off ok but then the pay walls creep in and you are constantly bombarded with prompts to spend money. The PVP is absolutely pointless, highest power rating wins every time without exception so you know if you've won or lost as soon as it picks an opponent. Needs a lot of work before I'd consider dropping any real money on it.

comments: Worked fine yesterday, logged in this morning and it now says I'm back to level 14 with no diamonds stars or coins and barely nothing on the island??!!! No way of contacting support/help desk either as just get error message when trying. Hugely disappointed after all the months of playing!

Should have longer time on the tradefest. Not everyone has time to just sit on the game 24/7.  More opportunities to win things. Don't like how I have to pay to plant my own crops on my own island though?! And why has the harvest count changed? Why make bad changes to the game? It just shys people away.

Loved this game and the players in it. BUT if you are not in their beta test group it's getting discouraging that you are not treated as equal as the others and you need to put much more effort and time to get rewards and move along in the levels. Don't start unless you like to be treated with no respect at all

Well the game is great!! This morning when I was using it tho the time it would take for things to be done was reduced greatly, everything was 2 mins, 5 mins, 10 mins and 15, and I was impressed and decided that if its a new update I'd glady play more often. The second time I went back on everything was back to the old time period of production. I was disappointed and didn't bother to spend even 5mins more on it. I believe everyone would find it more exciting to play if the time for production wasn't so long. I hope that this can happen in another update, if not, well I can't do nothing about that.

Gave it a lower rating because I sent 3 messages to support regarding loading error and never received a response just kept sending me to the games web page which was of no help. Very fun game but no support it seems

I love this game! It is my favorite! I like how can earn gems! I love the different 'contests.' However, I tried really hard to get the snowy owl and didn't make it in time. Now I'm not playing as much but still love the game!

comments: Addictive and engrossing game.  The bonus covers work well. The constant character tweaking and release rate makes the vs progression awards with wins is very good.  The favorites is a good way to let folks focus on building certain characters.  The transition points are still frustrating, especially when you get a run of bad luck with tokens.  Tokens might work better if they scaled instead. Biggest issue is progression awards in versus and the tough transitions in levels.

This is an awesome, addictive and hyper fun game. Brilliant idea and concept. In all the games I have played this is the first I have spent money on. VIP member. Have a couple suggestions for developer tho. Can you add abilities to swap covers with alliance members and maybe add as a bonus drop for playing, an extra free slot. Keep up the brilliant work. Truely love this game.

I have been playing this game for a few years now and love it! But a little suggestion... Because of the time I've spent playing it and the already difficult ability to get 4 and 5 star characters, I have nearly 3 million iso-8 that I literally cannot spend. Please add a way to convert iso-8 into hero points or command points!!! I'd like to get further in the game instead of literally stockpiling iso-8. This has all been done without spending a single dollar on the game too, btw

This is my go-to game. Day and night. It's fun, simple and sometime challenging. My only complaint is that i have like a million of Iso-8 and don't know what to do with them. My thought would be that if we don't need so much Iso-8, be sweet to give some to aliance member who needs it or so on. Great game. Don't know what I'd do without it!

Suitable for all age groups, Marvel Puzzle Quest is a great game for everyone. Progress with higher tier characters may be slow but yet significant. The wide variety of heroes and villians within the game allows for endless possibilities of the "best team". Highly addictive, I would recommend this perfect game to anyone and everyone.

Love that they are always adding new characters. Would like to see some different characters like Cable, Domino, Sabretooth, and Bishop just to name a few. Just because they don't have a movie... Would also like to see some new events, new animations, and less repetitiveness. Love the collection part and finally being able to use characters when you've finally built their powers enough. Love that it can be played for free. Love that feedback is read and the game is constantly evolving.Thanks.

descriptionHTML:
Marvel Comics’ fearless Super Heroes and evil Super Villains come to life in this Official Marvel match 3 role playing game! Create your own epic Dream Team using the strongest Super Heroes and the nastiest Super Villains in the Marvel Universe! Play Super Hero characters like Spider-Man, Captain America, Wolverine and the Hulk as you battle your way to victory through multi-level match-three puzzles. Thor, Iron Man, Deadpool and other comic and movie Super Heroes await your challenge!

FEATURES
★ Snag the top rank in Tournaments, Alliances, and Season Play for new character rewards and other prizes!
★ Form alliances with your friends and use your collective power to fight other players in events and epic battles via chat
★ Experience deep RPG leveling
★ Challenge your team of Super Heroes in exciting Player vs. Player tournaments
★ Build strategic alliances with your favorite heroes and villains
★ Join a community of 8 million players worldwide
★ New events, features and tournaments direct from the Marvel Universe
★ Exclusively written by Marvel’s Frank Tieri (Iron Man, Wolverine, Weapon X) and Alex Irvine (Iron Man: The Rapture, Daredevil Noir)

THE ORIGINAL MATCH THREE SUPER HERO GAME!
Match tiles to annihilate your opponents, harnessing Hulk’s superpower strength or Professor X’s mind control to manipulate the game board! Match 3 gems to power up, damage and bring even the most powerful Marvel comics characters to their knees. Will you be able to rank among the top champions?

PLAY WITH MARVEL’S GREATEST HEROES AND VILLAINS
Recruit your favorite Super Hero characters from the X-Men, Avengers, S.H.I.E.L.D., Guardians of the Galaxy and more to create the ultimate Marvel dream team! Whether you play Spider-Man alongside his arch-nemesis Venom, or play Captain Marvel alongside her Ms. Marvel successor, Kamala Khan, YOU assemble your very own epic team of Marvel Comics Super Heroes!

Play Ms. Marvel and her infamous fists against your fiercest foes or launch Captain America’s shield to stun your opponents in the final contest. Marvel Puzzle Quest’s ever-growing list of Super Hero comics and movie characters is updated regularly with new Super Heroes including Magneto, Black Panther, Ant-Man, Daredevil and more!

comments: Used to be five stars now 1.  FIX THE DOWNLOAD ISSUE WITH THE SPRING UPDATE!   Listen to your customers and at least acknowledge that you might be working on solving the problem.  Not responding at all is horrendous customer service.  Will be deleting the game shortly if not fixed.

Sometimes I would give it a five star other times 4 star. Good number of challenge keys per visit to none challenge sites. As few as two visits needed for one visit to challenge site in final level of challenge (requiring 25keys). Love the two modes for cards of fate. No time limit but fewer tries works great if you write down what you find. It surprisingly has improved my timed play of this mini game. There are getting to be too many items and NO search functions to facilitate where to find a particular item, what collection items belong to if someone wants it and you don't want to send it anonymously (case if you send a requested item) and don't send it from the gift bar. One of the better hide and find games.

I changed my previous rating. There are so many glitches, especially with new events  and support doesn't respond to requests. I haven't gotten totem bonuses for three days and new event is nearly impossible at times to find bunnies and objects. This used to be my "go to" stress reliever but now it just creates more stress.

Instead of relaxing me this game stresses the hell out of me. New bunny location is extremely hard to find the üêá. And the time limit is too short. I know im wasting my time writing this cause I've seen a lot people complaining about it and nothing is been done. Will be unistalling if it doesn't gets fix. Good day

The main complaint is that some tasks have insanely short timers, like for the new event where you have to find optionnal stuff that's really well hidden as well as the usual pack of items that usually takes the whole timer to find. Great game, bases itself too much on money dropping.

The only thing I don't like about the game is that by the time you search a couple of places (depending on ur level) is how long you have to wait to get enough energy up to search again. Depending on what you want to search it can take up to an hour or more to get the requirements. Other than that I really like the game.

descriptionHTML:
#1 MOST POPULAR HIDDEN OBJECT GAME IN THE WORLD!

Get ready for a journey unlike any other!
Mirages of an unknown city have been seen around the world. Is it real … or a hoax? While your detective agency is busy gathering information, your friend is dragged into the phantom city by black smoke. The only one who can save him, you must now enter the strangest place you’ve ever been … where magic, witchcraft and science work together, imagination turns real and weird creatures wander the streets. All around there are people and things gaining unusual abilities and a black smoke that seems to be alive, bringing with it enigmatic artifacts, secrets and dangers.

In order to rescue your friend and solve these unexplained phenomena, you will need to fulfill risky quests, explore dungeons, research amulets and get help from friends. Unravel the many mysteries of Shadow City as you fight monsters, confront a cult and rid the city of a horrible evil!

While this game is absolutely free to play, you have the ability to unlock optional bonuses via in-app purchases from within the game. You may disable in-app purchases in your device settings.

● 41 eerie locations to search
● Over 2968 quests to complete
● 430 collections to piece together
● 33 distinctive characters to meet
● 15 monsters to battle in mini-games
● Play with your friends to fight the evil together!
● Regular free updates with loads of new content
● Google Play game services support
______________________________

COMPATIBILITY NOTES: This game performs best on high-end smartphones and tablets.

descriptionHTML:
Beautiful and fun farming simulation game. Raise cute farm animals and harvest diverse crops to make your farm a success! It's up to you to make your dream farm by the seaside. Start building your dream farm now.

■■ Game Features ■■
✓ Played by over 60 million people all around the world!
✓ Tired of upgrading the Barn? Enjoy unlimited Barn space.
✓ Prepare more than 400+ dishes in the kitchen.
✓ Plant, harvest and produce over 200+ unique products!
✓ Compete with other farmers in the new Farm Beauty Contest!
✓ Daily orders and new missions added regularly for more fun!
✓ 500+ unique, cute, and well-designed decorations!
✓ Adopt pets and costume them with pet apparel and equipment. Now you can breed pets to make new baby pets!
✓ Exotic Island Farm: Explore a Mine, Garden!
✓ Marine Sea Resort: You are now the owner of the Sea Resort! Complete resort orders and build the best resort for visitors to come to!
✓ Visit neighbors' farms and sample their newest dishes to earn prizes, help clean decorations, and trade for needed farm products!

Family Farm Seaside supports 21 languages including; English, Arabic, Dutch, French, German, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian Bokmål, Persian, Polish, Portuguese, Russian, Spanish, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish

※ Product Usage Details
- Recommended Specifications: CPU Quad core 2.3GHz, Ram 2GB
- Minimum Specifications: CPU Quad core 1.5GHz, Ram 1GB

※ Access permission notice for gameplay
STORAGE: The permission is required to store game data and will not access personal files such as photos.
PHONE: The permission is required to proceed with in-game events and rewards and will not affect calls.
CONTACTS: The permission is required to sync your friend list and Google Account.

※ App Notes
- This app requires an active internet connection to play. Please make sure your device is connected while playing.
- Family Farm Seaside is completely free to download and free to play. However, some items in the game can be purchased with real money. If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases in your device's settings.

※ Contact Us!
- Family Farm Seaside Custmer Support: https://funplus.helpshift.com/a/family-farm-seaside/
- Need more neighbors and want to get game news and tips? »»» Like 👍 our official Fanpage: https://www.facebook.com/familyfarmseaside
- Privacy Policy: http://www.funplusgame.com/privacy_policy/

descriptionHTML:
Blast into a new Angry Birds puzzle adventure game! The birds are trapped inside balloons, and you can bet the pigs are behind it all. Tap matching balloons to blast them to smithereens and free the flock!

Use your balloon-bustin’ skillz to outsmart the pigs and save birds in over 600 egg-celent levels! Find the smartest way to solve puzzles, crack high scores, and earn three stars.

Grab rewards every day in the Daily Quest. Already got ’em? Then go join the weekly events or chase down this month's puzzle pieces. Blasted through those? How about taking on the world in the global leaderboard?

There’s plenty to do, and an ever-growing number of levels to master so get BLASTING!

Features:
· 600+ FUN LEVELS – with more added weekly!
· PICK UP AND PLAY – any time, any place even OFFLINE!
· TEASE YOUR BRAIN – with challenging & strategic gameplay!
· CREATE BOOSTERS – rockets, bombs, laser guns!
· DAILY CHALLENGES – earn free rewards and boosters!
· WEEKLY EVENTS – Mighty League, Treasure Hunt and more!
· PUZZLE CHASE – find pieces to new puzzles every month!
· PLAY WITH FRIENDS – connect to Facebook, yo!
· GLOBAL LEADERBOARDS – earn your spot with high scores!


----------------

Need some help? Visit our support pages, or send us a message! https://support.rovio.com/

----------------

Angry Birds Blast! is completely free to play, but there are optional in-app purchases available. Either way, you’ll have a blast! Get it? I’ll see myself out...

comments: If you are going to do updates on this game, at least MAKE SURE it isn't lagging! My game since the update has been freezing up and lagging to the point that I select something (a wall for example) and the whole  game freezes and takes a million years just to LOAD. If this game isn't fixed, I'm demanding all my money spent on the game refunded and uninstallment. Not happy.

The more I play the more this game is broken ... the AI for the troupes constantly suicide even if you keep rallying them , I am lvl 169 and I am constantly getting attacked by lvl 220 and up no lies , I can give screenshots because that is fair ... this is 1-5 times at least per hour ... this game from very fun became very frustrating. The game creators could give 2 sh/ts about what is going on .

My phone is not rooted or jail broken, I do not have any hacks installed. I get a message saying illegal program detected by XIGNCODE3. Even after multiple uninstalls/installs, reboots, cache clears. All that time and energy wasted!!!

This is the game I have been searching for. But can't give 5 star because of 2 main reasons. Consume too many data while playing that required fast network and too many bugs... Problems free=5 stars.. What happen? I cannot even play the game now.. I once install and play and later uninstall because of game problem. Now I install and try to play again. I cannot play.. What is the problem? I also want to recover my account too..

Gameplay and graphics is great BUT as you progress you spend more time upgrading units and buildings. Some upgrades take up to a week of upgrading rendering those villagers useless aswell as the rate at which resources comes in as you collect doesnt compensate enough for the costs of upgrades. Its unnecessarily STRETCHED OUT. because of this its a 3 star rating...DONT DOWNLOAD IF YOU HAVE NO PATIENCE. Been playing a year and i dont feel my progress is a representation of the time i have put in. Been playing almost daily!

This is the exact definition of a strategy game, the controls are great and its free. You get to choose your own nation which just adds to the strategy, plus whatever you do in a battle can affect the entire battle. I would recommend it to people who want something with strategy and a bit of hardcoreness. The learning curve is quite steep sometimes.

descriptionHTML:
Grow a flourishing civilization and journey through all of human history as the leader of a mighty Nation!

BUILD a unique village of your own design. LEAD loyal citizens from the dawn of antiquity to the modern era. BATTLE cooperatively and competitively with players from across the world. RAID competing Nations for all their good loot!

Battle and build a civilization through history as you aim to conquer the world in DomiNations.

DOMINATIONS FEATURES:

GREAT LEADERS!
• At the new University, consult Leonardo Da Vinci, Catherine the Great, King Sejong and other historic thought leaders.
• Strengthen your Nation with the best war strategy!

BRAND NEW EVENTS!
• Accomplish fun limited-time goals based on actual events from history.
• Collect rare rewards to help your Nation advance so they can conquer the world!

FROM THE STONE AGE TO THE SPACE AGE
• Lead a colony of early hunters and gatherers on their conquest through the ages from the dawn of civilization to the modern era.
• Design a small civilization and grow it into a thriving metropolis.
• Build historic Wonders of the World, including famous landmarks like the Pyramids of Egypt and the Roman Colosseum.

CHOOSE YOUR NATION AND LEAD AN ARMY
• Battle as of one of 8 fearsome Nations on its journey through time.
• Choose one of the great civilizations from history like the Romans, British, Chinese, French, Germans, Japanese, Koreans and Greeks.
• Tackle historic battle campaigns to collect important resources and upgrade your city as you advance through history!
• Each civilization has a special strength to help you build unique units.
• Battle through history and advance your city, like longbowmen, vandals, and the mighty samurai!

DISCOVER NEW TECHNOLOGIES
• Legendary game designer Brian Reynolds brings history to life in every era as key advancements from each period in history will help you progress your epic civilization!
• Research each civilization, new materials, invent advanced weaponry, and develop trade to grow a bustling economy.
• Through scientific discovery, strengthen your troops with better equipment, upgrade your buildings and town center with modern materials.
• Create a war strategy to bolster your defenses as you grow stronger.

FORM AN ALLIANCE AND WAGE WORLD WAR
• Put your powerful Nation to the ultimate test in PvP combat and raid your enemies’ cities for huge bunches of loot!
• Battle for crucial resources, untold wealth, and total world domination.
• Team up with other skilled rulers and forge an unstoppable Alliance.
• Unleash the full force of your armies with a unique battle strategy to outwit and outlast your opponents in 50-on-50 Alliance warfare.
• Conquer the globe in World War and take home the spoils of war!

Build one of history’s greatest civilizations and develop a battle strategy to conquer opponents. Join an alliance and achieve world domination in DomiNations!

Download now to start building your civilization

NOTES:

A network connection and iOS 7 or above are required. DomiNations is optimized for iPads and iPhones generation 4S and newer. Playing on an iPhone 4 may result in slower performance and increased load times. The game is free to play, with additional purchases available in-game. If you do not want to make purchases in-game, please disable in-app purchases from your device settings.

Privacy Policy:
https://www.nexonm.com/privacy-policy/

Terms of Service:
https://www.nexonm.com/terms-of-use/

6121 Hollis Street
Emeryville CA 94608
United States
recentChanges: v6.2 Update Notes
- Expand your civilization with 15 new spaces to explore!
- Upgrade your University to level 7!
- Research Haile Selassie‚Äôs skill tree at the University to improve your late-game combat defenses.
- Harness the power of his Capstone, Lion of Judah, unlocking the ability to build a Rocket Arsenal to defend your base!
- Town Center now has increased white radius where defenders are triggered.
- Japanese Town Centers features an additional yellow ring to show its firing range.
summary: Battle strategy game: Build an empire, wage war & conquer nations across history
title: DomiNations

descriptionHTML:
Welcome to Growtopia, a free to play 2D creative sandbox platformer MMO game! In Growtopia everyone is a hero! Jump into a universe of unlimited pixel worlds, all connected to each other. Create mind-bending block worlds together with friends and fill them with anything your heart desires!
There are many goals and an infinite number of worlds where you can create whatever you want with all your friends.

★ BUILD literally anything – castles, dungeons, skyscrapers, artwork, puzzles - even your favorite movie scenes!

recentChanges: 20 new levels!
Chapter 110 Ancient Remains
Trix motioned to the heads poking in and out from the trees. "It's like they're watching us."
"They once lived in this forest's protector, a giant tree spirit," Jenni explained.
"Why can't just go back home and leave us alone?" Trix retorted.
They came upon a huge tree stump, riches spilling out of its hollowed center. "The bandits cut it down for the treasures that grew within," Jenni said.
"Oh no!" cried Trix. "We need to stop those bandits!"
summary: Win big with the best, most addictive, match 3 game. Play Genies & Gems Now!
title: Genies & Gems - Jewel & Gem Matching Adventure

comments: It's a fun game but pvp is a big part and can take a week building up an army just to have it crushed when you log on. Has caused me to not play for a day or two because of this but also what makes me come back it offers that challenge that is often lost in most games like this where is the fun of there is no risk. Not to many tedious tasks after about day 5 no longer logging in every 3 hours to start a build project or something.

Other people might think its a boring game, but this game really fits for someone who doesnt want to get stressed out in a game.. really love the concept. Been a player here for almost 6 years now.. tried other games but still going back to this game.

Should add a few features like: 1. Able to share your battle report with other players. 2. Cancel troops in training. 3.See incoming attack on Hamlets you're holding (Or add a lost art which helps to see it).
My most resource hungry app on the tablet. Need to buy too many stuff to be a top level player. Lately, more stuff to buy and twice as expensive. Don't recommend this game.
Complex empire builder, takes time to learn. Definitely a pay to win. Lots of people with alts and coin hacks. Still lots to do. It's fun, but not worthy of serious commitment.
Reviving soldiers for sapphires must be the most ridiculous idea of all. My handful of soldiers need 2000 of those that are already impossible to acquire. :(
description: Immerse yourself in the dark world of fantasy and myth! Stormfall: Rise of Balur‚Ñ¢ delivers epic battles in one of the most challenging and popular MMO strategy games available. The empire of Stormfall has fallen, and rival warlords join the battle across the continent as an ancient evil rises once again. You have been chosen to defend and protect the lands of Darkshine, and lead your people and your army through these dark times and into the light. For the first time, this popular free strategy game has been brought to mobile as a standalone, epic, multiplayer adventure, featuring groundbreaking graphics and genre-defining gameplay. Attack enemies, forge alliances and gather resources as you defend your castle from constant enemy attacks whilst simultaneously building and expanding your empire. Carefully plan your strategy and join clans in order to defeat rival leagues in this ultimate MMORPG.    NOTE: Please set up password protection for purchases in the settings of your Google Play Store app. Also, under our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, you must be at least 13 years of age to play or download Stormfall: Rise of Balur‚Ñ¢FEATURES‚úî FREE TO PLAY‚úî Available in the following languages: English, French, Spanish, Italian, German, Portuguese and Russian‚úî Exceptional artwork, graphics and gameplay‚úî Recruit giant armies, raid endless castles and defend your empire ‚úî Exciting PVP battles ‚Äì pit your armies against other players from around the world, master strategy, diplomacy and join forces with great League to defeat your rivals. ‚úî Popular MMORPG free to play with thousands of clans to join.  ‚úî Forge diplomatic and strategic alliances with millions of online players, from around the world, all in real time. ‚úî Raid, attack and defend in order to defeat your enemies in ongoing battles and wars. ‚úî Earn bonus rewards just for commanding your troops each day. ‚úî Role playing game adventures and missions, deep level strategy NOTE! descriptionHTML:
Immerse yourself in the dark world of fantasy and myth! Stormfall: Rise of Balur™ delivers epic battles in one of the most challenging and popular MMO strategy games available.

The empire of Stormfall has fallen, and rival warlords join the battle across the continent as an ancient evil rises once again. You have been chosen to defend and protect the lands of Darkshine, and lead your people and your army through these dark times and into the light.

For the first time, this popular free strategy game has been brought to mobile as a standalone, epic, multiplayer adventure, featuring groundbreaking graphics and genre-defining gameplay. Attack enemies, forge alliances and gather resources as you defend your castle from constant enemy attacks whilst simultaneously building and expanding your empire. Carefully plan your strategy and join clans in order to defeat rival leagues in this ultimate MMORPG.

NOTE: Please set up password protection for purchases in the settings of your Google Play Store app. Also, under our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, you must be at least 13 years of age to play or download Stormfall: Rise of Balur™

FEATURES

✔ FREE TO PLAY
✔ Available in the following languages: English, French, Spanish, Italian, German, Portuguese and Russian
✔ Exceptional artwork, graphics and gameplay
✔ Recruit giant armies, raid endless castles and defend your empire
✔ Exciting PVP battles – pit your armies against other players from around the world, master strategy, diplomacy and join forces with great League to defeat your rivals.
✔ Popular MMORPG free to play with thousands of clans to join.
✔ Forge diplomatic and strategic alliances with millions of online players, from around the world, all in real time.
✔ Raid, attack and defend in order to defeat your enemies in ongoing battles and wars.
✔ Earn bonus rewards just for commanding your troops each day.
✔ Role playing game adventures and missions, deep level strategy


NOTE! Stormfall: Rise of Balur™ is a standalone mobile game and is completely independent from the web and social Stormfall servers.
Please give us your feedback to help us make it even better!

comments: This is an all around great game. PG I sent you an email about why not 5 stars in a few areas.  Will do 5 if they are resolved.  I will add this is my very first time spending money on in app purchases.  Edit: some issues fixed new ones arise.  Still playing though.  Fun game

Overall game is very good n addictive, been playing the game for awhile now. 1 major issue of the game is bugs that cause the game to lag esspecially after every game update. Reali hope Pocket Gems will look into this matter seriously and build a better game foundation. I will review my ratings when the game is more stable.

LOVE THIS GAME!! unlike other timed games you don't have to wait around.  When things are upgrading you can literally spend hours if you want just attacking other bases and breeding dragons.  Graphics are amazing and this is one game that constantly has me coming back.

Wonderful game, all these pay to win comments are slightly misleading. There are several power ups and time reducers that come fairly easy if you participate in events. Which, the events are almost always going on so you don't get bored!  Only problem I have is that the app keeps uninstalling itself from my phone. Not sure if it's the app's fault or my phone, but it doesn't happen to any other app on my phone...

PG needs to fix a lot of stuff. They never listen to the community and with the Atlas update has destroyed many alliances by creating a class divide between teams of all ranks. Huge let down and am afraid of the future of the game when game design decisions like this are allowed to occur.

Fun until you have to wait a day to do something. How can you play a game if the game won't let you play, but by good it takes up space. So you want me to have a game taking up space in my phone but I'm can't play the game. So it is literally a waste of space.. developers are stupid and selfish.

Breed your dragons to create an even more powerful army. With true synchronous multiplayer, you can chat with teammates in real time and coordinate attack and defense strategies against other guilds.BUILD IMPENETRABLE FORTRESSESStrategize and build your island fortress with the optimal combination of lightning, ballista, and archer towers to best protect your base against enemy attack.ASCEND TO THE THRONEParticipate in a wide variety of weekly events with the chance to win rewards, such as rare dragon eggs and treasure hunts, for you and your guild. Claw your way up the leaderboards to assert yourself as one of the world‚Äôs top dragon lords.EXPLORE THE CHAOTIC BEAUTY OF WAR DRAGONSThe game was built on the Mantis Engine, a proprietary 3D game engine, featuring state-of-the-art graphics and cinematics. Experience mobile games like never before with the ability to visually explore all facets of its stunning world.PRAISE FOR WAR DRAGONS‚ÄúThe 3D graphics are spectacular for a mobile device, and this makes War Dragons stand out as the best-looking game of the bunch.‚Äù-GamesBeat‚ÄúWar Dragons from Pocket Gems gives us a taste of what it‚Äôd be like to unleash giant flying lizards on whatever poor ground-bound schmucks are fated to scurry under their shadows.‚Äù-Gamezebo‚ÄúThere's a combat section where your dragon will be flying through an enemy' encampments, and you deal damage to everything as you fly by. You'll also be building your own bases, forming guilds to help work with other players, and just trying to be the biggest, baddest, dragon-taming emperor of them all.‚Äù-Touch ArcadePlease note that War Dragons is free to play, but you are able to purchase game items with real money. Collection and use of your data are subject to the Privacy Policy available at http://pocketgems.com/privacy.
descriptionHTML:
War Dragons is a visually stunning 3D real-time strategy game that puts you in control of the ultimate dragon army. Join a guild, help your teammates launch attacks, and hold off enemy raids in true real-time fashion.

BREED LEGENDARY DRAGONS

War Dragons has more than one hundred unique dragons possessing different attack styles, spell abilities, and classes. Breed your dragons to create an even more powerful army. See if you can unlock the furious behemoth Khrysos and dominate the battlefield!

COMBINE FORCES WITH FRIENDS

Start or join a guild to combine forces with other dragon lords. With true synchronous multiplayer, you can chat with teammates in real time and coordinate attack and defense strategies against other guilds.

BUILD IMPENETRABLE FORTRESSES

Strategize and build your island fortress with the optimal combination of lightning, ballista, and archer towers to best protect your base against enemy attack.

ASCEND TO THE THRONE

Participate in a wide variety of weekly events with the chance to win rewards, such as rare dragon eggs and treasure hunts, for you and your guild. Claw your way up the leaderboards to assert yourself as one of the world’s top dragon lords.

EXPLORE THE CHAOTIC BEAUTY OF WAR DRAGONS

The game was built on the Mantis Engine, a proprietary 3D game engine, featuring state-of-the-art graphics and cinematics. Experience mobile games like never before with the ability to visually explore all facets of its stunning world.

PRAISE FOR WAR DRAGONS

“The 3D graphics are spectacular for a mobile device, and this makes War Dragons stand out as the best-looking game of the bunch.”
-GamesBeat

“War Dragons from Pocket Gems gives us a taste of what it’d be like to unleash giant flying lizards on whatever poor ground-bound schmucks are fated to scurry under their shadows.”
-Gamezebo

“There's a combat section where your dragon will be flying through an enemy' encampments, and you deal damage to everything as you fly by. You'll also be building your own bases, forming guilds to help work with other players, and just trying to be the biggest, baddest, dragon-taming emperor of them all.”
-Touch Arcade

Please note that War Dragons is free to play, but you are able to purchase game items with real money. If you want to limit the ability to make in-app purchases, you may create a PIN in the Settings menu from within the Google Play Store.

Your use of this application is governed by the Terms of Service available at http://pocketgems.com/terms. Collection and use of your data are subject to the Privacy Policy available at http://pocketgems.com/privacy.
developerAddress: 220 Montgomery Street, Suite 750 San Francisco, CA 94104

Player Level-Up - Made a number of improvements to the level-up experience. Players will also be notified of newly available building upgrades, in addition to what new buildings can be constructed.
summary: Build, breed, and customize the ultimate dragon army to annihilate all others!
title: War Dragons

descriptionHTML:
A top 10 strategy game all around the world!
4.5 stars! A top-rated game!

Are you ready to step into the pit and punch someone? Your favorite Clash of Lords 2 Heroes are fighting in a free-for-all frenzy against a force of frightening fiends! Control the action and become the greatest warlord in all the land. To survive you’ll need wit, will, and we couldn't think of a word for strength but you get the picture. It's time to Clash!

Clash of Lords 2 is a strategy game with fun and innovative twists on the genre. Recruit over 50 Heroes and their mercenaries, build and defend a base, and fight alongside your friends in over 10 PvE and PvP modes! Get ready to Clash!

Game Features:
✔ You control the action! Activate Heroes’ skills in real time!
✔ Pair Heroes and Troops with our unique Mercenary system!
✔ Play it Your Way! With over 10 PvE and PvP modes, there's always something fun and different to do!
✔ Fight alongside your friends! Join a Guild, and clash with players from all over the world! You can even battle against players from different countries!
✔ Free to Play! Log in every day to win free Heroes and Jewels!

Note: This game requires an internet connection to play.
Visit our Facebook Fanpage at: https://www.facebook.com/clashoflords2

It's a great time waster and has tons of story and puzzles in the stories if you read them. So overall I give a 10 out of 5 stars!

This gamebis fun,i just got the game 5 ninutes ago and im doing very good on this game.you can farm gold. [By countunelessley killing enimies.]my guy deals 17.60 milloion damage per tap.i give this game 5 stars

Game is actually mindlessly fun. Climb the ladder and get stronger, and win tournaments. However, the game is not balanced for casual players and the development put a huge emphasis on pay to play. If you want to climb you really have to give up your life and keep climbing, and pay so you can simply redo your skills as you gain more. Hard to justify committing so much time.

Love the game! That is until I got a new phone(LG G6) that is plenty capable of playing this game. Now it opens to a black screen and sits there. I'd love to continue to play, but unless this is fixed, I'll look for something else, not that I want to...

comments: Nice Game! At the start its easy, like many players said, but maybe they didnt stick through to further their games,I believe the easy start is needed to build for the later part of the games specially if you are a f2p player. Though being F2P isnt as bad here as it is on other games (speaking from experience). I like thier new updates now and specially the "sweep" requirement. Thanks Devs! my only hope is that please make planting/ crops a little easier on us common folks,it gets a little bit tiring to have to press from seed>plant repeat (depending on your available field). description: Join this thrilling 3D ARPG to explore hundreds of quests and tons of fun in Pocket Knights 2! Craft powerful gear to increase your might and assemble your legendary heroes to take on horrible bosses. Passions are high in Pocket Knights 2 as you can plunder hidden treasure in various battlefields, expand mysterious territories, challenge in the PVP Arena and win amazing treats for coming out on top. descriptionHTML:
Join this thrilling 3D ARPG to explore hundreds of quests and tons of fun in Pocket Knights 2! Craft powerful gear to increase your might and assemble your legendary heroes to take on horrible bosses. Passions are high in Pocket Knights 2 as you can plunder hidden treasure in various battlefields, expand mysterious territories, challenge in the PVP Arena and win amazing treats for coming out on top. New adventure and battles are around every corner, don't miss a second of this exciting journey!

==FEATURES==

【BUILD YOUR STRONGEST TEAM】
Choose from over 100 Heroes from different positions
Match unique Heroes to unleash fantastic combo-skills

【REINFORCEMENT, PERFECT YOUR STRATEGY】
Master abilities to overcome the most powerful enemies
Arrange your best bench strategically for a crucial assist

【COLLECT POWERFUL GEAR】
Discover legendary equipment in mysterious battlefields
Upgrade gears to improve your combat and deal massive damage

【BATTLE ONLINE】
Dominate the Arena, participate in Guild wars, climb your own way to the top
Collect valuable resources and start Team Instances with worldwide players

【TAKE ON QUESTS TO EARN MORE REWARDS】
Enter and conquer harder battles to earn bigger treats
Find powerful loot and equipment in hidden spots

==CONTACT==
If you encounter any difficulties or require support, please reach us at: PKsupport@mngo.com

comments: I have played this game for years now. Great new levels, still challenging, and fun ways to earn power-ups without having to make a purchase! Loved it until it quit working on my phone. Doesn't even crash anymore, just quits mid-play and I lose whatever progress I'd made. I play when I can on my tablet, but it's just not the same. I don't know why it won't work on my phone without spontaneously closing! 5 stars if it did...

I love, love  this game is difficult to play, but to my opinion is the best game on line ihave been playing for 2 years and my goal is to beat it . you get rewards. I spend money but with the rewards you get something back  ,also I just started another game with is similar like pandapop and iam a also give it 5 stars . even that iam a grandmother of 72 years old. I still popping. !!

A wonderful game to have very fun and exciting install right away you won't regret it. I've reached level 1049. It is super exciting to me learning how to Ricochet the balls off the walls. The projection of the angle need it. This is my all-time favorite and I highly recommend it to my friends and family. Plus, the little bit of flaws and the enemies within the game, will have you taking a break and coming back for more. Just know that I've deleted this game twice but always came back to it because this game , is fun and challenging .  If you don't like a challenge you won't like this game .  Just so you know , it does not require internet, to be able to play this game like others. Technicians please put out more games that don't need the Internet to play. This game is one of them. Just know that option is super helpful. We need more games able to be played without internet intervention. Ty taking time to read this. Have fun a Poppin. LOL

Not bad, not great. Randomly stops in the middle of play and you lose a life. Also takes a long time to load and to move to the next level. Okay for free, but if I paid for it I would be asking four a refund.  Update: I've contacted the developers multiple times. They keep sending the same canned response.  Game crashes frequently. Frustrating when you are just about to finish a level. Uninstalling.

I use to give this a 5 star rating until I lost all of my panda belt progress when I updated, 5 days ago. I sent a report to you and got a message that said there was a problem with the update. I'm still waiting for an answer on when this will be fixed. I refuse to play any levels or specisls, like badboon lair until I can receive the panda belt credits. If I don't receive the panda belt credits or if I am not credited for the points that I lost I will uninstall this game!!!!!

I loved this game and have played it for a few years now. I would have given it 5 stars, but for the last few months, it just closes on me mid play and I lose on my progress, as well as any items and special powers that I used to advance in a level. Very frustrating to lose items and have to start all over on the level.

comments: I got this game about a month after it was released.  Everything was awesome, the support was phenomenal and worked well together fixing bugs and listening to players.  They have done many great things, but the support more on non existent except for those who put thousands into the game.  I've dropped about $600 and the ignore my mails, msging via messenger.  Fun game, support is AWFUL

The trailer ad for this game shamelessly plays Pirates of the Caribbean soundtrack, and graphical assets in the actual game are similarly copied from other people's work. And by that I mean not influenced, by but blatantly ripped off. Hellooo lawsuit...

Developer has long history of poorly coded apps with server stability issues as well as loss of purchased game credits and lack of proper support.  Pick a game by a developer who actually SUPPORTS their app instead, you'll be much happier.

It was Great, until the stupid game started crashing every day!  I spent cash on this, and to lose so much due to it glitching and crashing is unacceptable!  I'll give more stars when this issue is fixed... until then if you don't wanna lose your money die to crashes and glitches DO NOT INSTALL!   Update , I wish I could give negative Stars,  it is continuously CRASHING if my troops die due to FAILURE which is caused by the developers faulty upkeep this time, I'll quit and never play another game made by this company again!  SIMPLY FIX THE ISSUES ON YOUR GAME OR REDUND OUR MONEY, YA CROOKS!!!!!!üò†üò†üò†üò†üò°

descriptionHTML:
An epic strategy war game you absolutely can't miss! War Of Colony takes you back to the age of colonization!

Assemble your army and plunder resources to fuel your conquest!
Build your base and repel invaders; your army needs your full efforts to grow stronger!
Work up from Private 3rd class to Grand Marshal, and expand your territory to every corner of the world!

Game Features:

Base Development
World conquest starts with building a formidable base.
Increase resource production and storage; soldiers are no good on an empty stomach!
Upgrade castles, barracks and technologies to improve your base's defenses and military power.

Troops
Units have their own strengths and weaknesses. Use this knowledge to counter your enemies!
Generals each have their own special skills!
Excellent commander utilizes the battlefield environment to maximize the effect of troop deployment. Learn to get the best results with minimum costs!

Battle:
The age of colonization is an age of war!
PVE, PVP, 1v1, or even World War; the choice is yours!

Alliance
Join an Alliance to speed up development!
Rally your allies to attack and defend simultaneously. Strength in Unity!
Ready yourself for blood-boiling Alliance Wars that will rock the very world!

Visual Effects:
Stunning graphics presented by top artists devoted to polishing every detail of the game.
Experience the features of that glorious era, and recreate the sites of history's greatest battles.

For more details, download the game now!

recentChanges: 1. Added: General Appointment feature
Players now can appoint Generals to different positions and gain corresponding benefits. Appointed Generals can also be sent into battles.
2. Added: Alliance Quests
Alliance Members now can complete quests together to earn rewards.
3. Added: Alliance Treasure
Alliance leaders and co-leaders can now open Alliance Treasure. Alliance Members can complete Treasure Quests to earn rewards.
4. Fixed some bugs and improved some functions.
summary: The 1707-1920 colonial war of the world
title: War of Colony

comments: Extremely addictive! First day I played I overshot my bus stop by 5 minutes because I forgot to look up.  There is always something to do in the game somewhere - and the micro transaction bit doesn't feel forced, and you can easily progress without it.  It kept me occupied for days - unfortunately I had to delete it because I got too caught up.  So if you're looking for a game to grab your attention and keep you entertained on long commutes and the like, this is great for that

Fun little game, but I would love for food, and water, to be a little bit faster. Also maybe rise up the rush chances. I do have 1 suggestion, maybe when the people off to the Waste Lands, they can find some rare stuff, like gems or maybe clothes/weapons. This game is really fun, even though I've just started it, keep up the great work! üëçüèΩ

I figured my old ass phone wouldnt run this game when first announced, just confirming for folks it sure doesnt. I thought there might be a chance it would cos my phone is rooted and I have full control over how my ram is utilized. Thank bob for android emulators on desktop, can't wait to play :)

Look, I can kind of understand dwellers not dropping their assignments to fight raiders, but can we have the ability to assign fighters to the raiders themselves. It's a massive and unnecessary pain to constantly remind my few armed dwellers to actually fight the raiders instead of just looking cute in the room they just left. Weapons are scarce in this game, and raiders move too often to play pass the gun. It would also be nice if there was a pause feature, but that would reduce the butler-bot purchases.

Fantastic! A resource management sim that is incredibly fresh and charming thanks to the richness of the Fallout franchise. Keeps you coming back for hours. From the quirkiness of the dwellers to the depth of the side quest system, this game is deserving of your time. Finally, the game is totally playable without paying. Still, throw the devs a few bucks! You'll sink hours into this title.

Absolutely love this game. If you're a die hard fallout fan, or even someone new to the series this is the perfect game for you. You'll get a sense of nostalgia pulling your first legendary dweller, or a sigh of relief when you obtain that last part for the weapon you've been looking to craft. Fallout Shelter is the perfect mobile game for any fan of the series. The game is slow and hard in the beginning but when you get on your feet you'll never want to put it down. If you're on the edge about downloading it please do, it's worth all the time and space!
description: ** Google Play Best of 2015  **Mobile Game of the Year - 2016 DICE AwardsWinner 2015 Golden Joystick Best Handheld/Mobile Game"Might just be the best free-to-play game out there" - GamesBeat"Probably the best game of E3 2015‚Äù ‚Äì Gizmodo "Fallout Shelter is simple to play and addictive as hell." - GameZoneBUILD THE PERFECT VAULTCreate a brighter future‚Ä¶underground! Select from a variety of modern-day rooms to turn an excavation beneath 2,000 feet of bedrock into the very picture of Vault Life.OVERSEE A THRIVING COMMUNITY Get to know your Dwellers and lead them to happiness. Find their ideal jobs and watch them flourish. Provide them with outfits, weapons, and training to improve their abilities.CUSTOMIZETurn worthless junk into useful items with Crafting! Customize the look of any dweller in the Barbershop.PROSPERA well-run Vault requires a variety of Dwellers with a mix of skills. Build a Radio Room to attract new Dwellers. Or, take an active role in their personal lives; play matchmaker and watch the sparks fly! EXPLORE THE WASTELAND Send Dwellers above ground to explore the blasted surface left behind and seek adventure, handy survival loot, or unspeakable death. Find new armor and weapons, gain experience, and earn Caps. But don‚Äôt let them die!PROTECT YOUR VAULTFrom time to time, idyllic Vault life may be disrupted by the dangers of post-nuclear life. Prepare your Dwellers to protect against threats from the outside‚Ä¶and within.Vault-Tec has provided the tools, but the rest is up to you. What are you waiting for? Get started building your Vault today for FREE.

Turn worthless junk into useful items with Crafting! Customize the look of any dweller in the Barbershop.

PROSPER
A well-run Vault requires a variety of Dwellers with a mix of skills. Build a Radio Room to attract new Dwellers. Or, take an active role in their personal lives; play matchmaker and watch the sparks fly!

EXPLORE THE WASTELAND
Send Dwellers above ground to explore the blasted surface left behind and seek adventure, handy survival loot, or unspeakable death. Find new armor and weapons, gain experience, and earn Caps. But don’t let them die!

PROTECT YOUR VAULT
From time to time, idyllic Vault life may be disrupted by the dangers of post-nuclear life. Prepare your Dwellers to protect against threats from the outside…and within.

Vault-Tec has provided the tools, but the rest is up to you. What are you waiting for? Get started building your Vault today for FREE.

comments: I absolutely love this game. I make it a point to not spend money on mobile games cus they typically turn out to be a cash trap, but this was just like buying a regular video game. No adds, and even before buying the full game it doesn't shove "buy our product" notifications down your throat. Nintendo has always had good games and I have no doubts that I will keep playing this every day.

Was pretty short to begin with but Nintendo has supported this game well, adding additional content, even a new mode. The simplified game mechanics to fit Mario gaming on a phone work great and feel natural. The story with it's additional challenges to open new courses are fun, toad run is addictive, the remix 10 is somewhat redundant content wise but also good. I'd rather pay $10 up front than have in-game purchases, the reception to this game indicates that I'm very much in the minority on that. Great game, very fun for a quick session of Mario.

Awesome update! Make the game worth again, when it seems Nintendo had abandoned Super Mario Run, they back and release more content for the half of the price. This is the kind of update I was waiting for, once I didn't paid the game yet, I think this could be a great time to purchase. Probably in the future they will release more content, but the price will back to 9.99, so the best time to purchase is now! Great job Nintendo, I love your games since my childhood.

Awesome and all, but you only get 4 levels for free. To go to world 2, WHY IN THE UNIVERSAL WORLD RIGHT HERE IN A CITY (lolüòÄ) DO YOU HAVE TO BUY WORLD 2, 3, 4, 5, AND 6? TALK ABOUT A RIPOFF! üòû (Warning to Nintendo: If you dont fix this soon, I'm deleting. Sorry!)

Favorite game. It has a one time cost for full version and not a monthly fee or several different things you have to buy to enjoy it. I like the updates with the remix, and the star courses. I didnt like that there was so little to do before I bought it. I got bored quick. But was surprised by the cost, and love it after buying it. I do wish we could see our friends land and share things we don't need and give rally tickets to others.

This is just proof Nintendo can make amazing games no matter the platform. All the bad reviews are people's mad you gotta pay for the game. Lol wut? It's a great time killer made  by the best gaming company in the world and you're mad it's not free? Funny. There's no IAP.  It's not pay to win. But it is the most fun 5$ will ever buy you.
