descriptionHTML:
A new kind of Mario game that you can play with one hand.

You control Mario by tapping as he constantly runs forward. You time your taps to pull off stylish jumps, midair spins, and wall jumps to gather coins and reach the goal!

Super Mario Run can be downloaded for free and after you purchase the game, you will be able to play all the modes with no additional payment required. You can try out all four modes before purchase: World Tour, Toad Rally, Remix 10, and Kingdom Builder.

■World Tour
Run and jump with style to rescue Princess Peach from Bowser’s clutches!
Travel through plains, caverns, ghost houses, airships, castles, and more.

Clear the 24 exciting courses to rescue Princess Peach from Bowser, waiting in his castle at the end. There are many ways to enjoy the courses, such as collecting the 3 different types of colored coins or by competing for the highest score against your friends. You can try courses 1-1 to 1-4 for free.

After rescuing Princess Peach, a nine-course special world, World Star, will appear.

■Remix 10
Some of the shortest Super Mario Run courses you'll ever play!
This mode is Super Mario Run in bite-sized bursts! You'll play through 10 short courses one after the other, with the courses changing each time you play. Daisy is lost somewhere in Remix 10, so try to clear as many courses as you can to find her!

■Toad Rally
Show off Mario’s stylish moves, compete against your friends, and challenge people from all over the world.

In this challenge mode, the competition differs each time you play.
Compete against the stylish moves of other players for the highest score as you gather coins and get cheered on by a crowd of Toads. Fill the gauge with stylish moves to enter Coin Rush Mode to get more coins. If you win the rally, the cheering Toads will come live in your kingdom, and your kingdom will grow.

■Kingdom Builder
Gather coins and Toads to build your very own kingdom.

Combine different buildings and decorations to create your own unique kingdom. There are over 100 kinds of items in Kingdom Builder mode. If you get more Toads in Toad Rally, the number of buildings and decorations available will increase. With the help of the friendly Toads you can gradually build up your kingdom.

■What You Can Do After Purchasing All Worlds

・ All courses in World Tour are playable
Why not try out the bigger challenges and thrills available in all courses?

・ Easier to get Rally Tickets
It's easier to get Rally Tickets that are needed to play Remix 10 and Toad Rally. You can collect them in Kingdom Builder through Bonus Game Houses and ? Blocks, by collecting colored coins in World Tour, and more.

・ More playable characters
If you rescue Princess Peach by completing course 6-4 and build homes for Luigi, Yoshi, and Toadette in Kingdom Builder mode, you can get them to join your adventures as playable characters. They play differently than Mario, so why not put their special characteristics to good use in World Tour and Toad Rally?

・ More courses in Toad Rally
The types of courses available in Toad Rally will increase to seven different types of courses, expanding the fun! Along with the new additions, Purple and Yellow Toads may also come to cheer for you.

・ More buildings and decorations in Kingdom Builder
The types of buildings available will increase, so you'll be able to make your kingdom even more lively. You can also place Rainbow Bridges to expand your kingdom.

・ Play Remix 10 without having to wait
You can play Remix 10 continuously, without having to wait between each game.

*Internet connectivity required to play. Data charges may apply.

Like people on my team on here.  Thank you! Lynn Mauger

descriptionHTML:
If you love Hidden Object Games, epic adventure, and romance stories, Pearl's Peril will be your new favorite!

Find objects, solve the mystery and discover a new world full of twists. This game offers graphically beautiful scenes where you will have to reveal secrets and intrigues.

Pearl’s Peril is a stunning hidden object game that sweeps you away into an age of intrigue and romance, where polite appearances give way to inner greed and familial bonds are broken by betrayal.

Make friends, fall in love and seek clues in hundreds of hidden object scenes.

*YOU WILL LOVE PEARL’S PERIL*

● EXPERIENCE THE BEAUTY
No other hidden object adventure game can match Pearl’s stunning, hand-drawn scenes. Hundreds of unique locations transport you to a historic era when adventure pilots like Pearl were just beginning to open up our world.

● DISCOVER NEW ROMANCE SCENES
An epic story-driven game you’ll experience over years of gameplay! It will leave you with many dramatic scenes and stories to cherish and experience over and over again.

● UNRAVEL THE MYSTERY
Have fun! Find romance! Fall in love! Get swept away! Be shocked! But beware… in a world where power goes unchecked and hidden ambition knows no bounds, nothing is ever as it seems.

● BUILD YOUR PARADISE
As you journey through Pearl’s exciting challenges and hidden object gameplay, always return to Artemis Island to rebuild and expand – to create a paradise that you will love.

Join more than 40 million others when you play the most beautiful, deepest, highest-quality an epic hidden object adventure game on your mobile device. Adventure is waiting for you, so get started today!

~

Pearl Wallace lives the exciting life of an heiress and socialite in the 1920’s in New York City. That is until her father’s sudden suicide plunges her into a world of intrigue and mystery. Despite overwhelming evidence to the contrary, Pearl knows in her heart that her father’s death was no suicide. She will stop at nothing as she seeks to unravel the series of events leading to his untimely death and find the hidden villains who were really responsible. Money, danger and even death is no object as Pearl works to clear Samuel Wallace’s name.

As an ace pilot and cunning detective, Pearl flies headfirst into a whirlwind of adventure which takes her around the world from the depths of Africa to the heights of the Eiffel Tower. However, she’ll need your keen eye if she’s going to find the evidence she needs to confirm her suspicions that her father didn’t commit suicide at all. He was murdered!

Travel with Pearl to her family home on the Polynesian island of Artemis and help her find clues as well as piece together the puzzles, revealing the truth about mysterious secret orders locked in a struggle to determine the rise and fall of nations. Join our heroine as she unveils the hidden story of deception and betrayal that involves nearly everyone she has ever known or loved. Stand beside her as she seeks and finds hidden strength. Along the journey find the wealth to rebuild Artemis Island to its former glory, while discovering loyal friends, love and ferocious enemies that will test your limits.

---------------------------------------------------------------

Having problems? Any suggestions? We would love to hear from you! You can reach us here: http://woo.ga/PPhelp

Become a fan of the game by keeping up with the latest stories, rewards, and competitions here:

http://www.facebook.com/pearlsperil
Visit us at http://wooga.com
Like us on facebook.com/wooga

Pearl’s Peril is free to download and play but it also allows you to purchase virtual items with real money inside the game. You can disable in-app purchases in your device’s settings.

You may require an Internet connection to play Pearl’s Peril and access its social features. Pearl’s Peril may also contain advertising.

Terms of Use: http://www.wooga.com/legal/terms-of-use/
Privacy Policy: http://www.wooga.com/legal/privacy-policy/

comments: Best game!! Very addictive, Been playing this game for over a year.. although, there are still alot to improve!  I hope the developers will include edit mode in the next update so that the players can rearrange their city..Also, I hope they will also include a 360 rotation of the city and add factories that can also create materials needed in the game like the railroad materials and steels. I am looking forward with this updates!!

Great, but really needs "sell all" function for dealing with store house and "pecial buildings" components.This is a really quality game, looks amazing, works well and has good timed construction projects. However, as others mention it takes SOOOOOOO long to accrue the assets for construction and the mega bucks for expansion. You have to be VERY patient if you are not willing to part with actual cash. An idea might be to offer a conversion of coins to megabuck, maybe get 1 buck in excahge for eg 5,000,000 coins?

I love this game. Just like other reviews say, it is addicting and because there are constant tasks to complete. Plus!..unlike other games, there is no way you ruin out of coins/money. The cities bring in alot. I can't agree with one reviewer that megabucks are hard not come by.  I began with 25 I believe (now at 32) and some of the tasks to complete give megabucks without spending actual money to even purchase some.  All in all, try this game and you won't run bored of it.

Good game but......after a day into it you make no coin. After every level upgrade it pushes the (buy) equipment option. Not to mention every time you level up. You got to.exit out 15 boxes.before you can continue. Good game but, it's a failure on the free to play aspect.  My rating is fair and final. It's a (ok)  game but many better ones out thwre

The new update is great! Really appreciate the chat system. But it could be better... maybe add some functionality to the capital buildings and states.... maybe bonuses to taxes nd pop, loans, and coop science and military missions. The prices of capital building materials is ridiculous. Fixing these will make the state system look more complete.

Been playing for more than 3 years, i lost count. But this is a wonderful game which encourages teamwork and neighbor support. There are barely any paywalls in this game and  if you have hundreds of facebook friends who have this game you can easily get the materials you need to expand your city. No limits so far. description: One body is nobody! Gather your bros and kick the living heck out of tyrannical Autocrat's armadas in a series of breathtaking aerial battles! The enemy outnumbers you, but you're never alone -- the unique co-op mode allows you to join forces with either your bro or a new friend! Shooting never ends.With a broad range of aircraft and upgrades to choose from, a variety of missions and challenges, Hawk is a good ol' adrenaline overdose. There's absolutely no way you'll ever get bored! So be ready to attack.Maniac bros will help you choose the best guns and surprise the enemies with destructive missiles. Keep your strongest weapons reloaded to deliver a crucial strike to the enemies‚Äô fighter jets. True bullet hell where metal melts.‚Äì Exciting campaign: more than 190 levels full of enemies and breathtaking action!‚Äì Unique co-op multiplayer: team up with your battle brothers to overcome challenges or join forces with random players for even more fun!‚Äì Additional modes: Arcade, Team-up and Assault, each of them radically changing the gameplay!‚Äì Perfect Shoot ‚Äòem up: Lots of fighter jets, battle companions, ammunition and guns, and devices to choose from: your personal armory is packed with hi tech!.‚Äì Huge bosses: battle and defeat enemies that are so big they don't even fit the screen! And wipe out swarms of their minions! Find pieces of the Danmaku barrage of bullets. ‚Äì Great visuals: Tired of space and lasers? Try out flying! Amazing 3d graphics will make you forget that this game genre is old school. Vertical shooters have never been better. Epic sky wars are full of excitement. Choose your ¬´phoenix¬ª and free the country from invaders. The symphony of air war and heroes' charisma are unforgettable!‚Äì Retro modernized: Played Shmup (STG) games before? Think this is retro? We prove you are wrong. This top-down shooter will make you say ¬´wow¬ª and revive the best impressions of your scroll childhood. No matter you are a fan of Strikers, Tyrian, Ace Squad, Razor or Airborn or you participated in battle actions in 1945. You will become the fan of our freedom squadron!  Take your Broforce to victory. Feel the bullet force.

With a broad range of aircraft and upgrades to choose from, a variety of missions and challenges, Hawk is a good ol' adrenaline overdose. There's absolutely no way you'll ever get bored! So be ready to attack.
Maniac bros will help you choose the best guns and surprise the enemies with destructive missiles. Keep your strongest weapons reloaded to deliver a crucial strike to the enemies’ fighter jets. True bullet hell where metal melts.

Epic sky wars are full of excitement. Choose your «phoenix» and free the country from invaders. The symphony of air war and heroes' charisma are unforgettable!

This top-down shooter will make you say «wow» and revive the best impressions of your scroll childhood. At the start you can play for about 1-2hrs; Then you have to wait for 8 more hours because you can't upgrade anything, or earn anything. From then on it's more of a chore then anything fun. The game starts out confusingly so lots will spend the free in game currency they give you, that you desperately need to speed up pack openings! Then before you even know how the game progresses they ask for a review, and reward the player for giving a 4 or 5 star rating(these are the only options). Not very admirable practice in my opinion! They have a solid foundation of a good "FTP" game; But seems like they are more interested in making money then developing a desirable gaming experience.
description: The most popular hobby now in your pocket! Start catching fish species in Fishing Clash - free fishing simulator and new 3D game from Ten Square Games, the producer of Let's Fish app.  High time to go fishing! Face other players in real-time PvP!-Be faster and better - catch more valuable fish species -Beat your opponents and win exclusive rewards -Get social and interact with other anglers Enjoy vivid 3D graphics!-Visit great animated realistic fisheries (Florida Coast, Guntersville, Amazon River, Loch Ness, Great Barrier Reef,Mekong River and many more)- Discover hundreds of 3D fish species - Feel the power of professional fishing gear Don't miss time-limited events-Enjoy new content and in-game events every week -Take part in championships-Compete with other players in leaderboardsPick the right fishing gear and get your fishing career rolling-Collect and upgrade lures to reach higher levels-Unlock new fisheries and get access to new fish species and quests-Choose your gear wisely to increase the weight of fish-Get buffs to be faster and more accurateFishing in a truly world sport style!Join the most popular sport in the world with the best free fishing game available for mobile devices! Take part in sport events and fishig tournaments, compete with your friends to hunt down your next catch and reel your big fish in! Enjoy a fishing adventure in the America‚Äôs greatest outdoors and visit stunning fishing locations through gripping and addictive gameplay ‚Äì Catch the fishing fever this season with the ultimate, most realistic fishing simulator app. Free fishing all year roundSummer fishing? Winter fishing? In our free online simulation game you can visit nearest river, freshwater lake, sea, or ocean for quality sport fishing whenever you want to. Whether it‚Äôs the fishing off-season or you‚Äôre warming up for your next tournament, play our fishing game - for free! With realistic 3D graphics, fisheries located in the heart of nature, you will feel like you are on an actual fishing trip, standing on the fishing dock, holding your fishing rod - and fighting with your big fish! Win the struggle with a shark or bass and get the title of a fishing master or fish game king! Fishing rocks! For free! Go on an adventure - compete - win!Fishing Clash is a fishing game designed for those who like fishing adventures, action games, simulation games, competition and outdoors! Practise, take part in the fishing championships and tournaments, score points and become a fish game king. Breathtaking Locations Travel to realistic, beautifully animated locations in nature across i.e. The North America. Start with Florida and move on to the biggest Alabama‚Äôs lake - Guntersville Lake. Your next stop will be Kenai River, the most popular sport fishing destination in Alaska, particularly known for its salmon and rainbow trout. Will you be able to beat the world record for king salmon?How many species of fish will you catch?In this 3D fishing simulator game you can catch various species of fish like catfish, bass, crappie, sunfish, trout, salmon, barracuda or even a shark and whale! Aim for the rare boss fish and remember that each species has its own style so make sure you‚Äôre ready to pull! Designed with fishing enthusiasts in mindFishing Clash is a mobile fishing simulator of the highest quality. It is a combination of a fishing simulator, outdoor app and sports game. Online game for free - better than any other 2016 fishing game or app ! You can choose between sport fishing, bass fishing, fly fishing, ice fishing and any other form of catching a big fish.
descriptionHTML:
The most popular hobby now in your pocket! Start catching fish species in Fishing Clash - free fishing simulator and new 3D game from Ten Square Games, the producer of Let's Fish app. High time to go fishing!

Face other players in real-time PvP!
-Be faster and better - catch more valuable fish species
-Beat your opponents and win exclusive rewards
-Get social and interact with other anglers

Enjoy vivid 3D graphics!
-Visit great animated realistic fisheries (Florida Coast, Guntersville, Amazon River, Loch Ness, Great Barrier Reef,Mekong River and many more)
- Discover hundreds of 3D fish species
- Feel the power of professional fishing gear

Don't miss time-limited events
-Enjoy new content and in-game events every week
-Take part in championships
-Compete with other players in leaderboards

Pick the right fishing gear and get your fishing career rolling
-Collect and upgrade lures to reach higher levels
-Unlock new fisheries and get access to new fish species and quests
-Choose your gear wisely to increase the weight of fish
-Get buffs to be faster and more accurate

Fishing in a truly world sport style!
Join the most popular sport in the world with the best free fishing game available for mobile devices! Take part in sport events and fishig tournaments, compete with your friends to hunt down your next catch and reel your big fish in! Enjoy a fishing adventure in the America’s greatest outdoors and visit stunning fishing locations through gripping and addictive gameplay – Catch the fishing fever this season with the ultimate, most realistic fishing simulator app.

Free fishing all year round
Summer fishing? Winter fishing? In our free online simulation game you can visit nearest river, freshwater lake, sea, or ocean for quality sport fishing whenever you want to. Whether it’s the fishing off-season or you’re warming up for your next tournament, play our fishing game - for free! With realistic 3D graphics, fisheries located in the heart of nature, you will feel like you are on an actual fishing trip, standing on the fishing dock, holding your fishing rod - and fighting with your big fish! Win the struggle with a shark or bass and get the title of a fishing master or fish game king! Fishing rocks! For free!

Go on an adventure - compete - win!
Fishing Clash is a fishing game designed for those who like fishing adventures, action games, simulation games, competition and outdoors! Practise, take part in the fishing championships and tournaments, score points and become a fish game king.

Breathtaking Locations
Travel to realistic, beautifully animated locations in nature across i.e. The North America. Start with Florida and move on to the biggest Alabama’s lake - Guntersville Lake. Your next stop will be Kenai River, the most popular sport fishing destination in Alaska, particularly known for its salmon and rainbow trout. Will you be able to beat the world record for king salmon?

How many species of fish will you catch?
In this 3D fishing simulator game you can catch various species of fish like catfish, bass, crappie, sunfish, trout, salmon, barracuda or even a shark and whale! Aim for the rare boss fish and remember that each species has its own style so make sure you’re ready to pull!

Designed with fishing enthusiasts in mind
Fishing Clash is a mobile fishing simulator of the highest quality. It is a combination of a fishing simulator, outdoor app and sports game. Online game for free - better than any other 2016 fishing game or app ! You can choose between sport fishing, bass fishing, fly fishing, ice fishing and any other form of catching a big fish.

comments: I love to play hold em, but it's just to hard to round up the posse for poker night due to simply getting older. Life takes everyone n different directions. Not too mention, having kids and getting married, doing the family thing. Don't get me wrong, I absolutely love living the family life with my wife and kids but I will always miss poker night with the fellas. Now that I have stumbled upon WSOP I have been able to invite all of the fellas to join and we can all play together still once again. THANK U!!!!

Seen to many players leave because of this. Players with over a billion in chips. Goes to a small table with players having 30k or 40k. Goes all in every hand and kills the table. Players ask him why he does it and not play bigger tables. His answer because game allows me to and I can knock out player after player. Regulate players if they have X amount of chips play on bigger tables. Let the smaller players gain chips and enjoy the game.

It appears that I have reached a certain point where my free play is being met with bot resistance. I've gained over ten million in one day and lost it all and more in suck outs. This game is super fun whilst the going is good, but I fear the algorithms are programmed to entice you to pay real money, which of course you'd have to be mental to do once you realise how loaded this game is. Play for free = fun

Win a bit and loose everything in a few hands...  Once you win a good hand, leave the table.  Dealer will not give a a chance.  After this review, I received an e-mail from the designer assuring me, that game is fair.  I have been losing several hands with pocket KK, QQ, JJ, and so for.  So I stand with my original review.   Win on a good hand and leave game.  Or else you will lose it ALL!

This is a good game , only prob I have is there seems to some hackers/botting which makes it a little hard to play. Now as far as some people's comments even if the  people with a billion chips come to smaller tables , if you all knew how to play you wouldn't have to worry about them taking your chips. Trust me the majority of them started out at low tables also having to have to fight the ones with more money. I have been playing this game for a few years and love it.  Like I said only problem I have is to many bots/hackers.

I really enjoy this game .At first I just added it for one of the games on app like to gain points for gift cards.And of course to learn how to play poker. Now if their no points given for this game I would still play it. I totally enjoy this game , and the people that play it. Its truly an enjoyable game. This game is a keeper know matter what.tthe only thing I wish is that their was more coins given .

comments: I've been playing this game for a long time now, and I have to say, I didn't have high hopes when I started. 30 minutes in, I couldn't stop and I wanted to play more. It's a different take on a Final Fantasy game, and it really does feel like a Dissidia game in RPG form. The bravery and HP system is very interesting, and I'm always looking forward for new characters and their few, but unique, special abilities. TL;DR Overall great game.

My name is auron I've been playing game since release and I have some concerns. For starters I have 999 all strength crystals. Why is there still events to get crystals? And wakka can use some ability to boost his buff dance. He barely procs.maybe instead of strength crystals you can have key events for summon materials... Love this game btw keep up the good work and please rework wakka!!!!

It's liked someone finally thought "hey,  maybe people just want a classic ff based game with out to much mobile game bull." I liking  it so far,  leveling pretty fast(well until  the pay wall hits) and the chance of me spend money on this 70 percent. But for real,  4 chapters in still  no Squall ya killing me.

Absolutely amazing. I can safely call this an actual game that you can play. There is no energy that stupidly limits play time, you can unlock all available characters by playing the game, and it actually FEELS like a true Final Fantasy game! I love this game and I am definitely going to spend money in the future to show my support for this amazing game.   However, since this game is fairly new, there isn't much to do. You definitely need to add more quests, more characters, more events, and PvP. Real-time PvP would be amazing. This is truely a spectacular game, and I highly recommend it for any Final Fantasy fan. Also, Cloud is available near the start of the game! Big thumbs up. Please don't screw around with energy Square Enix, please as it is a plague in the mobile gaming business.   EDIT: Please increase the level cap to 99 in the future please. Lv 50 cap doesn't feel right at all. Otherwise, awesome game.

The game is amazing!! However I am not able to play on my Samsung Galaxy 9+ after upgrading my phone and this is truly unfortunate. Are you guys working on a fix? Pleease let me know, will update to five star after...cause I mean at this point I cant play the game :(.

Got this game since launch, but after the 6th days, the game get pretty repetitive. My cload still at lvl 47 lol. The cutscene video could be better because I always skipped it. The casually walking at the start of a video make me wanna spam the skip button. I remember what intrigued me from the old ff cutscenes wasn't about the graphic, but their action pack scenes. RTK just launched (currently #1 on play store). I'll be playing that game instead for now.
description: ----------------------------------------‚óÜ Game Info ‚óÜ----------------------------------------‚óè A Dream Collaboration! Legendary heroes and villains from across the FINAL FANTASY series come together in a compelling story of powerful deities and a world in peril. Fans of the series will see their favorite characters in a brand-new adventure, and newcomers will experience the compelling story, drama, and combat that the FINAL FANTASY series is known for!‚óè Turn-Based Combat with a Twist! Engage in simple yet strategic turn-based combat! The unique Bravery system challenges you to balance offense with defense as you build up your Bravery and wait for the right moment to strike! ‚óè Assemble Your Party! Build parties from a cast of dozens of FINAL FANTASY heroes and villains and prepare them for battle with a variety of equipment and abilities. Embark on a journey alongside beloved characters and encounter familiar faces, summons, and more along the way! ‚óè Play with Friends! Multiplayer quests allow you to join forces with up to two other players to bring down mighty enemies and earn fabulous rewards!----------------------------------------‚óÜ Story ‚óÜ----------------------------------------Darkness converges upon us, and the world crumbles before our very eyes‚Ä¶What was once a sanctuary for the weary has now become a battlefield.Long ago, the deities Spiritus and Materia warped the fabric of time and space to create a new world‚Äîa world they populated with warriors from other realms.These men and women were forced to fight day and night without reprieve, and the strain of endless battle soon grew to be too great.With battered bodies and shattered spirits, they sent out a cry for help‚Ä¶
descriptionHTML:
----------------------------------------
◆ Game Info ◆
----------------------------------------
● A Dream Collaboration!
Legendary heroes and villains from across the FINAL FANTASY series come together in a compelling story of powerful deities and a world in peril. Fans of the series will see their favorite characters in a brand-new adventure, and newcomers will experience the compelling story, drama, and combat that the FINAL FANTASY series is known for!

● Turn-Based Combat with a Twist!
Engage in simple yet strategic turn-based combat! The unique Bravery system challenges you to balance offense with defense as you build up your Bravery and wait for the right moment to strike!

● Assemble Your Party!
Build parties from a cast of dozens of FINAL FANTASY heroes and villains and prepare them for battle with a variety of equipment and abilities. Embark on a journey alongside beloved characters and encounter familiar faces, summons, and more along the way!

● Play with Friends!
Multiplayer quests allow you to join forces with up to two other players to bring down mighty enemies and earn fabulous rewards!

----------------------------------------
◆ Story ◆
----------------------------------------
Darkness converges upon us, and the world crumbles before our very eyes…
What was once a sanctuary for the weary has now become a battlefield.
Long ago, the deities Spiritus and Materia warped the fabric of time and space to create a new world—a world they populated with warriors from other realms.
These men and women were forced to fight day and night without reprieve, and the strain of endless battle soon grew to be too great.
With battered bodies and shattered spirits, they sent out a cry for help…

descriptionHTML:
Mighty Party: Heroes Clash is a turn-based tactical card battle RPG.

Brave Hero, fight in fast 3-minute dynamic PvP battles! Summon dozens of epic war heroes to defeat all the opponents in the turn-based battle arena! Prove your guild alliance is the strongest one in the fantasy world of Mighty Party: Heroes Clash!

Play the troops of Imperial Archers, defend them with Wind Ninja, strengthen them with Magic of Divinity and destroy opponents forces!
Get ready to clash your Mighty Party on!

Features:
● Turn-based & fast-paced innovative battle system. Real strategy and tactics!
● Infinite battle combinations from dozens of war heroes.
● Epic Warlords with unique battle skills.
● Captivating PVP (Ranked Battles, Brawl, Arena matches, Tournaments, Survival, Raids, Events etc.) with great epic rewards!
● Single player campaign with an epic story of through the realm. A true hero’s Journey!
● Turf Wars is a game mode where your guild alliance fights using their troops against opponents for the most valuable territories. Prepare the Guild for glory!
● Lots of ways to evolve mighty heroes: level-up them, bind them with others, turn them into Legendary ones, upgrade skills in Turf Wars!

Defeat others in online PvP -> Receive Magical and Legendary Chests -> Recruit and Evolve new battle Heroes -> Gather your MIGHTY PARTY -> Clash with other players in PVP -> Join the strongest Guild Alliance -> Be no. 1!
Assemble your forces and lead your Mighty Party to victory!

Note:
Mighty Party: Heroes Clash is free to download and play, however, some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you do not want to use this feature, please set up password protection for purchases in the settings of your Google Play Store app.

A network connection is required.

Support:
Are you having problems? Please contact us via e-mail mightyparty.panoramik@gmail.com or in-game by going to Settings > Support.

Visit our Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/mightyparty.game

Big updates coming! Stay tuned!
summary: Epic Warlords & strategic PvP fights returns in fast turn-based RPG Mighty Party
title: Mighty Party: Heroes Clash

comments: Im usually quite picky when it comes to game and this game nailed it. I don't have much time for game and this seems to be the perfect game for me to pass time and no need to overly commit. The game play is pretty creative and if you really think through it, there's really a lot of depth. Also, the developer is not as greedy as other games, e.g. gems and enchant remain even if you change gear etc. In another games, they could easily force you to spend $ to buy protection. Overall a great game thus far.

Edit: I cant login to game, it force closes at 80%.   Game is good, but never had I played a game that very much lacks game info/help details. Like what the hell are pet skills for? And no details on what those skills do. What the hell is pet polish? What is pet transformation? How are runes used? It totally lacks game guides/info and you have to figure out stuffs on your own. Good game, lacks substance. Im already playing for two months and i still dont know a lot of stuffs. Wow.

The game is pay to win(to tell you the truth). But if you are free 2 play player absolutely it will take time and they put some limitation for free gamer, but actually it is a fun and cute game a good game to try. And actually I already spent money here so I am a VIP user. Good game to invest but its so expensive. Hahaha

Hmm, I am a fan of idle games because it doesnt cosume a lot of time and you can play idle for mobs. Tho.. this game kinda hard to level up and requires diamond to level up faster. You cant gain a level for just an hour.. it seems it needs to take a day, just to level up. Kinda sucks for me. But if you dont want to wait a day for 1 level just buy a lot of diamonds and you will reach level 100 in just a few minutes.

I love it especially how I haven't played RO for years. It's very simple and does not consume a lot of time to play. However it lack of items and varieties of things unless you're a cash player. (not much either) EDIT : can the problem where daily quest can't be claim be fixed? Usually it's the send friend a gift quest where I have to restart the game in order to claim it. Sometimes it's the gift box(honor)

Signed up with an XD account I made when starting the game. Loved it day 1, so bought premium, and enjoyed that for ~0.5 days. Second day go to sign in, the password I used that it saves no longer works. I cannot log in and have emailed support multiple times with account info, transaction info, etc, and no response. Practically theft - paid for 90 day VIP and cannot access account and company provides 0 support. 0 stars.

comments: They say its free, don't believe that if you want the strong and overpowered heroes you need to spend lots and lots of money, like 500 dollars and then you are settled, and when you spend less its frustrating battling that heroes. So idea is good, game sucks.

Played this game for about 2 years.  Used to be great until the terrible ucool made it completely pay to win.  They have unbalanced and just add new heroes for $100 a month, ridiculous.  Terrible company that only cares about money, for your sake, find a different game.

Heroes Charge is one of the better games, and does not require one to spend a lot of money to enjoy it. It has a wide variety of characters to recruit and there are many ways to improve your party's fighting power. This is one to get.

Gameplay is fun and easy to grasp. Only things needed is a minor improvement in graphics and a way to acquire more stamina. Always run out of stamina and end up having to play something else while I wait for stamina to recharge.
Pay to win, fun game until middle stages where it one shots your group unless you pay money to get over powered characters. I can't even progress anymore because the boss one shots me every time.

I have been playing this game for a long time now...going on 3 years. It is still an awesome game. For all the people saying it's P2W you are wrong....flat out wrong. Do not blame the devs for your impatience or inability to see the strategy in the game. This game can be completely F2P if you have patience. I do no blame the devs for wanting to get paid for releasing a quality product. Paying for the little boosts here and there give you an edge but give it a month and then the new characters are available through several different means. Keep up the good work!!!

comments: So the game glitched out and I lost graphics, no effects when using skills and what not. Other people in game said they had the same problem and said to fix it, you needed to uninstall it and redownload. Which I did. But now my characters are gone and I have to start off fresh. I've spent money in the game on  building up two characters. And I'm pissed now that it appears its money totally wasted. I feel that this is basically stealing!!

My skills didn't come out when I use it.. It didn't show effects when I click on it.. It still deal damage to the monsters though.. So I uninstall and reinstall it back..  however  the loading progress keep restarting.. I had to again..reinstall the game several times! And it still didn't let me complete the download.. It keeps restarting and resetting to 0%

Since updated my graphics have changed. I don't see special effects and  the cloud tasks when I try do them I can't see the flowers and my character glitches threw the floor. And I also lost a my character after logging out and back in again

This is the first game I ever played that u can have a wedding without paying using real money. I guess its a good thing. But else, why u have to take so much time for maintaince.... And it will be the best game I've ever play if u can add more outfit and character...
Was having good time. Went to log in today and said client error after small update. Now I've lost 3 level 40's and won't restore with my Facebook i used my account for...

I tell you what Dev, i love this game..i never thought im addicted to thia game because of its skills and the gameplay itself. However, after the latest maintainance finish and i download the patches. My skills and my pet skills doesnt appear. All went bug and glitches. Its so frustrating. Please fix it ASAP.i dont care if u gonna make is wait..just fix it please And i will give u 5 star

descriptionHTML:
Daybreak Legends: Origin is a 3D MMORPG developed by a next-gen engine, it will grant you with great fluent combat and exquisite 3D graphics.

The game brings you seamless combat with thrilling blows and various combos! Various things keep you occupied in this game, such as various raids and duels, ranked matches, guild wars, warpet battles and dragon airfight.

●BACKGROUND●
The evil dragon comes, bringing disaster and war to the world. Only the legendary artifact can destroy the evil forces and retrieve light. In order to find the artifact and eliminate the evil, brave adventurers have embarked on a journey into the unknown.

●FEATURES●
- This MMORPG brings you Skywing System, Aerial Battles;
- You can fly freely in a stunning 720 degree panoramic view only in Daybreak Legends: Origin;
- Aerial Battles System takes your battle to the air, ground combat skills and effects will all be mapped to the aerial battles.

◆VISUAL FEAST●
- Stunning 3D graphics and combat effects
- 720 degree panoramic view
- Exquisite character art and design

◆DIVERSE GAMEPLAY●
- As a MMO ARPG, Daybreak Legends: Origin provides intense Real-time PVP&GVG battles
- Summon powerful warpets to battle epic bosses
- Start a romantic relationship and have fun with your friends based on the unique Marriage and social System.

◆PROGRESSION & CUSTOMIZATION●
- This MMORPG provides 4 classes – Puppeteer, Mage, Bounty Hunter and Warrior; and 243 skill combinations
- Customize your character with hundreds of Items, Equipment & Fashion System
- Pets & Mounts System improves your combat power

comments: This game is amazing a full on batlle with strategic ways to beat your opponent. The only thing im concern with is not seeing much to do in an alliance than donating troops. I would like to see a way were you can team battle and get awards but other than that its a five star game

This game is amazing! But enemy units keep getting stuck behind walls Also there are a few enemy lands that are not responding when you tap on them. This didnt happen before.  I think updating attack list would be good. So you could see who you have attacked, not just who attck you. Just  a thought

It's a great game but I think it be better if you created workers and mined,  lumbered, and gather favors or technology like warcraft use to be like.  The commands are also touchy and the battle displays for viewing if kinda difficult to  keep up with. But it's fun and a little bit addictive.

Amazing graphic but really poor gameplay... Even lowest level, it's hard to complete easy campaign. Every win need to paid. Useless to raid... Uninteresting how the mission needed to complete... Disliked this game bcoz of the poor gameplay and the way of how to complete the mission.

Ive been playing this game a very long time now. definitly a 5 star game in every aspect. only issue is.. i spend money on this last event.. 3 raids left to get 14k reward for the 4 star poison ranger.. the bloody game hang again..manage to log back only when the event was over..!!! Now i have this 2 useless relics taunting me.. Almost felt like deleting the game..

One of these game where you need to pay to play if you want to be any good, slow if any support. If you don't have a life, you can get good a this game real quick. If you have low self-esteem, stay away, experience gamers will tear you a new one repeated, makes progressing to new lvls  slow.

The BEST graphics on mobile – You’ve never seen a game like this before! Control COLOSSAL TITANS and THOUSANDS OF WARRIORS in STUNNING 3D wars!

CAPTURE enemy lands, grow your army, and come to fight, because in Dawn of Titans you either GO BIG or you GO HOME!

► Build the Ultimate Kingdom: Clash against the masses, to capture land and rise up the world ranks.

----------

Data connection required to play.

descriptionHTML:
Jaramba är Sveriges största app för små barn och samlar allt roligt på ett och samma ställe! Här hittar ni allt från underhållande film till pedagogiska spel och roliga pyssel i mer än 700 olika aktiviteter – innehåll som motsvarar mängder av appar i en och samma!

I Jaramba finns något för alla då vi sorterar vårt innehåll baserat på intressen. Gillar du att måla? Prinsar och prinsessor? Djur? Eller kanske dinosaurier? I Jaramba hittar ni allt det och även massor av barnens favoriter som Pino, Hello Kitty och Babblarna!
Appen är dessutom lätt att navigera och designad för att barn själva ska kunna lära sig att hitta sina favoriter utan hjälp. Därför har vi även valt bort reklam och köp i appen – allt för en trygg och säker upplevelse.

Hur fungerar Jaramba?

• Jaramba lägger till fler spel, filmer, upplästa böcker och annat roligt varje månad. Bläddra i de olika kategorierna för att hitta dina favoriter!
• I favoritlistan sparas automatiskt de aktiviteter som används mest.
• Du kan skapa upp till tre individuella profiler för varje barnanvändare där var och en kan välja sin egen avatar och se sina egna favoriter i favoritlistan.
• Jaramba streamar sitt innehåll direkt på en android-enhet så appen tar inget onödigt utrymme!

Du kan prova Jaramba gratis i en månad! Gillar ni appen behöver ni inte göra mer än att låta abonnemanget fortsätta så länge ni använder den. Jarambas abonnemang förnyas en gång per månad och du kan avsluta det när du vill. Ladda hem Jaramba och registrera dig idag för att komma igång!

_______________________________________________________________________


Om du startat ett Jaramba Premium-abonnemang via Google Play Store:
När du prenumererar på Jaramba sker betalningen genom ditt Google Play-konto när du bekräftar köpet. Prenumerationen förlängs automatiskt och ditt Google Play-konto debiteras tidigast 24 timmar innan innevarande prenumeration löper ut. Du kan stänga av den automatiska förnyelsen via Google Play > Meny > Konto > Prenumerationer på din Android-enhet. Ingen återbetalning sker om prenumerationen avslutas innan den löpt ut.

Om du inte startade din prenumeration via Google Play Store kan du ändra inställningarna genom Jarambas Mina Sidor.

Integritetspolicy: https://www.jaramba.se/policy/
Användarvillkor: https://www.jaramba.se/villkor/

comments: Amazing. But what's with the guild war time frame to set up team.? You should be able to edit your formation whenever the hell you want, not within a small time frame. Sorry but I live in the US and I'm not going to wake up at 2 in the morning just to set a formation. Please fix this issue so that I may continue to enjoy this game.

This is a really great game I've recently got back to playing this game as their is much more content then before i really enjoy and hope to continue to enjoy in the future. Thoug right now im having some difficulties for some reason i cannot do ninja trial or hunt forest please devs could you fix this or messagd me how to fix this or give compensation please.

The game was great up until today. They did some kind of server merging that caused me to lose EVERYTHING! Wasted all my time and effort. Who knows what happened on their end, but I am extremely disappointed. Should have made sure no one would be affected before merging.

Hey, I can't login with facebook and it irritates me! Fix this problem please! Then I'll give you a five stars, again! I'm a VIP player, I hate my money is waste on something that is not working well! Work on it! Last night I can still login, but this morning was disappointed by it! The login windows keep on closing by itself! Fix it ASAP!

Very good... there are some issues to fix but can be improve... the control icons are too big they consume a lot of space on the screen... please get some idea from a game "wonder tactics"... they develop the game excellently... but your game is also good. In addition  characters are overlapping at the middle area pls position them where they can be seen all

Gave 5 stars as the game said to to receive Yodinme shards but got nothing. I let it go for a day to see if it just needed time to catch up but still got nothing. I would like to put this back up to 5 stars if this could be fixed. Any help provided would be greatly appreciated.

comments: Stuff stuff goody good good forensic anthropology your pizza up your potato juice ham sandwich with homework for your face mouth nose elbow skin football Olympic gold karrot. Tough to install, took me about 5 ham sandwiches until this thing fuannlay installed. This piece of shananagins went down a water stream faster than your baby TV

If you like base building war strategy games then please download this app. It's an game that has constantly going back. Although you have many in app purchases available you can play without spending any real money and be competitive. The developers award you with more than enough items on a daily basis. It's definitely a must have for fans of this game type.

I'm sure this is a fun game, however I do not see the reason why it needs to have permission to manage my phone calls or know my location if I never plan to use any online abilities. That is just too much access to my phone. I did not even get a chance to play the game because it wanted that access on start up; it will not allow you to play the game without give permission.

It's a great strategic game. PvP is more event driven rather than a free for all.Great value for the money you spend whether it's a little or a lot...and the purchases give a little free to your team. Lots of ways to win free stuff and points you can spend on items needed in alliance store and keep up with your wallet warrior team mate. One downside is the support..they can be a little sliw in response time to problems. But they don't just ignore you either.

Why does this app request access to make calls/read sms/messages? Un-installed right away.  Edit: That's not how it works. Just because you say "your phone is safe" doesn't make it safe. You're still getting the permission from un-educated users that you can read their messages. That's very shady.

it was a good game but after playing it a month the server has errors. I lost 50% of my troops in my main castle which went missing, lost 1 m of power, my farms was plundered and troops in my farms was massacred. Reported the issue but they ROK did not bother to give me a courtesy reply so if you decide to play but sure the system does not steal your time and effort playing the game.  Plus the added frustration
description: Our brand new hero system is just around the corner! In the ever turbulent land of ROK war is here, there... everywhere. People are suffering from war and pain. In these, the most crucial of times, a group of heroes must rise up! They are a group of the most gifted people and the most magical of creatures coming! With their tremendous talent, they will turn the tide in battle or play a pivotal role in your Castle development. Choose the heroes you yearn for in the new update, and have them join the fight against you enemies!  The Great Dragon casts his shadow across the land...In Rise of the Kings, players from all over the world battle to rule this new epic real time strategy game online. Utilizing the best of theRTS, RPG, and MMO gaming genres, take your place in this epic war game as one of many Lords fighting for survival in a hostile fantasy world. In this army game you hold the fate of your kingdom, your army, and yourself firmly in your hands. Tap and install this mobile game to train an army to clash with evil in the best online empire game available! Rally your friends and engage in epic clashes against determined enemies and fearsome foes. Utilize clever strategy, superior leadership, and cunning diplomacy, to rise to the top and claim the crown and the throne. Download this top fantasy RTS MMO today on your phone or tablet and begin playing online with players from around the world! Amass Your Army - Gather friends, old and new, and form a top Alliance to conquer the best new war strategy game available. - Build your empire and train an army, then lead them in PVP war against friends, new and old! - Train your army, lead them into battle, and crush your enemies.Explore the Wild Lands! - Stalk the monster clans roaming the lands and dungeons, and kill them to sharpen your skills and claim their treasure. - Explore the dark dungeons inside the Ruins of the old Kings, and face down the Dark Guards to uncover the riches of the ancients. A King will Rise - If you love PvP challenges, then prove your mettle against the best Lords in the Realm. - Grow faster, build faster, train faster, and then put it all on the line against the terrifying Orcs, the ghastly Grimm Raider Clan, and more as you clash with other ambitious Lords. - Do you have what it takes to Rise and become King? Shoot us a message at servicerok@onemt.com with any questions or comments relating to this wicked multiplayer strategy war game. Ask us anything! Also, connect with Rise of the Kings and friends:https://www.facebook.com/RiseoftheKings

comments: This game is really fun, I love everything about it, specially joining in a clan. But I wish there would be a chance to chat with each member not just smileys but as of now it's super great! Really fun to play, this is the longest time I've ever played such a game in my phone. Absolutely love it!

this game is good till about 8 hours in where your waiting days to build anything. Gems are really hard to come by so you have to be wary about how much stock u have. And there's no way to dispose of unwanted items in your warehouse (that I know of) but yeah, it's a catchy game

Pretty much a money pit. It's designed to frustrate you into spending money. Everything takes stupid amounts of resources to build or expand. The expansions are tiny. It becomes impossible to fill orders because they all want items you can't make because you cant build anything. Caravans usually ask for ridiculous amount of things and you have no storage room. Everything takes too long to make or regrow so even if you have room, the caravan times out. And the rewards for filling them is measly. It'll still take weeks to get enough to defeat monsters that block expansions. Don't download if youre looking for a fun game.

I liked this game, and have played it for months, until a few days ago when I noticed the "price" of buildings required to progress take a huge jump up!! I will gladly support a game I like by making purchases but I'm not about to spend my house payment just to progress IN A GAME!! Not cool, and makes me regret the money Ive spent so far. On to the next!!

Question why do I have to give 30 diamonds for one shield? And Everytime I expand my barn it on expand from 5-10 I need more room then that over then that.. I wake up out my sleep just to play this game. I need more space please and Thank u.
They deleted my whole account out of nowhere!  Everything gone. Don't waste your time. And please dont spend any money. Totally rip off!

descriptionHTML:
Welcome to HarvestLand, the charming farm!
Set up a new village, build numerous awesome houses, discover the hidden mysteries and beautiful islands, tame cute animals and fight with monsters, trade with your friends and lead your crew to prosperity.

Grow the best farm ever and challenge your friends!


Key Features
• Cultivate wheat, grapes and other crops
• Raise chickens, pigs, sheep and cows
• Construct sawmills, hen houses, hog farms, mines and more
• Keep expanding and uncover the endless secrets of the lost island
• Trade with your friends online
• Battle with island monsters
• Gamble for winning additional resources like diamonds, stones, wood

description: Simon‚Äôs Cat in Crunch Time! -  a Match 3 puzzle adventurePublished by Strawdog.The devilish crows have swiped Simon‚Äôs Cat‚Äôs favourite Tasty Treats and only YOU can help him find them!Join Simon‚Äôs Cat, Maisy, Chloe and Jazz, and a cast of determined kitties on a colourful adventure through some pawsome new places where Treats are just waiting to be eaten.Be ready to collect Tasty Treats, fight off big baddies and befriend a host of animal critters in this FREE puzzle game with added CATitude!Simple and addictive puzzle gameplay! Connect the same coloured Treats to make a delicious chain!Play your way through the neighbourhood in six different game modes and hundreds of challenging levels!Challenge your friends! Can you beat your friends purrfect high score?Can you beat the villains? Use your Treats and special boosters to fight off Sir Royston the Pug, Mr Potts, hungry hedgehogs and even a treat crazed vacuum cleaner!Play with Simon‚Äôs Cat featuring brand new animationsSimon's Cat is the internet‚Äôs most mischievous cat and has become a global phenomenon. Star of over 60 films, which have been watched over 870 million times, and winner of several major industry awards, Simon's Cat has captured the hearts of a worldwide audience.We are working hard to update the game with new levels that are purrfectly crafted and will leave you feline great!
descriptionHTML:
Simon’s Cat in Crunch Time! - a Match 3 puzzle adventure
Published by Strawdog.

The devilish crows have swiped Simon’s Cat’s favourite Tasty Treats and only YOU can help him find them!

Join Simon’s Cat, Maisy, Chloe and Jazz, and a cast of determined kitties on a colourful adventure through some pawsome new places where Treats are just waiting to be eaten.
Be ready to collect Tasty Treats, fight off big baddies and befriend a host of animal critters in this FREE puzzle game with added CATitude!

Simple and addictive puzzle gameplay! Connect the same coloured Treats to make a delicious chain!

Play your way through the neighbourhood in six different game modes and hundreds of challenging levels!

Challenge your friends! Can you beat your friends purrfect high score?
Can you beat the villains? Use your Treats and special boosters to fight off Sir Royston the Pug, Mr Potts, hungry hedgehogs and even a treat crazed vacuum cleaner!
Play with Simon’s Cat featuring brand new animations

Simon's Cat is the internet’s most mischievous cat and has become a global phenomenon. Star of over 60 films, which have been watched over 870 million times, and winner of several major industry awards, Simon's Cat has captured the hearts of a worldwide audience.

We are working hard to update the game with new levels that are purrfectly crafted and will leave you feline great!

comments: Love playing but have 2 suggestions. We need another mill.  When we have large orders to fill it takes forever to complete those orders because the mull is tied up all the time. Maybe every 40 levels add a mill purchase option. When selling on the market, we need an option for a blind add or a neighborhood only sell or trade.. make these upgrades and so far game would be perfect!

It's great to be able to buy from other farms in theory. But there are WAY too many times that you click on something and it's either sold or not even in the roadside stand at all. The for sale paper needs to update quicker.  Also, it's very hard to accumulate any 'west bucks' in this game and you need them to do almost anything, so the game is a big money suck too. I'm deleting it.

I love these type of games just like hayday. I have noticed it freezes and takes ages to load the newspaper. Also would be helpful if it could tell you who needs help in the newspaper would help filling orders quicker. Also I have noticed alot of people selling the same parts and harder to get others and it's extremely rare to get the land parts without paying

The game doesnt give enough case vs things to buy or fix.  Also have issues with getting product into the alloted spaces.  I thought it was my screen but had it cleaned thoroughly and it still happens.  It takes several attempts!!!  The story is cute.  The graphics are cute as well.  Ive noticed it has a couple of choices from other games Ive played on older phones. I would suggest the game to others but get the issues fixed and itll be a 5star game.

I love playing these games. I'm not sure why we are rating gameplay they offer apps not a game. It's crazy how they ask us to rate game at the beginning of game. We haven't learned the bad points. This game makes us pay for treasure chest instead of giving us to them free like most games. Which means we have to pay for everything. Totally not fair. Takes the fun out of game.

The game itself is fabulous. Cute farm. Good graphics. Good work on that front. Yet being a bit more generous with westbucks in game or making some things more payable with your coins. I get that games don't create themself. But I personally am more likely to pay for games you can actually play for a bit after doing a purchase. And I don't really get that feeling here. But none the less the game itself is a work of art üòä
description: Play a free game set in the Wild West!Build and run your own farm; it takes just 10 minutes a day to make the land prosper.‚Ä¢ Play with friends!‚Ä¢ Grow corn and rye, berries and fruit‚Ä¢ Raise and feed cows, chickens, and pigs‚Ä¢ Build the grill, bakery and summer kitchen‚Äîand get cooking!‚Ä¢ Sell goods from your farm at the best prices‚Ä¢ Open a mine and get gold and silver Features:‚Ä¢ Unique 3D graphics‚Ä¢ Ability to chat with friends‚Ä¢ Camera rotation‚Äîinspect your farm from every angle!On your farm, you can:‚Ä¢ Cultivate helpful plants‚Ä¢ Adopt and care for cute animals‚Ä¢ Construct an original farmscape‚Ä¢ Make dishes with produce you grew yourself, using recipes from the Old West‚Ä¢ Develop manufacturing to get wood, stone, gold and silverThe Wild West awaits you!
descriptionHTML:
Play a free game set in the Wild West!

Build and run your own farm; it takes just 10 minutes a day to make the land prosper.

• Play with friends!
• Grow corn and rye, berries and fruit
• Raise and feed cows, chickens, and pigs
• Build the grill, bakery and summer kitchen—and get cooking!
• Sell goods from your farm at the best prices
• Open a mine and get gold and silver

Features:

• Unique 3D graphics
• Ability to chat with friends
• Camera rotation—inspect your farm from every angle!

On your farm, you can:

• Cultivate helpful plants
• Adopt and care for cute animals
• Construct an original farmscape
• Make dishes with produce you grew yourself, using recipes from the Old West
• Develop manufacturing to get wood, stone, gold and silver

comments: There is an issue that needs to be addressed. My game will kick me out without warning, even in the middle of making a move in-game. This has happened to me several times already and I'm passing thus information on. Please, King Games, investigate this immediately because I enjoy your games and would like to see this resolved. Thank you.

Update: HELP! now I can't do anything whatsoever with other people! I can't ask for lives or send them! It's getting frustrating when I can't even use the lives I've already been given! Why can't I send lives anymore?!  Thank you! For updating the game! I almost uninstalled this game cuz it was taking so long. Hello! Out of levels! Hurry up please! I enjoy the game, but I'm all caught up. I've been trying to up my scores just to have a reason to keep the game on my phone. So far so good. I just started today and I'm enjoying it! Thank you! More recently, I love it! I've been trying to find a game with the quality of King games in this category and no one is a good! Thank you!

Love this game! It's challenging, addictive and beautifully developed both visually and audibly.My complaints would be:   *Certain aspects of the game are not clear, with nowhere to reference. So certain occurrences just seem incidental and therefore don't allow you to fully strategize.   *There are no written rules or explanations to refer to. Additionslly, the game is not customizable. I was just assigned a random avatar (which I don't like) which doesn't appear adjustable.  *It also used my real name to identify in the game, even though I had already created one before registering to King Games. Worse, there seems to be no way to change this either.  If there is a way already developed to address these issues, please help!

I would've rated everything MUCH higher before I did the update. Now I can't play anymore. The words are too faint to see, and the game won't load properly. I LOVE this game, and REALLY want the bugs fixed so that I don't have to quit playing.

The last update was terrible, scores and progress so faint it cant be read, please do something about it, updated again today and it's worse than before can't play the game at all now, going to get rid of it

Very engaging & easy to learn. Bright explosive graphics that are smoothly animated. Great for all ages. Just the right amount of a challenge with levels increasing in difficulty. Practice makes perfect.  Some levels are easy but some are fairly difficult.

descriptionHTML:
Match your way through a cascade of bee-autiful garden levels in Blossom Blast Saga, a fun linker game from the makers of Candy Crush Saga and Farm Heroes Saga! Link flower buds of the same colors to make beautiful flowers blossom, and clear the flowerbeds before you run out of moves!

Match 3 or more flower buds to make the world bloom into spectacular colors. Connect more flower buds to set off a glorious chain-reaction and watch your score grow! Collect every flower and make your way through gorgeous garden levels in this colorful adventure game!

Blossom Blast Saga features:

Connect Flower Buds to make them grow
• Fun game with simple, casual gameplay that’s easy to learn but challenging to master
• Link flower buds in beautiful gardens filled with colorful graphics
• Connect 3 or more flower buds of the same color to link and grow your flowers
• Connect flowerbeds to get 'Awesome Blossom!' and ‘Flower Power’ game assists

Match and Link in a Colorful Puzzle Game
• Match and link beautiful flowers in over 600 colorful levels
• Blossom flowers in beautiful garden levels like Dreamy Meadow, Carnival Garden and beyond

4 Puzzle Modes
• Collect Flowers Mode: Connect flowers of certain colors in a sequence
• Bloom in Scoring Mode: Match 3 of the same colorful flowers to gain points
• Remove Weeds Mode: Link flowers surrounding weeds to remove them from the garden
• Big Flower Bud Mode: Link bigger flower buds with other flowers, or blossom nearby flowers

Collect Flowers with Friends and Follow Their Progress
• Connect to the Blossom Blast Saga leaderboards to watch your friends’ status
• Link your game between devices and unlock full game features when connected to the internet

Match your way through luscious garden stages, link beautiful flowers and connect with friends to share your experience. Play Blossom Blast Saga, the fun linker game where you collect beautiful flowers!

Download Blossom Blast Saga for free and have flower linking fun!

Blossom Blast Saga is completely free to play but some optional in-game items will require payment.

By downloading this game you are agreeing to our terms of service; http://about.king.com/consumer-terms/terms

Already a fan of Blossom Blast Saga? Like us on Facebook or follow us on Twitter for the latest news:
facebook.com/BlossomBlastSaga
twitter.com/blossomblast

Last but not least, a big THANK YOU goes out to everyone who has played Blossom Blast Saga!

Aragon Business Centre, Level 4, Dragonara Road, St Julians STJ3140, Malta

comments: Keeps locking up with a white screen and doesn't go to the spinner.  Also last few days the helpful hints had gone away.  They need to get rid of excellent flashing on screen.  You'll be in s timed level and you lose time because you can't see under the words.  Some levels its ridiculous to have to do them 15 times to pass it

I think there is difference between hard to solve or impossible. To get diamonds in order you should be able to get them. As example. Need to get circle first then triangle. But you cant get triangle unless circle is moved first. And mission failed because you didnt get diamonds in order. This is repeats over and over again. This is impossible to solve. I even had to deal with triangle being right down at the bottom. And all other diamonds at the top. I failed of cause. I am giving my view because I fed up with this stupid idea.

I really love this game. But expeditions are more fun then the game itself. I really wish we could actually finish the expeditions instead , of not getting to finish the story behind them. Also during the expeditions to buy things are way to expensive because the amount of maic it takes to remove one item. Pls address these issuea. Really hope to see some expeditions we can really have fun and finish with.

I love the expedition part but not enough time to complete them. Also i cut one tree down and have to wait an hour to cut another. Its takes to much magic to clear paths.Its hard to build the bridges and stuff because of this. Other then that i have no problem with it.

Love the different puzzle styles that go along with the basic mahjong matching game. It gives an extra challenge to completing each game. Sadly I have only gotten to 250 levels after a year or 2 of playing because the puzzles are constantly rigged to lose. I am not a cash player as I have more important living expenses to spend money on so buying power ups and such are not an option for me. Would be great if there weren't so many losing games one after the other. I'm referring to the ones where you get to the last couple of tiles and the gems needed are at the very bottom so you are made to match the 4th set of gems when you are supposed to match the 3rd set first. I get multiple games where the matching tiles are stacked on top of each other so it requires a shuffle to win. As I said I am not and refuse to cash shop on a game that is not worth spending money as it is not a necessity so it would be nice to be able to progress without 10-15 losing games in a row. The spinning wheel doesn't always have ads available and I rarely get power ups from it. I mainly get paws.

Game updated now havent a clue what i need on level 421 and objects i need are blank boxes can play game but dont know what i need if any one can tell me object amount and what levels they are on it would be a help. Also have uninstalled game a installed it again but still dosnt help.

descriptionHTML:
Explore an epic mix of original mahjong and exciting quests across the Magic Lands!

Mahjong Treasure Quest is not only about matching tiles.

For your unforgettable gaming experience we spiced it up with brain-teasing puzzles and fun riddles, exciting expeditions and challenging quests.

You'll never be alone: little Sophie and her loyal cat Oliver will lend color to your journey.

You're about to:

• Enjoy 2 000+ fascinating layouts;
• Solve captivating quests and puzzles;
• Clear your way from one land to another, getting rid of whimsical plants and building magic portals;
• Collect rare artefacts and gems;
• Restore and decorate your awe-inspiring family estate;
• Set free the enchanted cats;
• Have fun playing with your friends and family.

More features you’ll treasure:

• Regular game updates with new characters, levels, and quests;
• Special bonus levels, timed quests, exclusive tile sets;
• Amazing community and support;
• Ability to play offline without losing your progress.

description: EXCITING 3D ACTION3D graphics and simple controls make for free-flowing and fast-paced hack-and-slash action.EPIC SPECIAL MOVESUnleash each Bleach character's unique special moves to carve your way to victory. Special moves are fully voiced by the original Japanese anime voice actors.THREE'S COMPANYCombine your favorite characters into teams of three. You can even make combinations of characters you would never see in the original story. The possibilities are almost limitless!RELIVE THE BLEACH STORYFollow the Bleach story from the moment Rukia and Ichigo first meet. Develop your characters as you complete quests that recreate pivotal scenes from the story.BATTLE OTHER PLAYERSCompete in weekly leagues. Pit your best warriors against other players' teams and vie for the top spot.DEVELOP YOUR CHARACTERSBrave Souls features a highly flexible character improvement system that allows you to create exactly the warriors and the team you want. Enter battle and earn experience to level up characters and improve their base stats, Ascend them to increase their max level, train them on the Soul Tree to further improve specific stats, or link characters together to provide additional support. The choice is yours!Official Sitehttps://www.bleach-bravesouls.com/en/TwitterAccount: @bleachbrs_enHashtag: #BraveSoulsFacebookhttps://www.facebook.com/BleachBS.en/Recommended OS Android 4.0 or laterThe following permissions are necessary to play this game.Storage AccessPermission: READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGEPermission: WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGENecessary for the game to be able to store game data in an external location. These permissions only apply to Android versions earlier than 6. For Android 6 or later, you can still play the game even if you decline these permissions. Identity (find accounts on this device)Permission: GET_ACCOUNTSNecessary to receive push notifications.Camera/Microphone AccessPermission: CAMERA / RECORD_AUDIONecessary for using the video recording function.-----------------------------------------------------¬© Tite Kubo/Shueisha, TV TOKYO, dentsu, Pierrot
descriptionHTML:
EXCITING 3D ACTION
3D graphics and simple controls make for free-flowing and fast-paced hack-and-slash action.

EPIC SPECIAL MOVES
Unleash each Bleach character's unique special moves to carve your way to victory. Special moves are fully voiced by the original Japanese anime voice actors.

THREE'S COMPANY
Combine your favorite characters into teams of three. You can even make combinations of characters you would never see in the original story. The possibilities are almost limitless!

RELIVE THE BLEACH STORY
Follow the Bleach story from the moment Rukia and Ichigo first meet. Develop your characters as you complete quests that recreate pivotal scenes from the story.

BATTLE OTHER PLAYERS
Compete in weekly leagues. Pit your best warriors against other players' teams and vie for the top spot.

DEVELOP YOUR CHARACTERS
Brave Souls features a highly flexible character improvement system that allows you to create exactly the warriors and the team you want. Enter battle and earn experience to level up characters and improve their base stats, Ascend them to increase their max level, train them on the Soul Tree to further improve specific stats, or link characters together to provide additional support. The choice is yours!

Official Site
https://www.bleach-bravesouls.com/en/

Twitter
Account: @bleachbrs_en
Hashtag: #BraveSouls

Facebook
https://www.facebook.com/BleachBS.en/

Recommended OS
Android 4.0 or later

The following permissions are necessary to play this game.
Storage Access
Permission: READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE
Permission: WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE
Necessary for the game to be able to store game data in an external location. These permissions only apply to Android versions earlier than 6. For Android 6 or later, you can still play the game even if you decline these permissions.

Identity (find accounts on this device)
Permission: GET_ACCOUNTS
Necessary to receive push notifications.

Camera/Microphone Access
Permission: CAMERA / RECORD_AUDIO
Necessary for using the video recording function.

-----------------------------------------------------
© Tite Kubo/Shueisha, TV TOKYO, dentsu, Pierrot

comments: Last comment 2/19 I was in board 1170. Today 3/12 I am on 1240. Pkease fix the boards with the water buckets... The pieces fall on top of each other which prevents proper play. Also, when making moves the move I make is not the move that happens. Also, when watching the video for the xtra coin: when the video ends the game restarts taking me back to tohome screen to press play to enter back into the game.. Thank you loyal player!!

The sound effects of the tornado is kind of frightening but I don't fear because all the characters are near as I ease on down the road. The characters interactions will assist if I follow the yellow brick road. "I can't wait to meet the wizard" I believe I'm going to be granted more golden bricks to extend the yellow brick road. I'm curious like a lion. Lol. The best for the whole family. Thanks!

This is by far the greatest game that I've ever played! A lot of my friends play as well, so I  can enjoy playing for a long time. Caution: Very addictive game!!! I find it hard to stop playing once I start. This is one app that you're going to want to download if you want to have some fun.

I use to enjoy playing this game.  Lately though, there are less power ups to achieve and more of the movie tickets.  I would rather have the power ups than the tickets.  This is why I am changing the rating I previously gave of 5 stars to 3.  Also, you should really have more of the Glenda versus the Wicked Witch challenges.

Great game but I really wish that daily rewards are better. It used to be you would get a crystal ball often, money and other things that to help with game, but lately it has been stuoid little rewards like two coins or one row clear. What happened to good rewards for players that come on every day and expect to get a little help in the game play

I love this game except for ONE big aggravation.   When you win extended life you don't get to choose when to use it.  It starts immediately and sometimes you've been playing to complete a sprint or another section and you CANT play another two hours.   That means you lose that extra time.   Today I've lost a 3 hour extra play and now I'm about to lose another 2 hour play.   Very Annoying!
