descriptionHTML:
Legendary heroes join an endless idle RPG battle that began over a thousand years ago! Fight legendary monsters, enter online PvP role playing battles and end the reign of the Dark Prince in Endless Frontier!

Travel across endless stages of fantasy RPG action with online PvP games, offline RPG guild wars and plenty of treasures to unlock! Upgrade your character with limitless fantasy RPG power ups and take control of legendary heroes in the Endless Frontier!

After failing to defeat the dreadful Prince of Darkness, Erin vows to revive himself again and again to organize the Knightgage of Dimension! Join the automatic fantasy RPG action!

Endless Frontier Features:

1. Idle RPG Fantasy Games
★ Idle RPG gameplay in an exciting fantasy adventure!
★ Lead your knights into the heat of battle and defeat the dreaded Prince of Darkness in epic autoquests!

2. Legendary Heroes
★ Heroes number over 150 and have their own powers – Which ones will you command?
★ Monster trainer – Recruit more than 50 pets to aid you in your quest!
★ Command more than 100 kinds of army units, to become legends of war!

3. Endless Inflation RPG
★ Grow stronger each time you revive with progressive gameplay!
★ Endless levels for endless fun! There’s no limit to the amount of power you can obtain!
★ Level up and tap your way through an expansive frontier of over 9000 stages!

4. Online PvP Guild Wars and Dungeon Games
★ Online multiplayer awaits with endless PvP battles and 200 vs. 200 guild wars that offer endless fun
★ Dungeon boss battles award you with 20 kinds of unique treasures and rare gifts

5. Find Gifts and Treasures
★ Discover more than 200 relics to aid you in your autoquest
★ Get treasure chests in each stage for even more great rewards!
★Obtain gold automatically the longer you stay in the frontier, the more chances you’ll have to tap and find more treasures


Traverse the frontier, take on your friends and see why Endless Frontier is one of the best idle RPG games on the market, today!


■ Rights Information
We request the following permissions for smooth gameplay.

[ Modify or delete the contents of your SD card (READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE, WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE) ]
Use an external storage such as SD cards to save and load game data.

[ Find accounts on the device (GET_ACCOUNTS) ]
This right is need for the linkage and notification between your game account and google account information.

[ Read cell phone's status and ID (READ_PHONE_STATE) ]

[ The approximate location (network-based) (ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION) ]
Use the network/wifi information to provide the advertisement in one of the advertising services because items can be obtained free of charge after seeing it.

comments: This is a great game for any Bleach fan   Don't listen to the people who say developers don't care and only want money... this game was originally Japanese and they are transferring it over to English and this takes time.. this game is great the characters look great the game play is very good and even... lvl system is easy n fun and you get what u put into the game. Yes some characters are harder to get then others but that's what makes the game fun and worth playing.. yes the game has a VIP system for those that want to spend money to get better things or characters but that doesn't mean you have to do it to enjoy the game...

I used to love this game but after two app reset wipes, I'm over it sorry going to brave souls who's with me?! Update: after reaching out to the admins on I was able to recover my data from my Google account. The data can not be transferred from ios to Android but that's fine. Thank you admins, sorry for the salt.

Even though the descriptions and dialogues in the game are bit off it doesn't completely take away from the experience of the game. It still does have some bugs, like the dialogues for instance, but the game is really addictive. It's one of very few games that I've been playing religiously for the past few months, probably longer. That's the one of the main reasons why I'm giving 5 *'s. The game has an ENORMOUS amount of potential, I think if the devs got licensing rights then it would improve the game so much more. One thing I really do not like about the game is that it is kind of a pay-to-win game. You have to spend real money to advance quicker or become stronger in the game faster. Other than the cons, it really is a fun and addictive game. If you love anime, if you love fan service, if you love action games, if you just love Bleach in general then you will definitely love this game.

Not very good it fell short of the other apps...it still missing half the content of the others while making it impossible without paying to collect keys.. shard collecting is lacking ...unless you want to pay for anything halfway decernt gameplay you won't find it here

Been playing for the past month. I've had zero issues that I can think of that I've read others having. It's a fun and addicting game. I can't wait for all of the other characters to be added in, only thing I dislike is wanting to play them but they aren't in it. Though I understand why. Great game would certainly recommend.

Only installing because i spent hundreds in the last one. Devs only care about your money, don't fix or take forever to fix issues, and the game is basically pay to win. Yiu can still get decently for free, but don't expect to get to the top that way. Take the 1 star reviews seriously... A lot of ppl stopped playing because of this games BS...

comments: Absolutely amazing game!!! I'm a huge petrol head and this ticks all boxes considering it's a phone game. Love the controls. Personally i use accelerator on right, brake on left and tilt to turn. Feels bang on. Graphics top notch. No need to spend money to progress. Literally one downfall... upgrade costs when you get higher spec cars. Apart from that... GOOD JOB!!!

Good game, good graphics,good sound. I like that it is on going, not like some similar games. I found it fairly easy to get used too. Plenty of choices and cars. I like that you are not constantly forced to spend real money in order to progress. That is a big plus for us game players. Well done all at EA, you have a real winner with this game. I personally am loving playing this game. Update, I have been playing for a few days now, the only drawback I have noticed is, the game takes up a lot of space on my device. Having said that, its so good its worth it. As previously, well done all at EA.

Excellent game! I have no doubt that the game is one of the most perfect games. Everything but one thing. I just ran one race that comes with the actualization and I won around 5k, te first upgrade for the camaro Nascar costs around 130k does that even make sense. In the real life if you spend that money to make a competitive car to win that money... I hope you get my meaning

The MOST AMAZING racing game in the mobile device. The gameplay, graphics, and the controls were perfect. Also, the tracks in the game were so real like I was racing in real life. I also loves the cars that were added in this game, it looks so amazing. But, what I like the most from this game was online real-time racing. There were no other racing games that has this feature. Just have suggestions, add custom race mode. In this mode, you can chose tracks, daytime, amount of opponents, and also the laps. And also enable to invite friends to custom race mode. Also, probably adding weather system will be better. Last, make the cars could do rev-bombing. So, at the start of the races, you could have some pretty good start. Although, keep it up Electronic Arts & Fire Monkeys. Hopefully, these suggestions could help the game become much better and better.

Well,to start off, game really speaks for itself.Everything is pretty dope. I'm just going to name some things that I'm sure most of the people wants. -Dynamic weather conditions,how amazing snow day on Bathurst would be?Rain,wind,foggy... -Breakable parts, mirrors, spoilers,even wheels,and those should be on the tarmac whole race. -Drift events, I'm just going to say,we all want it. -More hatchbacks definitely,and more cars like its Jeep,or Ford Raptor,and you can add unique cars from movies,etc. -And sprint events,point to point.How fun is that. -More mountains!!! Please. Peace!

the graphic, control, and gameplay is good as always, but the problem is, i played this years ago just with a device with 1gb RAM and i have mid-high graphic setting, but now im running with oppo a37f and i think it can run this game with a mid or mid 2 graphic setting... but no, my game always set to the lowest graphic, could you guys fix this problem? i love this game and i'd like to enjoy it in its best performance

descriptionHTML:
**#1 Top Free App in over 100 countries**

Real Racing 3 is the award-winning franchise that sets a new standard for mobile racing games – you have to play it to believe it.

This app offers in-app purchases. You may disable in-app purchasing using your device settings.

Real Racing 3 features an ever-expanding roster of officially licensed tracks with 39 circuits at 17 real-world locations, a 43-car grid and over 140 meticulously detailed cars from top manufacturers. Plus Real-Time Multiplayer, Social Leaderboards, Time Trials, night racing, and innovative Time Shifted Multiplayer™ (TSM) technology, allowing you to race anyone, anytime, anywhere.

**This is a resource-intensive game featuring extremely high quality visuals. Please make sure you have at least 1.5GB of free space on your device.**

PRAISE FOR REAL RACING 3
“Feels a full generation ahead of the competition” (IGN, 9.1/10, Editors’ Choice)
“A stunning visual masterpiece on mobile” (Touch Arcade)
“Sets the new standard on mobile for racing games” (Pocket Gamer, 9/10, Gold Award)

REAL CARS
Take the wheel of over 140 intensely detailed vehicles from iconic manufacturers like Ford, Ferrari, Lamborghini, Aston Martin and Mercedes-Benz and test your skills on an authentic 43-car race grid – the most epic racing experience on any handheld.

REAL TRACKS
Burn rubber on a full lineup of 17 real tracks in multiple configurations from top worldwide locations, including Silverstone, Hockenheimring, Le Mans, Dubai Autodrome and many more.

REAL PEOPLE
Go bumper to bumper with friends and rivals in global 8-player, cross-platform, real-time racing with drafting. Or drop into any race to challenge their AI-controlled versions in Time-Shifted Multiplayer™.

MORE CHOICES THAN EVER
Compete in over 4,000 events including Cup races, Eliminations and Endurance challenges. Choose from a wide range of upgrades to maximize your car’s performance. Customize your car with a huge collection of paints, vinyls and rims. View the action from a variety of camera angles, tweak the HUD and fine-tune the controls to your personal preference.

THE PREMIER RACING EXPERIENCE
Powered by the remarkable Mint™ 3 Engine, Real Racing 3 features detailed car damage, fully functioning rear view mirrors, and dynamic reflections for truly HD racing. Enjoy a rich, next-gen game with the most advanced cross-platform social and competitive racing community ever. Real Racing 3 delivers it all and pushes the boundaries with every update.

Welcome to the definitive racing experience.
__

Visit https://help.ea.com/ for assistance or inquiries.

EA may retire online features and services after 30 days’ notice posted on www.ea.com/1/service-updates

Important Consumer Information: requires a persistent Internet connection (network fees may apply);Requires acceptance of EA’s Privacy & Cookie Policy and User Agreement.

‚Ä¢ Take on three all-new NASCAR limited-time series, featuring the NASCAR 2018 Chevy Camaro, Toyota Camry, and Ford Fusion
‚Ä¢ Bring the 2017 Aston Martin Vantage GTE to your garage in an all-new special event
‚Ä¢ Earn the 2017 Chevrolet Camaro SS and the SPADA Codatronca Barchetta in two limited-time series
Plus, celebrate our fifth birthday with a special surprise. Start racing now!

title: Real Racing  3

comments: It's unfair when your coins got stolen when you are online, the moment I wanted to upgrade my coins are all suddenly gone, this is frustrating! I'm okay with pigggbank because I can see player's online around my board, atleast I can prepare myself, but NO, it's just suddenly gone like that, not cool! And it even took 80-90% of your savings, much wow...

Fun game, but can get very frustrating cause Peeps steal your stuff before you can upgrade cause you ran out of rolls, which makes you want to spend money, 4 rolls an hour is a bit crazy, but I guess it works in making you want to spend money. It's free to play but it'll be difficult. But the game is fun when things are going right

I emailed support and they have yet to get back to me. Trying to get idols to get the special dice and every box is repetitive even when I use gems to open gold box for rare ones, it's always repetitive. When you offer suggestions as they request for better game play they brush it off and just say that the problem you are having is part of the game. Why ask for suggestions when they are not listened to. Very disappointed in support, been a long time player since it came out. They seem to be all about making money now and could care less about their players.

It's not a bad game, I would recommend that you turn OFF notifications because it will KEEP telling you that you have full rolls then when you open the game you only have 10. The figures never add up but it's fun from time to time.

I love it! Play it when I wake up and before I go to sleep üòÇ although they say the dice are random they clearly aren't, I know when there is 3 spaces to the police car I will roll a 3 and land on it.  Dice rolls need to regenerate faster tho
I really like the game but it's takes ages just to get rolls and then working a minute they're gone.the  you have to wait another hour. Need more rolls to keep people interested.

descriptionHTML:
Hello and welcome to Board Kings!
Get Ready for the Holidays with Google Play’s Festive Updates!
Join your friends and family in the new and exciting free online multiplayer board game!

Meet your board! Choose your idol and throw the dice!
Build the greatest city for your bunnies!

Throw the dice and earn coins as you go!
The dice will determine where you go! You decide what to do with your coins!
If you’re lucky you’ll land on the bonus tiles and win awesome rewards and boosts!
But remember, it’s not all about luck, it’s about strategy and skill.

Build up your city!
Use the coins to build and develop your city! Climb up the leaderboard by expanding your bunny population. The more you build, the more bunnies you will have!
Build the most amazing thriving city of all time!
The more you build, the bigger the board will become!

Protect Your Board!
To protect your city from strangers and other unwelcomed mischiefs you need to land on the police station! Upgrade the police station to deploy more police cars!

Steal From Your Friends
Win your friends’ coins by landing on the Steal tile! Didn’t find the richest city? No worries! You’ll win other people’s coins as well!

Win Bonus Features!
Land on the bonus tile and win special features for your board! Extra coins! Extra police cars! It’s always a win to have more than your friends!

Visit your Friends’ Boards!
Hop on the train and choose the friend you miss the most! You can also pay a visit to others who were at your board.
While visiting your friends’ city you can throw the dice and:
*** Own your friends’ buildings! ***
*** Destroy others’ cities! ***

*** Steal coins by breaking others’ piggy banks! ***
Watch out for the police! Or you might get thrown in jail! To be freed you’ll need to throw a double or pay the fine!

Become the Board King, now! It’s free-to-play, but you can also purchase additional items with real money. If you don’t want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases in your device’s settings.
Any Suggestions or new ideas? Experiencing any problems? We love our players! You can reach out to our support team from inside the game!
Your board awaits!
developerAddress:
Jelly Button Games
Kibutz Galuyot 23
Tel Aviv
Israel
recentChanges: Gem shortcuts! Out of coins and need to fix a building or complete that final quest?
No worries, more Quests can now be completed with gems!
Also, this update has a secret unique feature for each board that will be revealed soon... shhh.., it‚Äôs a secret.
summary: Meet your Board, Roll Your Dice, Build BuildingsA Board Game with a Twist
title: Board Kings

comments: This is the best game i could find on the app store, me being a fan of space x and NASA this is amazing! But however the microtransactions changed the game for me. I feel like everyone should get access to these parts, but however those can purchase the premium version of the game cam get early access, supported the development team and the owner as a lot of great work goes into this game, and you only need a few minutes into the game to show how much detail is put in.

This game was absolutely perfect and was very much enjoyable, but now to unlock the full experience you have to pay. One of the reasons I enjoy this game and recommended it to my friends is because it is one of the only games that isn't locked behind a paywall. Overall, I have had countless hours playing this game, and trying to land on everything and return successfully. Instead of the microtransaction, why not institute a merit-based system for unlocking parts?

Very great!  Here are a few suggestion from me to make your game more enjoyable :)  1. Can you please make the earth scale correctly because its diameter is around 12.000 km and moon orbit is around 380.000 km  2. Please make a smaller powerful engine like the 9 engines of the falcon 9  3. Please make a button that is simple to cycle from another rocket to another one to ease the attempt of landing a booster  4. Please add an ocean on the earth for some splashdown  5. The last one. Im a free 2 play player and i cant enjoy a majority of the new update :*(

This game is awsome. Loads of fun. Told my friends about it. Could you add a free sandbox mode and more free parts. Thanks. Keep up the good work. Shouldn't have added micro transactions. It just ruined the game for me. Had to take it from a 5 star to a 3 star. Please bear this comment in mind for future updates. This game was 100% free when i downloaded it in december last year. Since then, you added a new build system, free parts which make the game absolutely amazing, and then you add pay for parts. Thats just buzzkill.

Very fast and simple rocket building and great graphics. I wish there was a sandbox mode with infinite fuel. Also there is no indication for loading screens when you hit the launch button. Somethimes you think you tapped the button and end up sitting there for a minute or two wasting time.  Edit So glad they made a small payment option. Well worth the money and glad to support

Great!  Only thing I miss is the ability to rendezvous and dock with another object.  In a moon landing, you could leave a stage in lunar orbit and pick it up for the outbound burn.  Also, karman line should be 100 km??  Edit:. Great updates.  I have no idea how to use docking to reattach parts that have been undocked though.
description: This is a game about building your own rocket from parts and launching it to explore space!‚Ä¢ Realistically scaled planets, with some up to hundreds to kilometers in size, and million of kilometers of space between them.‚Ä¢ Realistic orbital mechanics‚Ä¢ Open universe, if you see something in the distance, you can go there, no limits, no invisible walls.Current planets and moons:‚Ä¢ Venus ( A planet with a extremely dense atmosphere)‚Ä¢ Earth ( Our home, our pale blue dot)‚Ä¢ Moon ( Our celestial neighbour)‚Ä¢ Mars ( The red planet with a thin atmosphere)‚Ä¢ Phobos ( Mars inner moon, with rough terrain and low gravity)‚Ä¢ Deimos ( Mars outer moon, with a extremely low gravity and a smooth surface)Discord: https://discord.gg/v8u5Y9CVideo tutorials: Lift off tutorial: https://youtu.be/vPbPrbR0qcQMoon landing: https://youtu.be/5RgPDlBNaN8
descriptionHTML:
This is a game about building your own rocket from parts and launching it to explore space!

• Realistically scaled planets, with some up to hundreds to kilometers in size, and million of kilometers of space between them.
• Realistic orbital mechanics
• Open universe, if you see something in the distance, you can go there, no limits, no invisible walls.

Current planets and moons:
• Venus ( A planet with a extremely dense atmosphere)
• Earth ( Our home, our pale blue dot)
• Moon ( Our celestial neighbour)
• Mars ( The red planet with a thin atmosphere)
• Phobos ( Mars inner moon, with rough terrain and low gravity)
• Deimos ( Mars outer moon, with a extremely low gravity and a smooth surface)

Discord: https://discord.gg/v8u5Y9C

Video tutorials:
Lift off tutorial: https://youtu.be/vPbPrbR0qcQ
Moon landing: https://youtu.be/5RgPDlBNaN8
developerAddress: Leona Zalaznika 4 Maribor
recentChanges: Added: Fairings, Probes, RCS, Solar panels and one new engine [Free].
Increased build space height by 2 [Free].
Added option to get a parts extension with: Docking, Rovers and Big parts and Extra build space (The extension also includes ALL future parts), I really tried to make this the best deal I can :P
Quick fix: Fixed problem with purchase, if your problem is still there, try restarting or reinstalling.
Major performance improvements.
Added clear all debris button.
summary: Space has never been this easy, or this hard!
title: Spaceflight Simulator

comments: With daily events and online 3v3 matches; not to mention the addicitve meat farm and egg hatching. It's another GREAT game for the digimon fans, both new and old, to enjoy!   On a side note: I do wish they would add abit more to/continue the "story mode" but add abit of a cpu challenge to it.

I love this game, I've been on almost everyday. It looks great, there are many Digivolution paths to take, and battling is a ton of fun. My only real complaint is the chat.. my friend and I use a private chat to talk all the time while waiting for stamina to recharge, but it's pretty buggy, censoring a lot of really common, non offensive words like anything with an "ho" or "is", and for some reason the word "ready" is censored too.. if this could be fixed, it would be great.

It's a good game, really easy to play and yoy get the hang off it but one of my biggest complaint is the grind! The whole game is about grinding to get good digimon but the drop rates are so freaking low! The game would be more enjoyable if the rates were higher. I don't want to be spending so much time for me to save up stamina just for me to use it in seconds and get nothing. Hopefully they change it if not then this game is probably going to be forgotten soon

Great works. As a big fan im really looking forward if Bandai can also bring back the classic old school dot digivice game into modern one. Not mmorpg.. But just that classic nostalgic dot nostalgic game. I really like digimon unlimited that a fan made before where we raise one digimon in many ways. Too bad its not bandai work. I definitely play if u make one

The games is really fun and i love how the systems work. There are some issues however, for example WAY WAY WAY too grindy. Thats the biggest because during events you have to commit your life to the game to progress your gamestate. Additionally if you use stones in someone else's hosted co-op game they're gone despite it not being your fault and with the tiny amount of stones you get after 3 10 captures it adds up. Needs reworks but is good over all.

Most people will say that it is kinda hard to get to mega. And I think they got a point but well in my own oppinion, this game comes with its own strength and weakness. I manage to get my rosemon and wargreymon and now I'm working on my taomon. My point is. This game is good overall but it can be better if there are feature that we can do to enhance our interaction with other player. A clan or guild or something like that. Keep ap the good work and I'm looking forward to the next update.

Lead your Digimon to victory as you make use of their Leader Skills, Signature Skills and Legacy Skills! With an awareness of their Attributes and Resistances overwhelm your foes.

comments: The BEST BINGO GAME, in the Google Play Store. Others are too cutesy or childlike. While others  take you for a bank.  Wanting you to buy this and that or add a monthly subscription. With Bing by IGG, you can make additional purchases of coins, but they don't make the purchase mandatory in order to win a bingo!  I also like the different games they offer, so you won't get bored.

Been a favorite since I began phone games 3 years ago. I shared that in 2016. Update 12/17. There are a lot of liar reviews on the other Bingo games. They are probably friends and family of employees. How much they like them !  This is by far my favorite. I've tried them all n going to check on purchase a good game. This game allows all the perks we enjoy. Purchase isn't needed to enjoy. Collecting is doable. Believe me, you will enjoy this game. Free tournament, perfect speed. Now I need submit reviews for the awful games like Bingo Craze !  I played 1 tournament game. It didn't say it cost. That was the only game I could play without purchase.

Probably the only player that has played for 5 hours and not had a win, looks like if I want to play this free game, I will have to spend money to continue. Dont think so, as the game dosnt merit payments
I loved this game. But when you passed all the challenges it gets boring. My game reset so now I'm addicted again.. would love for them to do more updates and challenges....
It's too hard to get gems,  I don't want to have to fill my phone up with apps I don't play,  it take stupid surveys to just get a few gems. Ridiculous!

Rated the game 5 stars in the beginning basically because it forces you too even before you can play. But I take them all back the fact your app has no contact help even though you have a contact button is a minus. Why have it just to send people to a page saying it doesn't exist anymore? And the fact I can get  no help or info on how to transfer a game or other device is a big NO. If I could I would give the app 0 stars,but we'll stick with 1.

descriptionHTML:
***The Best Bingo Experience for FREE!***

Bingo by IGG combines HD graphics, tons of Collectibles and fun-packed Bingo action to bring you hours of fun! Play across the globe at famous landmarks with millions worldwide! With wild Boost items, special rooms, engaging Bonus Games, and fun-packed Slots, Bingo by IGG is sure to be your No. 1 bingo stop! Join the fun today!

comments: I really enjoy this game has been the only game that has kept my attention for more than a week. Working on week 3 now, most of the game is free but if you want to grow your port quickly than you will need to play into the game. The game really starts to slow down after level 50, I'm up in the high 60 levels now. I do really enjoy all the quests and they do add bonus quests from time to time to help build up your port.

A fun, easy-going game. No crazy-pace required and easy to advance.  The amount of unique ships is crazy, I think only fan of nautical history would really enjoy this aspect. The list of active ships should be available from your town, instead of only from map view. Other than that, it's quite enj9yable and not a complete time-sucker like many 9ther games. Well done.

I just started the game a couple of days ago, but I'm already hooked.  Like most games, you kind of learn as you move along, but a little more guiding would be very helpful. Thanks for making a fun game! I am having a problem getting past the loading screen though. I tried clearing cache, forced stop, delete files, even uninstalling and reinstalling again.

Easy to learn with loads of variables to keep it interesting. Graphics are stellar. As with most 'free' games, there are lots of incentives for you to get out your wallet; if you're as unwilling to do so as I am, you'll have to be patient. Can't fault the developers. Fish gotta swim, birds gotta eat.

If you want a game you can tap on a few things then come back a few hours later, this is it. Not any real goals though so after a while you do feel what's the point but the graphics are good and the events are good too but it needs better goals to help you achieve something. I just do what I want for now. Still play it though

I don't mind spending money on micro transactions if I like the game, and I do like this game.  But the jems in this game are outrageous, if you wanted to buy jems to buy one ship it would cost you $10-$20, depending on the ship.  Because of this, this developer won't be getting any more than the $4 I've spent on it unless they lower their prices.

descriptionHTML:
Behold, sailors! No time for relaxing on the beach! YOUR SHIP FLEET AWAITS!

Do you have what it takes to develop the biggest sea transport business, manage the most powerful ship fleet and become a wealthy tycoon? Try it now! Get ready for an exciting journey through the history of ships! Expand your ship collection from very basic boats to the enormous warships. Build your own port and enter the world of sea & cargo trade!

NAVY FEATURES:
⚓ New content every week
⚓ Build up your port
⚓ Themed events every month
⚓ Buy real historic ships
⚓ Finish contracts from famous sailors and explorers
⚓ Trade with your friends
⚓ Explore unknown lands
⚓ Expand and manage your fleet
⚓ Sail uncharted waters and explore new lands

Start as a little fishing village, grow it into town and continue building until you become the most prosperous port city in the whole world! Embark on a sea journey through the history of ships from the age of discovery to the modern days.

COLLECT SHIPS
Relive the history of sailing by collecting real historical ships. Join the famous explorers in their adventures and finish the contracts to obtain special rewards.

DEVELOP YOUR PORT
Raise new buildings and manage the production of materials. Build a home port of the largest fleet among your friends!

EXPLORE NEW LANDS
Attracted by the unknown? Discover new destinations that expand your world. Sail the seas and trade with materials and exotic commodities.

THEMED EVENTS
Vikings, Pirates, Romans and many more. You will have chance to show the power of your fleet in the new events, starting every month. Enjoy obtaining and trading with a few special commodities, sailing to shipwrecks for amazing rewards and much more!

Do not hesitate and prepare your fleet!

comments: *Updated* I have to disagree with the developer. I have played multiple online games and this game basically make casual gamers/low  volume purchasing players as slaves for people who are willing to pay more. It's just like the same thing you buy an ebay account for 1000 usd . They are anti-bot because they don't want the power-leveler botter to take away their money lol.  This game is worse than those monthly subscription mmorpg or ftp games which required in game purchase to access raid or premium contents. If you do not buy in game currency then forget about even playing. Because the game is all about rewarding the paying players which will level at least 3 to 4 times faster and 10 times more powerful. So what's your role? You are just there to act as a resources collecting point and wait for others to invade you.  My point is they have created a unfair game playing field which purely depend on how much in game items you purchase. Do yourself a favor and uninstall this game. Since the contents are Nothing new and at end of the day you are just there to act as a drone for their high spending customers.
Pay to win~ spends money u will get everything

comments: Amazing idle game best I've found great balance with coins and earning gems without "pay to play for the gems", a couple suggestions are to make perfect clone scrolls more available in the store and add a page to the store one to buy stuff with gems and one with coins, maybe adjust the casino a little so it doesn't land on the same items everytime, add some more characters like movie stars and music artists such as Slash, Toby Keith, Little Wayne, Gene Simmons, Ozzy, ect. Only issue i have with the game is trouble connecting to google play games and a force closing issue that hopefully gets fixed soon.

Things in this game constantly change every week something else gets nerfed or taken away. Constant server problems where you can't log in for hours and when you can log in the game constantly hangs up and freezes with lag. Also for those that buy iap beware cause they also make changes to their game to be able to squeeze you for more and more money.  This company is a greedy leech. I Have made many attempts to contact your company and you refuse to reply.  Your company are money hungry scammers. I demand a valid working number and address to your company so I can get your company CEO on the phone

I have purchased an item but got an invalid recipient error. But the money was charged to my account.  Have emailed them and try to communicate to them through the feedback button, but gotten no reply from the team.  Not worth the money and time.

Great use of famous people, especially "Social Pres"... he looks like an idiot in real life, and you guys have certainly captured that quality. Good difficulty in the various modes of play, looking forward to more. Keep up the good work.

pay 2 win at it's best. stay away from this. it's not that this game asks for money but the amount they ask for it's absolutely stunning. 10$ for 1000 diamonds and u buy a scroll for 1200 and u get a stupid blue hero. a blue. for 1200 diamonds. lol.

Great game to spend hours playing. I love the character's, and the gameplay. Yes, you may need to spend a few dollars to advance far in The game, but it's so worth it. Only thing I dislike is having to wait on timed missions. Only thing I'd add is when you spin the wheel at the casino,  wish there were better outcome odds. Tired of always getting gold.

descriptionHTML:
**** The future of science fiction themed card games has come to the Google Store! Download Clone Evolution to begin commanding your army of clones today!
【Game background】
It’s the year 2045 and on the boderland of South America’s Atacama Desert, a team of expert scientists under the command of the evil F-Tec are presenting their findings of a series of never seen before biological experiments to senior F-Tec officials.
Within the capsule surrounded by the crowd, stands a familiar figure, a clone comprised of the strongest genes ever synthesized in the history of cloning. As the onlookers stare intently, the eyes of the figure inside slowly begin to open…
The news of F-Tec’s success in developing this threat to mankind has now spread to all corners of the world. Fortunately, a former F-Tec scientist has been working from the inside to uncover this conspiracy and has all the evidence he needs to conduct his own research and develop the means to defeat the clones and to resist the company’s evil plan.

【Game features】
● Intelligent auto system: Free up your hands and enjoy the fun as the system takes the strain
As progress continues in the background, put your trust in the game to receive rewards, train your clones and develop your legion on your behalf, even when you’re away from the game!

● Gene cloning: The most comprehensive gene bank in the universe is ready for you to explore and utilize
Clone Evolution’s unique gene pool contains six attributes and more than a hundred genes of numerous historical heroes including Alexander and Pharaohs who are eager to do battle.

● Multi-line development: Equip for clones with chips from our dual system
Receive awesome equipment, special access and generous packages freely to aid you in creating unique heroes with fearsome, unrivalled attributes.

● Immersive gameplay: Endless PVE/PVP combat
Wisely select the composition of your clone army, including the skills that will secure victory and challenge F-Tec’s impending domination of the world! Compete with players everywhere to determine who is fit to lead the world’s fightback!

● Unrivalled aid: Register and log-in to receive colossal bonuses!
Download and log-in to Clone Evolution today to take part in thrilling events and to begin calling your heroes to the ranks of your awesome, F-Tec opposing army as well as receiving legendary equipment to help you in your quest.

HongKong

title: Clone Evolution

comments: Keeps locking up with a white screen and doesn't go to the spinner.  Also last few days the helpful hints had gone away.  They need to get rid of excellent flashing on screen.  You'll be in s timed level and you lose time because you can't see under the words.  Some levels its ridiculous to have to do them 15 times to pass it

I think there is difference between hard to solve or impossible. To get diamonds in order you should be able to get them. As example. Need to get circle first then triangle. But you cant get triangle unless circle is moved first. And mission failed because you didnt get diamonds in order. This is repeats over and over again. This is impossible to solve. I even had to deal with triangle being right down at the bottom. And all other diamonds at the top. I failed of cause. I am giving my view because I fed up with this stupid idea.

I really love this game. But expeditions are more fun then the game itself. I really wish we could actually finish the expeditions instead , of not getting to finish the story behind them. Also during the expeditions to buy things are way to expensive because the amount of maic it takes to remove one item. Pls address these issuea. Really hope to see some expeditions we can really have fun and finish with.

I love the expedition part but not enough time to complete them. Also i cut one tree down and have to wait an hour to cut another. Its takes to much magic to clear paths.Its hard to build the bridges and stuff because of this. Other then that i have no problem with it.

Love the different puzzle styles that go along with the basic mahjong matching game. It gives an extra challenge to completing each game. Sadly I have only gotten to 250 levels after a year or 2 of playing because the puzzles are constantly rigged to lose. I am not a cash player as I have more important living expenses to spend money on so buying power ups and such are not an option for me. Would be great if there weren't so many losing games one after the other. I'm referring to the ones where you get to the last couple of tiles and the gems needed are at the very bottom so you are made to match the 4th set of gems when you are supposed to match the 3rd set first. I get multiple games where the matching tiles are stacked on top of each other so it requires a shuffle to win. As I said I am not and refuse to cash shop on a game that is not worth spending money as it is not a necessity so it would be nice to be able to progress without 10-15 losing games in a row. The spinning wheel doesn't always have ads available and I rarely get power ups from it. I mainly get paws.

Game updated now havent a clue what i need on level 421 and objects i need are blank boxes can play game but dont know what i need if any one can tell me object amount and what levels they are on it would be a help. Also have uninstalled game a installed it again but still dosnt help.

descriptionHTML:
Explore an epic mix of original mahjong and exciting quests across the Magic Lands!

Mahjong Treasure Quest is not only about matching tiles.

For your unforgettable gaming experience we spiced it up with brain-teasing puzzles and fun riddles, exciting expeditions and challenging quests.

You'll never be alone: little Sophie and her loyal cat Oliver will lend color to your journey.

You're about to:

• Enjoy 2 000+ fascinating layouts;
• Solve captivating quests and puzzles;
• Clear your way from one land to another, getting rid of whimsical plants and building magic portals;
• Collect rare artefacts and gems;
• Restore and decorate your awe-inspiring family estate;

• Have fun playing with your friends and family.

More features you’ll treasure:

• Regular game updates with new characters, levels, and quests;

• Amazing community and support;

descriptionHTML:
We welcome you to the legendary world of wise Kings, great Lords and valiant Heroes. Walk the exciting path of a city builder and warlord! Assemble an army of faithful warriors in gleaming armor. Create a powerful Order and demonstrate your might to players from all over the world. Glorious victories in bloody battles for supremacy in the Kingdom and the brutal struggle for the ancient Throne are just a small part of all the adventures that await you in the lands of fearless rulers.

From the moment you begin the game, the atmosphere of a medieval town in an expansive Kingdom, courageous marches, battles and ancient riches will take you on an unforgettable journey. My Lord, your vassals are waiting for your orders!

Throne: Kingdom at War is free to play. You can purchase in-game currency in exchange for real money. It gives you the ability to buy various boosts and items that will make your gaming experience more dynamic and exciting. If you want to switch off this option, you can set a password in the Google Play Store menu to prevent any unwanted purchases.

Game features:
- Access to a completely free mode
- High-grade graphics and sound
- Localization into multiple languages
- You can create your own Order or join an existing one
- Dynamic real-time battles with players from all over the world
- Several troop classes to choose from: knights, spearmen, ranged, cavalry, siege, scouts
- Armor, weapons and other equipment crafting for your Hero
- Numerous quests and errands with valuable rewards

We are constantly improving the app, making it better and more entertaining. You also can help us sending your feedback and suggestions.

description: Welcome to Growtopia, a free to play 2D creative sandbox platformer MMO game! In Growtopia everyone is a hero! Jump into a universe of unlimited pixel worlds, all connected to each other. Create mind-bending block worlds together with friends and fill them with anything your heart desires! There are many goals and an infinite number of worlds where you can create whatever you want with all your friends. ‚òÖ	BUILD literally anything ‚Äì castles, dungeons, skyscrapers, artwork, puzzles - even your favorite movie scenes!‚òÖ	JOIN OUR ENORMOUS COMMUNITY - millions of players are waiting for you!‚òÖ	PLAY THOUSANDS OF MINI GAMES  from parkour and races to PVP battles and ghost hunting!‚òÖ	UNIQUE crafting process! PLANT seeds, SPLICE seeds, GROW trees - find your own way to create rare items!‚òÖ	MONTHLY UPDATES! We do our best to entertain you with exciting monthly updates involving new items and events!‚òÖ	EXPLORE countless unique worlds - you can enter any of them! ‚òÖ	CROSS PLATFORM! Play anywhere ‚Äì on any of your mobile devices or using the desktop client, - the progress is shared!BE AWARE! This is an online game about collecting items ‚Äì make sure to keep them safe  ** Note: This is a freemium game that has optional In-App Purchases! **Note: In-App Purchase, Chat, and Tapjoy Offer Wall options can be disabled in a Personal Controls area in the Options menu.Didn't get your gems or having a problem? Email us at support@growtopiagame.com, we'd love to help!
descriptionHTML:
Welcome to Growtopia, a free to play 2D creative sandbox platformer MMO game! In Growtopia everyone is a hero! Jump into a universe of unlimited pixel worlds, all connected to each other. Create mind-bending block worlds together with friends and fill them with anything your heart desires!
There are many goals and an infinite number of worlds where you can create whatever you want with all your friends.

★ BUILD literally anything – castles, dungeons, skyscrapers, artwork, puzzles - even your favorite movie scenes!
★ JOIN OUR ENORMOUS COMMUNITY - millions of players are waiting for you!
★ PLAY THOUSANDS OF MINI GAMES from parkour and races to PVP battles and ghost hunting!
★ UNIQUE crafting process! PLANT seeds, SPLICE seeds, GROW trees - find your own way to create rare items!
★ MONTHLY UPDATES! We do our best to entertain you with exciting monthly updates involving new items and events!
★ EXPLORE countless unique worlds - you can enter any of them!
★ CROSS PLATFORM! Play anywhere – on any of your mobile devices or using the desktop client, - the progress is shared!


BE AWARE! This is an online game about collecting items – make sure to keep them safe
** Note: This is a freemium game that has optional In-App Purchases! **
Note: In-App Purchase, Chat, and Tapjoy Offer Wall options can be disabled in a Personal Controls area in the Options menu.

Didn't get your gems or having a problem? Email us at support@growtopiagame.com, we'd love to help!

UBISOFT MOBILE GAMES
38-42 rue Cuvier
93100 Montreuil Sous Bois
FRANCE
summary: Growtopia is a 2D sandbox platformer MMO game with unlimited pixel block worlds!
title: Growtopia

description: Heed the call of the magicians guild - conjurers, witches, archers and templars are needed! Monsters and dragons roam the realm, and your friends have already picked up the gauntlet, bow and arrow as well as sorcerer hats to raid dungeons, gain fame, and fight warlocks in the arena against other guilds!Guild of Heroes delivers everything the classic fantasy has to offer, with devious dwarves and ancient elves, nasty orc shamans and troll sorcery, epic action and dark caves, quests and raids as befits the best medieval style RPG in the lineage of tabletop games.However, the epic journey through the huge, colorful game world is not only fairy tales of mystic dungeons and dragons, but also battle against mages in the arena, controlled by other players!In a nutshell:‚òÖ Action-packed fantasy RPG in best game graphics‚òÖ Equip character classes such as mage, hunter and warrior, interchangeable at any time‚òÖ PVP against other teams in arena guild wars‚òÖ Craft medieval weapons and armor with hundreds of combinations‚òÖ Thousands of different monsters from diabolic exorcists to ... oh, discover for yourself!Now, enough of the heroic ballads; grab your wand, sword and shield, and into the best, free fantasy RPG you'll ever experience!Oh, do not forget: Follow the Guild of Heroes Community on Facebook - Events, Fan Art, Guild Friends and Contests are waiting to be explored!
descriptionHTML:
Heed the call of the magicians guild - conjurers, witches, archers and templars are needed! Monsters and dragons roam the realm, and your friends have already picked up the gauntlet, bow and arrow as well as sorcerer hats to raid dungeons, gain fame, and fight warlocks in the arena against other guilds!

Guild of Heroes delivers everything the classic fantasy has to offer, with devious dwarves and ancient elves, nasty orc shamans and troll sorcery, epic action and dark caves, quests and raids as befits the best medieval style RPG in the lineage of tabletop games.

However, the epic journey through the huge, colorful game world is not only fairy tales of mystic dungeons and dragons, but also battle against mages in the arena, controlled by other players!

In a nutshell:
★ Action-packed fantasy RPG in best game graphics
★ Equip character classes such as mage, hunter and warrior, interchangeable at any time
★ PVP against other teams in arena guild wars
★ Craft medieval weapons and armor with hundreds of combinations
★ Thousands of different monsters from diabolic exorcists to ... oh, discover for yourself!

Now, enough of the heroic ballads; grab your wand, sword and shield, and into the best, free fantasy RPG you'll ever experience!

Oh, do not forget: Follow the Guild of Heroes Community on Facebook - Events, Fan Art, Guild Friends and Contests are waiting to be explored!

description: One body is nobody! Gather your bros and kick the living heck out of tyrannical Autocrat's armadas in a series of breathtaking aerial battles! The enemy outnumbers you, but you're never alone -- the unique co-op mode allows you to join forces with either your bro or a new friend! Shooting never ends.With a broad range of aircraft and upgrades to choose from, a variety of missions and challenges, Hawk is a good ol' adrenaline overdose. There's absolutely no way you'll ever get bored! So be ready to attack.Maniac bros will help you choose the best guns and surprise the enemies with destructive missiles. Keep your strongest weapons reloaded to deliver a crucial strike to the enemies‚Äô fighter jets. True bullet hell where metal melts.‚Äì Exciting campaign: more than 190 levels full of enemies and breathtaking action!‚Äì Unique co-op multiplayer: team up with your battle brothers to overcome challenges or join forces with random players for even more fun!‚Äì Additional modes: Arcade, Team-up and Assault, each of them radically changing the gameplay!‚Äì Perfect Shoot ‚Äòem up: Lots of fighter jets, battle companions, ammunition and guns, and devices to choose from: your personal armory is packed with hi tech!.‚Äì Huge bosses: battle and defeat enemies that are so big they don't even fit the screen! And wipe out swarms of their minions! Find pieces of the Danmaku barrage of bullets. ‚Äì Great visuals: Tired of space and lasers? Try out flying! Amazing 3d graphics will make you forget that this game genre is old school. Vertical shooters have never been better. Epic sky wars are full of excitement. Choose your ¬´phoenix¬ª and free the country from invaders. The symphony of air war and heroes' charisma are unforgettable!‚Äì Retro modernized: Played Shmup (STG) games before? Think this is retro? We prove you are wrong. This top-down shooter will make you say ¬´wow¬ª and revive the best impressions of your scroll childhood. No matter you are a fan of Strikers, Tyrian, Ace Squad, Razor or Airborn or you participated in battle actions in 1945. You will become the fan of our freedom squadron!  Take your Broforce to victory. Feel the bullet force.
descriptionHTML:
One body is nobody! Gather your bros and kick the living heck out of tyrannical Autocrat's armadas in a series of breathtaking aerial battles! The enemy outnumbers you, but you're never alone -- the unique co-op mode allows you to join forces with either your bro or a new friend! Shooting never ends.
With a broad range of aircraft and upgrades to choose from, a variety of missions and challenges, Hawk is a good ol' adrenaline overdose. There's absolutely no way you'll ever get bored! So be ready to attack.
Maniac bros will help you choose the best guns and surprise the enemies with destructive missiles. Keep your strongest weapons reloaded to deliver a crucial strike to the enemies’ fighter jets. True bullet hell where metal melts.

– Exciting campaign: more than 190 levels full of enemies and breathtaking action!
– Unique co-op multiplayer: team up with your battle brothers to overcome challenges or join forces with random players for even more fun!
– Additional modes: Arcade, Team-up and Assault, each of them radically changing the gameplay!
– Perfect Shoot ‘em up: Lots of fighter jets, battle companions, ammunition and guns, and devices to choose from: your personal armory is packed with hi tech!.
– Huge bosses: battle and defeat enemies that are so big they don't even fit the screen! And wipe out swarms of their minions! Find pieces of the Danmaku barrage of bullets.
– Great visuals: Tired of space and lasers? Try out flying! Amazing 3d graphics will make you forget that this game genre is old school. Vertical shooters have never been better. Epic sky wars are full of excitement. Choose your «phoenix» and free the country from invaders. The symphony of air war and heroes' charisma are unforgettable!
– Retro modernized: Played Shmup (STG) games before? Think this is retro? We prove you are wrong. This top-down shooter will make you say «wow» and revive the best impressions of your scroll childhood. No matter you are a fan of Strikers, Tyrian, Ace Squad, Razor or Airborn or you participated in battle actions in 1945. You will become the fan of our freedom squadron!

Take your Broforce to victory. Feel the bullet force.

comments: Great game and graphics. Need to work on the optimization though as constant crashes occurs. Will also be thrilled to see rework on Yomo as he looks really plain in this game. Character collision and ability lock in also needs improvement, especially those with dashes which will be better to have single target lock in. Overall as a TG fan I love this game.

The game is absolutely amazing ^^ This is definitely one of the better start up games in the app store. I would love to see more improvement with the graphics, load time, and effects. I can't wait to see the characters that will be added next. If I may I'd like to suggest that everyone's eyeball fascinated mask maker be added. Uta is definitely one of my favorite characters and it's a shame Yomo was implemented but not Uta. Many wishes for this game ^^

(I thought this was a high end game so basically you need a good phone that can handle a game like this) im looking forward for better improvements such as more charcaters to come. And much more sfx. Big thumbs up for this game.

Love the game so still 5 stars but would be nice to have to some advance notice with these things.

Ok, as fun as this game is, it has a lot of problems. Severe lagging during missions and crashing, just to name the few. On top of that, lately I can't even start up the game, cuz I get stack on the loading screen before I can even log in into the server. Very disappointed. There's hoping the devs will fix that issue soon, since this game shows a lot of potential.
description: Tokyo Ghoul: Dark War is an anime ARPG mobile game offcially authorized by Studio Pierrot and launched by GameSamba. In this game, experience the original story from Tokyo Ghoul, collect your favorite characters, face exciting challenges, battle together with other players and attend PVP events.- Especially designed for mobile devices!Enjoy a fun and simple mobile operation experience, simply touch the screen and play the game.- Next-gen graphics, delicate music and original sound effects will completely immerse you in the Tokyo Ghoul world!The game features stunning graphics and character skills. Travel through the dark Tokyo streets, Anteiku, CCG Laboratory and other familiar settings from the anime. Original anime clips will be used for game scenes, and the English-dubbed version of the anime will take you back to the Tokyo Ghoul world.- Choose your favorite characters! Select different Ghouls and CCG Investigators to fight together!Ken Kaneki, Touka Kirishima and other popular anime characters will appear in the game. You can choose from over 50 different characters. Even if characters belong to opposing sides, they can fight side by side on your team as you build the strongest combinations!- Multi-dimensional character growth system to develop characters in different ways!Collect, raise, grow, upgrade, equip, and choose different character combinations to make the best team. Create a unique formation of your own!- Rich solo and team gameplay!Besides the traditional solo challenge, the game also offers high level dungeons that requires team cooperation. If you love PVP mode, you will enjoy playing the MOBA mode as well. Call up your friends and fight to your heart‚Äôs content!
descriptionHTML:
Tokyo Ghoul: Dark War is an anime ARPG mobile game offcially authorized by Studio Pierrot and launched by GameSamba. In this game, experience the original story from Tokyo Ghoul, collect your favorite characters, face exciting challenges, battle together with other players and attend PVP events.

- Especially designed for mobile devices!
Enjoy a fun and simple mobile operation experience, simply touch the screen and play the game.

- Next-gen graphics, delicate music and original sound effects will completely immerse you in the Tokyo Ghoul world!
The game features stunning graphics and character skills. Travel through the dark Tokyo streets, Anteiku, CCG Laboratory and other familiar settings from the anime. Original anime clips will be used for game scenes, and the English-dubbed version of the anime will take you back to the Tokyo Ghoul world.

- Choose your favorite characters! Select different Ghouls and CCG Investigators to fight together!
Ken Kaneki, Touka Kirishima and other popular anime characters will appear in the game. You can choose from over 50 different characters. Even if characters belong to opposing sides, they can fight side by side on your team as you build the strongest combinations!

- Multi-dimensional character growth system to develop characters in different ways!
Collect, raise, grow, upgrade, equip, and choose different character combinations to make the best team. Create a unique formation of your own!

- Rich solo and team gameplay!
Besides the traditional solo challenge, the game also offers high level dungeons that requires team cooperation. If you love PVP mode, you will enjoy playing the MOBA mode as well. Call up your friends and fight to your heart’s content!

comments: I love this game. The game gives you a lot of things to do and side quests among the story line quest which I like. Thanks for the fixes in game <3 you guys are great :D

Amazing game. Just started to play a few days ago. Guess you can say im addicted. Uh since there is a kangaroo dragon can i get a panda dragon.

Mist say i love the title screen but that's all I can see since I can't play - I keep getting error 9998 when I start the game. I'm on stable Wi-Fi when I'm playing so it's not the internet connection for once XD
Broken after update. Can't get past second in game advertisement.

description: Become a modern farmer in Farming Simulator 18! Immerse yourself in a huge open world and harvest many types of crops, take care of your livestock - cows, sheep, and pigs - take part in forestry, and sell your products on a dynamic market to expand your farm!You have access to a huge selection of over 50 farming vehicles and machines, faithfully recreated from over 30 of the biggest names in the industry, including AGCO‚Äôs most respected brands: Challenger, Fendt, Massey Ferguson and Valtra. Drive and use brand new equipment and harvest sugar beet, potatoes, wheat, canola, corn, and for the first time sunflowers.With a deep and powerful simulation experience, a vast open world and a wide fleet of vehicles including brand new machines, Farming Simulator 18 invites you aboard the most complete handheld farming simulation ever created!Features of Farming Simulator 18 include:‚Ä¢ Use realistic tractors and trucks from some of the biggest agriculture machine makers‚Ä¢ Plant and harvest six different crops: Wheat, canola, corn, sugar beet, potatoes and sunflower‚Ä¢ Breed pigs and sell them for profit‚Ä¢ Feed your cows and sheep to produce and sell milk and wool‚Ä¢ New front loader attachments expand your options when transporting bales or wood‚Ä¢ Manage AI helpers for better results or let them drive your vehicles to a destination of your choice‚Ä¢ New 3D graphics show even more detail on your machinery and the southern US environment‚Ä¢ Harvest wood with dedicated machinery and sell the timber‚Ä¢ Play with friends in local multiplayer mode for WiFi and Bluetooth
descriptionHTML:
Become a modern farmer in Farming Simulator 18! Immerse yourself in a huge open world and harvest many types of crops, take care of your livestock - cows, sheep, and pigs - take part in forestry, and sell your products on a dynamic market to expand your farm!

You have access to a huge selection of over 50 farming vehicles and machines, faithfully recreated from over 30 of the biggest names in the industry, including AGCO’s most respected brands: Challenger, Fendt, Massey Ferguson and Valtra. Drive and use brand new equipment and harvest sugar beet, potatoes, wheat, canola, corn, and for the first time sunflowers.

With a deep and powerful simulation experience, a vast open world and a wide fleet of vehicles including brand new machines, Farming Simulator 18 invites you aboard the most complete handheld farming simulation ever created!

Features of Farming Simulator 18 include:

• Use realistic tractors and trucks from some of the biggest agriculture machine makers
• Plant and harvest six different crops: Wheat, canola, corn, sugar beet, potatoes and sunflower
• Breed pigs and sell them for profit
• Feed your cows and sheep to produce and sell milk and wool
• New front loader attachments expand your options when transporting bales or wood
• Manage AI helpers for better results or let them drive your vehicles to a destination of your choice
• New 3D graphics show even more detail on your machinery and the southern US environment
• Harvest wood with dedicated machinery and sell the timber
• Play with friends in local multiplayer mode for WiFi and Bluetooth

comments: Fun and easy to pick up and learn quickly. The game has nice effects and a huge variety of characters to play an upgrade. Love the auto play button for when I'm doing something around my apartment. I can still play it but not having to keep my eye on it too much. Music and voices can get sort of annoying but that's what a volume button is for right?

One of the better rpg strategy games out. There's a ton of things available to do if you run out of stamina. The main currency is diamonds which you can purchase but surprisingly they are not that difficult to acquire in game.  Overall I recommend it to anyone who enjoyed games like Fate grand order, syd story and dokkan battle.
Its kinda good, not my favorite but still pretty good. Also, J hate that you took Sayori from Doki Doki Literature Club just so you can have it in your commercial. Talk about copy right.

Game is fun. I like the arts of character, well designed but some new arts like Cynthia looks really weird. End game seems alot of harder, and lately requires alot of luck or money to get stuff like skins etc. Still a great game, been playing for over 1 year.

I used to love this game before a few months ago and was having a blast just playing hours on end until the next daily mission. But ever since the update, servers are terribly slow, game always forces out from time to time. Even despite that internet is at a excellent proximity range, the servers are just terrible for some reason which is sad since as an experienced player who been playing and supporting this for over 1 year, it feels as if it's getting worse and worse with each new update
This game has not fixed the commercial issue. Still illegal. Plus the loading screen is taking forever and it seems they did not like my last review so they deleted it.

descriptionHTML:
◎Game Intro◎
Girls X Battle is one of the most popular anime style games in 2016, which contains hundreds of Anime Girls under master summoners command. Girls X Battle is also a game combined with tactics and manually microing features. Each player has to consider not only the skills composition among Battle Girls, furthermore with enhanced gears and timing on skill casting to conquer tough quests, while enjoying competing with other players in PVP.
◎Game Features◎
★Conquer Your Path With Over 100 Battle Girls ★
Girls X Battle’s biggest feature is that we have crafted our characters into Japanese Anime style Battle Girls, hundreds of them are leading by master summoners. Each of Battle Girls has her own background story and unique skills. If you wish to dominate the world of summoners, not only you need to know each of Battle Girls’ unique skills deeply, but also require tactics and powerful composition to defeat your opponents.
★Real-Time Micro, Command Your Battle Girls To Cast Their Ultimate Skills ★
Girls X Battle has the coolest animation effect on each skill cast, while the facial and motions on each girls are carefully crafted and drawn by our designers. Whether during combat or rest, you can see each girl’s motions clearly from walking, swinging her weapon, even when she is seducing. Under master summoners command, you only need one finger to give them your orders.
★Timing Cast On Your Skill，Is The Key To Your Victory ★
Unlike the traditional styles RPG Game without any microing！During the battle you have to observe constantly, along with microing on your girls such as interrupting on your opponent’s skill casting, change on your skill directions, crowd control skills on opponent’s girls etc. Another feature of Girl X Battle，experience the joy of giving your Battle Girls command in the battle field, even players with lower Attack Power can win against players with higher Attack Power!
★Buying Drinks From The Campus Store, Full of Academy Elements ★
It has been a month since summer recess, don’t you miss the breakfast sold on campus? In Girls X Battle，you may even face variety quizzes as in the actual school. Besides the Battle Girls' world we made, there are numerous tasks await you to conquer. If you favor in PVP, try to fight your way up to the Top Floor!

comments: A great app to download. Great format and graphics. Lots of fun and challenging. Rated everything 5 star other than gameplay. It's good but not great due to the water hazard or out of bounds shots.  Players can hit into the water yet still finish on par. Water hazard should automatically be 2 shots. If this gets changed it would be 5 star no doubt and best golf app.  Single mode would be fantastic to practise

OK I really love this game but all if a sudden I can't play it anymore. I try to set up a match and it just hangs in the loading screen then boots me to the main menu. I have sent 2 emails to support within almost a week and more than 48 hours apart. I have not received any responses. Other than that it is a great game and for the time I was able to play I enjoyed it very much and hope to receive assistance in this matter soon so I can continue to play this wonderful game.

I had to change my rating for this game because I seriously believe it is rigged for me to stop advancing. Everything was great until I made it to pro level and now I'm noticing that whenever I am tied with another player with gems, an extra gem magically appears in the hole making me lose that round. How is it possible that I made it to pro level winning a good percentage of games and now I have played at least 50 rounds on level 3 and can't win a single one?

To many play just to attack your ball after you hit. Regardless if they don't play well they win. A bit eh. The way it's done barely allows you to win. I agree with many others reviews. Something fishy about the scoring system and who you are placed against. Won't keep long if it continues. Could be awesome if it wasn't unfair. O.o

This game is ok at best. More about luck then skill. Fun and addictive, yes at times. Ive collected all the trophies from 3 of the maps and was on a roll. Then out of nowhere a 15 game lose streak. You will get to the point past anger. There are a lot of pretty good/lucky players from around the world.

Overall, game quality is pretty solid. Few graphic glitches here and there but can be expected. It would be nice to rotate to see a better perspective and easier to hit.   One must improvement needed is that when you play a bot, it's way too noticable. You need to improve the bot intelligence! I understand why bots would be needed time to time.  Coins could be cheaper too.  EDIT: Game froze on a Pixel XL, cost me lots of coins! Not happy.
description: Join the most exciting multiplayer Golf ever! Challenge players all over the world!Not just golf. This is action-packed Mini Golf with full of adventures and thrills you've never experienced before!Play on gorgeous courses against golfers around the globe in real-time online matches! Win and collect trophies to unlock top stages. Discover and upgrade golf clubs, balls and gloves to customize your gameplay. Take on the weekly leaderboard and tournament to win awesome prizes and glory. Do amazing trickshots in Hole in One Challenge. You can also play together with your Facebook friends!Firing your shot is easier than ever. Just drag and release to hit the ball like playing pool! Aim and shoot carefully to collect the most gems while taking the fastest route to the hole. You can even clash your ball against your rival's to take out their gems! Arcade Mini Golf has never been this quick and fun!Putt your way through wonders. Golfers' wildest dreams finally come true! Let's ride tube slides, swing on drawbridges, jump over pyramids, explore mazes with bomb traps, and reach farther and fly higher with accelerators and jump pads! Taking advantage of all the tricks while honing your skills is the key to victory!So if you want to relax with a nice PvP game which is easy to pick up, instantly addicting and hard to master, this will be the best game for you. Start your epic tour in the quest to be the next Mini Golf King!‚òÖ‚òÖ Download Mini Golf King - Multiplayer Game for free NOW! ‚òÖ‚òÖKEY FEATURES - Exciting Mini Golf duel in real-time online multiplayer. - Simple and intuitive control: Swipe and release to strike! - Compete against players from all around the world to take their coins and trophies! - Play on 35+ beautiful golf courses with tons of dynamic tricks and fun. - Unlock chests to discover powerful new golf equipment and upgrade existing ones: drivers, irons, sand wedges, putters, balls and gloves! - Progress through more advanced stages all the way to the top. - Get promoted in the weekly leagues to win chests and card bonus. - Conquer three tournament rounds, take mega prizes and be the golf champion! - Sink every putt and get special rewards in Hole-in-One Challenge! - Connect with Facebook to send and request free gifts! - Play online matches with your family and friends!* "Like" Mini Golf King on Facebook for updates and news! https://www.facebook.com/theMiniGolfKing/* You need an internet connection to play this game.* Optional Permissions - Contacts: Used to verify your Google account in the login process.  - Phone: Used to check your connection status to the game.  - Storage: Used to save and load game configurations and caches* How to turn permissions on or off - Android OS 6.0 or later: On your device, open the main "Settings" app. Tap "Apps"(or "Application Manager"). descriptionHTML:
Join the most exciting multiplayer Golf ever! Challenge players all over the world!
Not just golf. This is action-packed Mini Golf with full of adventures and thrills you've never experienced before!

Play on gorgeous courses against golfers around the globe in real-time online matches! Win and collect trophies to unlock top stages. Discover and upgrade golf clubs, balls and gloves to customize your gameplay. Take on the weekly leaderboard and tournament to win awesome prizes and glory. Let's ride tube slides, swing on drawbridges, jump over pyramids, explore mazes with bomb traps, and reach farther and fly higher with accelerators and jump pads! i was very addictated to this game until the last update. i can't even log in to the game, it said "network error", but my network is fine tho. i tried deleting data and reinstalling the game but nothing happened. once i can log in to the game, i can't even play normal matches. and my friendlist is gone wheter it's in game friends or platform friends. hope these problems will be fixed, i really love this game tho, i wanna play it soon :(

descriptionHTML:
Free Fire - Battlegrounds is the ultimate survival shooter game available on mobile. Each 10-minute game places you on a remote island where you are pit against 50 other players, all seeking survival. Players freely choose their starting point with their parachute, and aim to stay in the safe zone for as long as possible. Drive vehicles to explore the vast map, hide in trenches, or become invisible by proning under grass. Ambush, snipe, survive, there is only one goal: to survive.

[Form guilds]
Form the strongest guild and let it rip on the battlegrounds!

[Battlegrounds in its original form]
Search for weapons, stay in the play zone, loot your enemies and become the last man standing. Along the way, go for airdrops while avoiding airstrikes to gain that little edge against other players.

[10 minutes, 50 players, epic survival goodness awaits]
Within 10 minutes, a new survivor will emerge. Will it be you?

[4-man squad, with in-game voice chat]
Create squads of up to 4 players and establish communication with your squad at the very first moment. Command your friends to victory and be the last team standing.

[Realistic and smooth graphics]
Easy to use controls and smooth graphics promises the best survival experience you will find on mobile.

[Contact us]
Facebook: https://facebook.com/freefireEN

comments: There is an issue that needs to be addressed. My game will kick me out without warning, even in the middle of making a move in-game. This has happened to me several times already and I'm passing thus information on. Please, King Games, investigate this immediately because I enjoy your games and would like to see this resolved. Thank you.

Update: HELP! now I can't do anything whatsoever with other people! I can't ask for lives or send them! It's getting frustrating when I can't even use the lives I've already been given! Why can't I send lives anymore?!  Thank you! For updating the game! I almost uninstalled this game cuz it was taking so long. Hello! Out of levels! Hurry up please! I enjoy the game, but I'm all caught up. I've been trying to up my scores just to have a reason to keep the game on my phone. So far so good. I just started today and I'm enjoying it! Thank you! More recently, I love it! I've been trying to find a game with the quality of King games in this category and no one is a good! Thank you!

Love this game! It's challenging, addictive and beautifully developed both visually and audibly.My complaints would be:   *Certain aspects of the game are not clear, with nowhere to reference. So certain occurrences just seem incidental and therefore don't allow you to fully strategize.   *There are no written rules or explanations to refer to. Additionslly, the game is not customizable. I was just assigned a random avatar (which I don't like) which doesn't appear adjustable.  *It also used my real name to identify in the game, even though I had already created one before registering to King Games. Worse, there seems to be no way to change this either.  If there is a way already developed to address these issues, please help!

I would've rated everything MUCH higher before I did the update. Now I can't play anymore. The words are too faint to see, and the game won't load properly. I LOVE this game, and REALLY want the bugs fixed so that I don't have to quit playing.

The last update was terrible, scores and progress so faint it cant be read, please do something about it, updated again today and it's worse than before can't play the game at all now, going to get rid of it

descriptionHTML:
Match your way through a cascade of bee-autiful garden levels in Blossom Blast Saga, a fun linker game from the makers of Candy Crush Saga and Farm Heroes Saga! Link flower buds of the same colors to make beautiful flowers blossom, and clear the flowerbeds before you run out of moves!

Match 3 or more flower buds to make the world bloom into spectacular colors. Connect more flower buds to set off a glorious chain-reaction and watch your score grow! Collect every flower and make your way through gorgeous garden levels in this colorful adventure game!

Blossom Blast Saga features:

Connect Flower Buds to make them grow
• Fun game with simple, casual gameplay that’s easy to learn but challenging to master
• Link flower buds in beautiful gardens filled with colorful graphics
• Connect 3 or more flower buds of the same color to link and grow your flowers
• Connect flowerbeds to get 'Awesome Blossom!' and ‘Flower Power’ game assists

Match and Link in a Colorful Puzzle Game
• Match and link beautiful flowers in over 600 colorful levels
• Blossom flowers in beautiful garden levels like Dreamy Meadow, Carnival Garden and beyond

4 Puzzle Modes
• Collect Flowers Mode: Connect flowers of certain colors in a sequence
• Bloom in Scoring Mode: Match 3 of the same colorful flowers to gain points
• Remove Weeds Mode: Link flowers surrounding weeds to remove them from the garden
• Big Flower Bud Mode: Link bigger flower buds with other flowers, or blossom nearby flowers

Collect Flowers with Friends and Follow Their Progress
• Connect to the Blossom Blast Saga leaderboards to watch your friends’ status
• Link your game between devices and unlock full game features when connected to the internet

Match your way through luscious garden stages, link beautiful flowers and connect with friends to share your experience. Play Blossom Blast Saga, the fun linker game where you collect beautiful flowers!

Download Blossom Blast Saga for free and have flower linking fun!

Blossom Blast Saga is completely free to play but some optional in-game items will require payment.

By downloading this game you are agreeing to our terms of service; http://about.king.com/consumer-terms/terms

Already a fan of Blossom Blast Saga? Like us on Facebook or follow us on Twitter for the latest news:
facebook.com/BlossomBlastSaga
twitter.com/blossomblast

Last but not least, a big THANK YOU goes out to everyone who has played Blossom Blast Saga!

comments: The game itself is wonderful, but I've had this bug ever since Chapter 2 or 3 (I just finished Chapter 12) where when I finish the final level, the screen goes black and won't play the cutscene. I end up having to close the game and never get to see it, then I go into the next Chapter not really knowing what's going on. The story is important to me and it's very unfortunate that this is happening. A fix from the developers or a suggestion on something I can do would be greatly appreciated.

Really enjoy this game.  Just wish we could pay for land expansions because they don't come fast enough.  Running out of room to place everything.  Yes they have the cargo ship but you lose points for doing that.

I play whenever I can. Very Enjoyable!  Love both searching scenes and decorating my island. Love being able to rearrange, and I wish I could move the gifts I receive.  Don't like waiting the 4 hours to regain energy and I would gladly watch ads to be able to fill my energy. It would be nice to have a larger expansion area while needing the same requirements. Love the speciality collections!  Great job!
Game is too slow to progress. You find the clues, you get the flowers but you have to spend DAYS to get stars to progress!
Energy Bar drains too quickly. Other than this very cool game.
I gave 2 stars because the game won't even load since today's update. Fix it and I will consider changing my review.

comments: Flagged by AdAway as bad Adware application. Bad Adware application defined as app that uses for example Airpush notifications that pop up even when the app is not running or SDKs with bad privacy policies (e.g. TapJoy) or even changes your ringtone. Also flagged by AirPush Detector for using Applovin' ad framework, known for delivering AirPush ads. Last but not least, no Google Cloud Sync, poor back button support (doesn't close game), highly inflated IAP prices (‚Ç¨224,99), suspicious permissions (contacts), and spams you with unsolicited notifications (~1 minute after opening game for the first time).
