description: Lead your team of Gladiators to an epic war against the empire in the best strategy game. Build your strategy in battle and kill your enemy from all sides. Face limitless action in the online event game mode. Fill your armoury with killer weapons and upgrade and train your troop of Gladiators with unique combat skills. Do you accept the challenge?GLADIATOR HEROES FEATURES:-  Experience the epic game mode of IMPERIUM CLAN BATTLES. Clans will compete for the DOMINATION OF COLOSSEUMS in an exciting map. Will your clan achieve victory and attract the attention of the Gods? Triumph over your enemies and achieve eternal Glory!- The New Strategy experience. Join the heroes and command this war like a real gladiator. Take your weapons and strike the enemies with a powerful swords, axes, spears and war hammers. Release your fury upon your enemies in war!- HD Graphics with DIFFERENT ARENAS AND ENVIRONMENTS, and a detailed world map to conquer with awesome mission challenges. Prize chests filled with treasure, resources, and awesome new weapons and armour for your gladiators- Become a real veteran gladiator in the ONLINE MULTIPLAYER PVP EVENTS MODE. Take on the dynamic challenge with NON-STOP ACTION against other gladiator assassins. Continuous battles with the best strategy and turn-based command tactics game.- Supply yourself with a HUGE ARMOURY. You have never before seen such realistic weapons in a fight game: swords, spears, axes, war hammers, daggers, shields, helmets, medallions, armbands‚Ä¶ feel like a real ancient Roman gladiator!- Face the battlefield from front-row arena seating. Alternate among your fighters in REAL TIME, and find the ultimate combination to win the war in the ultimate strategy and fighting game.- Take the time to build and run a SUCCESSFUL CLAN with your friends formed by gladiators: sword and shield, two-handed sword, spear thrower and dual wielder‚Ä¶ BUILD POWERFUL ALLIANCES!- Unlock EPIC STATUES to increase your legion of gladiators.- BUILD your own city and defend your base from enemies in the MULTIPLAYER mode: LEAGUE OF HEROES.- Training increases the power of gladiators. EVOLVE YOUR TEAM! In clan wars, your legion of gladiators captures arenas over the empire, gaining valuable resources and prizes from their strongholds.Organise your troop of warriors and start the journey to the battlefield, where you‚Äôll fight in biggest war the ancient kingdom has ever seen. Grow your empire, as the fate of your civilisation depends on its success. Do no let your clan fall in the hands of your enemies! In Gladiator Heroes you will be the hero who leads a squad of fighters through sieged cities, deserts, jungle and frozen fields taken by hordes of enemies, and defeat all kinds of opponents in the war game with the greatest weapons and the best gameplay on the store.The ultimate war experience. Use active and passive skills to eliminate rivals. Stop your enemies from dominating the battlefield in the best strategy game ever!As the leader of your rising empire, you will face the rival armies. Take the control of the battlefield, and become the legend of the war in the most addictive multiplayer game. - Challenging multiplayer mode. Fight against real players and lead the global rankings.- Experience this unique form of strategy game. Destroy your enemies with powerful weapons and your well-assembled team of heroes!- Upgrade the skills and abilities of every member of your band: make them faster, stronger, more lethal. Equip them with the best weapons. Evolve your squad and lead them to victory.LIMITLESS FIGHTING ACTION!Will you be able to annihilate all the enemies in this bloody war? Welcome to the ROMAN EMPIRE. Welcome to GLADIATOR HEROES.Gladiator Heroes is a free strategy game, however you will have the option to buy some items in the game in exchange for real money. If you prefer not to use that function, please disable in-app purchases in your mobile device‚Äôs settings.
descriptionHTML:
Lead your team of Gladiators to an epic war against the empire in the best strategy game. Build your strategy in battle and kill your enemy from all sides. Face limitless action in the online event game mode. Fill your armoury with killer weapons and upgrade and train your troop of Gladiators with unique combat skills. Do you accept the challenge?

GLADIATOR HEROES FEATURES:

- Experience the epic game mode of IMPERIUM CLAN BATTLES. Clans will compete for the DOMINATION OF COLOSSEUMS in an exciting map. Will your clan achieve victory and attract the attention of the Gods? Triumph over your enemies and achieve eternal Glory!

- The New Strategy experience. Join the heroes and command this war like a real gladiator. Take your weapons and strike the enemies with a powerful swords, axes, spears and war hammers. Release your fury upon your enemies in war!

- HD Graphics with DIFFERENT ARENAS AND ENVIRONMENTS, and a detailed world map to conquer with awesome mission challenges. Prize chests filled with treasure, resources, and awesome new weapons and armour for your gladiators

- Become a real veteran gladiator in the ONLINE MULTIPLAYER PVP EVENTS MODE. Take on the dynamic challenge with NON-STOP ACTION against other gladiator assassins. Continuous battles with the best strategy and turn-based command tactics game.

- Supply yourself with a HUGE ARMOURY. You have never before seen such realistic weapons in a fight game: swords, spears, axes, war hammers, daggers, shields, helmets, medallions, armbands… feel like a real ancient Roman gladiator!

- Face the battlefield from front-row arena seating. Alternate among your fighters in REAL TIME, and find the ultimate combination to win the war in the ultimate strategy and fighting game.

- Take the time to build and run a SUCCESSFUL CLAN with your friends formed by gladiators: sword and shield, two-handed sword, spear thrower and dual wielder… BUILD POWERFUL ALLIANCES!

- Unlock EPIC STATUES to increase your legion of gladiators.

- BUILD your own city and defend your base from enemies in the MULTIPLAYER mode: LEAGUE OF HEROES.

- Training increases the power of gladiators. EVOLVE YOUR TEAM!

In clan wars, your legion of gladiators captures arenas over the empire, gaining valuable resources and prizes from their strongholds.

Organise your troop of warriors and start the journey to the battlefield, where you’ll fight in biggest war the ancient kingdom has ever seen. Grow your empire, as the fate of your civilisation depends on its success. Do no let your clan fall in the hands of your enemies!

In Gladiator Heroes you will be the hero who leads a squad of fighters through sieged cities, deserts, jungle and frozen fields taken by hordes of enemies, and defeat all kinds of opponents in the war game with the greatest weapons and the best gameplay on the store.

The ultimate war experience. Use active and passive skills to eliminate rivals. Stop your enemies from dominating the battlefield in the best strategy game ever!

As the leader of your rising empire, you will face the rival armies. Take the control of the battlefield, and become the legend of the war in the most addictive multiplayer game.

- Challenging multiplayer mode. Fight against real players and lead the global rankings.

- Experience this unique form of strategy game. Destroy your enemies with powerful weapons and your well-assembled team of heroes!

- Upgrade the skills and abilities of every member of your band: make them faster, stronger, more lethal. Equip them with the best weapons. Evolve your squad and lead them to victory.

LIMITLESS FIGHTING ACTION!

Will you be able to annihilate all the enemies in this bloody war? Welcome to the ROMAN EMPIRE. Welcome to GLADIATOR HEROES.


Gladiator Heroes is a free strategy game, however you will have the option to buy some items in the game in exchange for real money. If you prefer not to use that function, please disable in-app purchases in your mobile device’s settings.

comments: I love your latest update! Also thank you for fixing the "internet connection lost" issue! üòä Love the new character by the way! *-*)/ Great job!   I do have a suggestion, can you add like a one park/any place where players can meet with other players and chat? It would be great to interact with other players, not just in your guild group üòä hoping you'll consider it. Thank you so much for making this game! So addicting!

It'll be nice if we earn those ITEMS given in the stages description.  I kept on earning only common item no epic or legendary.  Which is sad but game is smooth which is good.  Thank you google for the update.  If we may add would love an auto healing potion during adventure. Thank you

Edit: Issue was resolved and devs were very quick to reply and help, which they seem to do consistently. I really love this game because it's easy to get good equipment and currency, you aren't forced to pay to win. Rewards for login/quests are very generous, prices of cards to equip new items isn't unreasonable. The characters and items you can equip look stunning. The only thing I can criticise is the unbalanced PvP, but I solve that by not playing PvP lol.

Marvelous heroes, outstanding graphics, excellent costumes, and cute pets. I realy like this game. But I hope this game would turn into an open world where all players could see each other at a single area. Perhaps a town or some kind of a city where everyone could gather and more features like whispers, world chat, etc. Well aside from that the game is totally amazing. Would much likely recommend this game.

Great game beside the fact it is a memory-eater this is exactly what you expect from cell game in 2018 good graphic smooth gameplay and enough energy reward not to worry about beeing stpp because of a lack of it. The omly downside is the pvp which is build in a way you are up against player who 1HKO you which get pretty frustrating.

Can't play the game after the latest update. I've downloaded the latest update, able to play it for few minutes. Then, it stop responding. When I tried to relaunch, after the Google Play Store and Nexus logo, it just stuck on the black screen. Nothing happened, waited for 5 minutes, still nothing happened. So I deleted the app and reinstall it. Still stuck on the black screen after the google plastore and nexus logo. Hopefully u guys patch this up ASAP, and I'll gladly change the rating once this is sorted out

descriptionHTML:
**HIT requires OS 4.1.0., 1.5GB RAM, and 1.4 GHz quad-core / 1.5 GHz dual-core. It is compatible with Galaxy S3, Galaxy Note2 and any devices with higher processors for optimized gameplay. You will need a network connection to play. HIT needs around 2GB of free storage space to download.

CONQUER foes in real-time PvP and arena brawl! RAID epic bosses with friends and allies!
> Guild tournament (3 vs 3 guild war), Real Time PvP Duel Arena, 6 player brawl arena , and Friendly 2 vs 2 and 3 vs 3!
> Raid in real-time and enter the arena to challenge other heroes in real time!

VISCERAL VISUALS
> Slice and dice monstrous foes and travel through spectacular 3D environments powered by Unreal Engine 4.
> Feel the full weight of your attacks as you cut down formidable enemies!

SIMPLE CONTROLS, MASSIVE COMBOS & SPLENDID SKILL EFFECTS
> Dominate foes with aerial attacks, throws, and knockdowns with just one tap!
> Chain together attacks to inflict maximum punishment!

INFINITE CUSTOMIZATION
> Endless equipment, weapon enhancements and costumes let you customize your hero to fit your playstyle
> Journey to new areas with your faithful pet

ENDLESS ADVENTURE
> Build your character’s experience in the Tower of Trials and Tower of Challenge
> Go on quests to explore ever-expanding maps and become the hero of your own incredible tales!

COMMUNITY
“Please visit our official Facebook page and Forum for latest news and announcements!”

Thanks for playing!

Privacy Policy: https://m-page.nexon.com/term/11

1. ""In-app purchases"" must be enabled to purchase charged in-game items.
2. ""Photos/Media/Files"" must be enabled to download additional game contents from updates.
3. ""Wi-fi connection information"" must be enabled to download additional game contents from updates.

*Android 6.0 - Requires access to Permission #2 at the launch of the application. No additional processes for #1 and #3 are required.
*Android 5.1 and below - Requires access to Permissions with 1 pop-up.

These are the necessary permissions that we need in order to provide proper game installation/performance to our users. Please note that we do NOT collect any personal information.

[Permission Management]

▶ Android 6.0 or higher - Settings > Applications > Select App > Permissions
▶ Under Android 6.0 - Update OS version to retract permissions; Uninstall app

comments: Awesome game. Good graphics, great sound and music, intricate leveling up system and character build, easy controls, variety in enemies, lots of replay value, lots of gear to find, and doesn't take much data space. Reminds me of a Diablo type game. The developer's really do deserve a lot of praise for creating such a quality game and not making it a p2w. This is an example of doing it right. I can tell that a lot of thought and care was put into it. Absolutely brilliant. I can't praise enough. A rare gem on the play store, and completely free. Just awesome. 6 out of 5 rating. Thank you so much for such a great game.:) Edit: Thanks for the update. You guys rock.

Good looking game plays very smoothly. Fun to play and not too hard or too easy. Nice little details like the way your hero talks and has other party members. These things help make the single player game seem less lonely. I don't know if I am going to hit a pay wall or loose interest. The story is engaging enough. I just don't give out 5 star reviews.

Greetings Making Fun,  Let me start off by saying that I absolutely love this game. It's entertaining, challenging and addictive. The storyline is engrossing and the graphics are spectacular as well. You can easily tell how addictive a game is by the amount of time you spend playing it at a stretch. Let me just say that I've been playing this game ever since I installed it. Whenever I sit down with my device, I start playing it and I keep on playing for at least two hours before I divert my attention to other matters. It's a really lovely and delightful game. Making Fun seems like the most suitable title of the developers because they've made something that is really a lot of fun. Well done. I highly recommend this game. DOWNLOAD IT TODAY.

Good game. Defintely like that you can play offline. Most of my issues with it are really minor except for the fact that the background especially things like walls, trees and hills can sonetimes block your view. There have been a bunch of tines where I couldn't see enemies that were right next to me because a wall was there.

Great game so far! Love the old school feel to the game! Resembles Diablo a lot! But I love the Diablo series so being able to play a game like that from the palm of my hand...GOLD! Tons of customization from characters, skills and equipment upgrades. Most of the better items are obtained just by playing! No need to buy items, save those gems for more skills to adding more companions to fight along side you! Running low on gems...just keep playing! Love a game that rewards you just for playing! Keep up the good work guys! I don't post reviews unless it's worth it so......see you out there!

The gameplay is the best ive seen for an android RPG Diablo type game. Slick graphics, awesome sound track and effects, no slowdown and you can play offline!! Absolutely love the game. Only down side is the worry of repetitivness of the game but i guess only time will tell
description: Eternium is an amazingly fun and beautifully crafted Action RPG, reminiscent of the great classics.Eternium stands out from other mobile Action RPGs by its effortless ‚Äútap to move‚Äù and innovative ‚Äúswipe to cast‚Äù controls, and its player-friendly ‚Äúno paywalls, never pay to win‚Äù philosophy.With the exception of a couple of online-only features, the game can also be played offline after the content download completes.Drawing signs to cast spells is easy and rewarding. The tap-to-move control is more natural and relaxing than thumbsticks, and it‚Äôs also truer to the vintage point-and-click Action RPG experience.The game can be really played for free, as more than 90% of our players do. Purchases are completely optional. Gems, the game‚Äôs main currency, can be collected from enemies and quests. There is no limiting stamina or energy. The best things in the game are obtained by playing, not paying.Eternium has been launched in 2014, and is actively being improved by the original development team. Through years of polishing, and feedback from millions of players, the quality of the game has steadily increased, making it now one of the highest rated games on all app stores.As of fall 2017, major new features are in advanced stages of development, including real-time multiplayer, town portal, and a fourth world.Enjoy the visceral satisfaction of responsive, fast-paced combat, with spectacular special effects, pleasing sounds, rewarding damage numbers, all set against immersive backdrops and atmospheric, inspiring music scores.Play as a Mage, Warrior or Bounty Hunter, wielding a sword, axe, staff or gun. Level up to learn new abilities and increase your attributes.Battle skeletons, zombies, automatons, aliens, demons, dragons and many other creatures, across three beautifully hand-crafted worlds, or in endless generated levels.Venture into dark caves and dungeons, explore forests, villages and graveyards, lay siege to demon controlled castles, brave snowy mountain peaks, travel to the moon to slay strange creatures among craters and canyons, and beyond, to the deserts, pyramids and jungles of the red planet.Open treasure chests to loot gold, gemstones and battle gear. Equip shiny breastplates, menacing helmets and hoods, spiked shoulder pads, mysterious cloaks or capes. Protect yourself with a shield, or choose to wield two weapons as a warrior.Rescue your tank, healer and ranger companions who will join you in battle. Use their abilities together with yours to create rewarding and powerful tactical combos.Experience a refreshing storyline, filled with interplanetary intrigue and seasoned with funny characters. Hunt your arch-enemy, Ragadam, across the worlds, while trying to uncover and undo his twisted plans.Progress from common to rare, epic and legendary gear. Find gemstones that fit in your armor‚Äôs sockets. Craft socketed rings and amulets, and fuse three of them into a higher quality one.Unleash awesome offensive abilities, such as Whirlwind, Shockwave, Arc Lightning or Blizzard, control the enemy crowd with Frost Nova, Vortex, Silence, or sneak and assassinate with Smokescreen, Traps and Snipe.Each hero class has access to about 20 abilities (skills or spells), and each of your three companions has four more. The game starts simple, but culminates in a flurry of tactical possibilities at high levels.Once your hero reaches level 70, your experience points go into Champion Levels, which are unlimited and yield steady stat upgrades. Champion Levels are also inherited by your new heroes, so they will have an easier time growing up.Aside from the three story acts, an endless progression of beautiful, randomly generated levels awaits in the Trials of Valor game mode.Eternium is crafted with passion by a small band of old-school RPG fans, who love making the game they always wanted to play.
descriptionHTML:
Eternium is an amazingly fun and beautifully crafted Action RPG, reminiscent of the great classics.

Eternium stands out from other mobile Action RPGs by its effortless “tap to move” and innovative “swipe to cast” controls, and its player-friendly “no paywalls, never pay to win” philosophy.

With the exception of a couple of online-only features, the game can also be played offline after the content download completes.

Drawing signs to cast spells is easy and rewarding. The tap-to-move control is more natural and relaxing than thumbsticks, and it’s also truer to the vintage point-and-click Action RPG experience.

The game can be really played for free, as more than 90% of our players do. Purchases are completely optional. Gems, the game’s main currency, can be collected from enemies and quests. There is no limiting stamina or energy. The best things in the game are obtained by playing, not paying.

Eternium has been launched in 2014, and is actively being improved by the original development team. Through years of polishing, and feedback from millions of players, the quality of the game has steadily increased, making it now one of the highest rated games on all app stores.

As of fall 2017, major new features are in advanced stages of development, including real-time multiplayer, town portal, and a fourth world.

Enjoy the visceral satisfaction of responsive, fast-paced combat, with spectacular special effects, pleasing sounds, rewarding damage numbers, all set against immersive backdrops and atmospheric, inspiring music scores.

Play as a Mage, Warrior or Bounty Hunter, wielding a sword, axe, staff or gun. Level up to learn new abilities and increase your attributes.

Battle skeletons, zombies, automatons, aliens, demons, dragons and many other creatures, across three beautifully hand-crafted worlds, or in endless generated levels.

Venture into dark caves and dungeons, explore forests, villages and graveyards, lay siege to demon controlled castles, brave snowy mountain peaks, travel to the moon to slay strange creatures among craters and canyons, and beyond, to the deserts, pyramids and jungles of the red planet.

Open treasure chests to loot gold, gemstones and battle gear. Equip shiny breastplates, menacing helmets and hoods, spiked shoulder pads, mysterious cloaks or capes. Protect yourself with a shield, or choose to wield two weapons as a warrior.

Rescue your tank, healer and ranger companions who will join you in battle. Use their abilities together with yours to create rewarding and powerful tactical combos.

Experience a refreshing storyline, filled with interplanetary intrigue and seasoned with funny characters. Hunt your arch-enemy, Ragadam, across the worlds, while trying to uncover and undo his twisted plans.

Progress from common to rare, epic and legendary gear. Find gemstones that fit in your armor’s sockets. Craft socketed rings and amulets, and fuse three of them into a higher quality one.

Unleash awesome offensive abilities, such as Whirlwind, Shockwave, Arc Lightning or Blizzard, control the enemy crowd with Frost Nova, Vortex, Silence, or sneak and assassinate with Smokescreen, Traps and Snipe.

Each hero class has access to about 20 abilities (skills or spells), and each of your three companions has four more. The game starts simple, but culminates in a flurry of tactical possibilities at high levels.

Once your hero reaches level 70, your experience points go into Champion Levels, which are unlimited and yield steady stat upgrades. Champion Levels are also inherited by your new heroes, so they will have an easier time growing up.

Aside from the three story acts, an endless progression of beautiful, randomly generated levels awaits in the Trials of Valor game mode.

Eternium is crafted with passion by a small band of old-school RPG fans, who love making the game they always wanted to play.

Making Fun, Inc.
4096 Piedmont Ave Ste 944
Oakland, CA 94611

comments: While the overall gameplay is pretty good. The whole game is literally a grind fest. Keep playing the same level over and over until you can upgrade, play another level, then proceed to keep playing the same level again. The competitive mode is also messed up as the opponent gets scores near impossible

Everything is great and good but only have one problem. And this problem will killing you all. That's the loading is damn slow no matter you are in LTE network or wifi situation. Because of slow loading it will kill your battery life fast as well. Please help to fix the problem and I will re-rate again. Thanks

Even with a perfect LTE speed game struggled with downloading hunts. The game forces you to do certain hunts before you can go back to the ones you like and want to finish. Not too mention every other minute it forces you to watch an ad or tries to get you to buy something from them. I will be deleting this app once i finish posting this comment.

Awsome game, the only thing wrong with it is that it takes forever to load. The graphics are amazing and so is the gameplay. This is something that could keep me entertained all day and I wouldn't get bored.üò∫üëå

The game currently wont open, when it does its constantly crashing and force stopping. I have the silver subscription ($1.00/weekly) and im unable to take advantage of the content im paying for  want a refund. The upgrades and new equipment are too expensive, the gear and parts are also too expensive and hard to come by especially for the spearfishing which is the best part of the game.. You certainly can't get very far without spending some real money. You can be killed by animals when the come from behind so you with your limited turning capability you have no chance to defend yourself. A lot of problems.
During cts theres moments get sudden lag and it throws off the shooting causing to miss when i know aiming right. It never had these lag bits before.

comments: Stop..do not download. This game has a bug and will stop responding when you get to the higher levels.  Support has not been able to find a fix.  After a certain level, the clues you will be given are the same every time and will be for an earlier game.

Fun little time waster. Nothing locked behind p2w. Makes you think of the full picture. If I were to criticise one side of this game is that many words are repeated on different pictures. I have lost count how many times "windows" was a answer BUT overall very fun.

Very addicting!  Hard to stop playing! Would like to be able to select any square to enter a letter so I can try different letter combinations when trying figure out a word. Right now, it seems you have to enter the letters largely in order.
A little bit glitchy but a good way to waste hours when you're bored. Keeps asking to rate the app. Dont bother collecting coins to buy background as the disappear the next day.

Great you will fly through levels. And then one answer will stop you and get in your head. It will be soooo obvious you will kick yourself. Thankfully you can send to a friend to help through facebook
LOVE TO PLAY THIS GAME! NO PROBLEMS WITHE FREEZING UP OR MOVING TO NEXT LEVEL. SIMPLY ENJOYABLE FOR YOUR BRAIN.

comments: It's sad to see people complaining and giving bad reviews about crashing but not knowing it's probably because their device is  g a r b a g e. I have j3 6 which is pretty bad and still runs well. Very optimized, sleek game. Also alot of updated to keep the game fresh and the microtransactions are very fair.

Very fun game, wish it wasn't energy based, would definitely enjoy it more. The fishing is 'new' right now and i have to say the percentages are garbage. 75 percent is more like 50, 50 percent is like 10 percent,  25 percent is closer to 50. This is just my personal experience. The games is really fun though, expect to get annoyed with the fishing percentages however. Also energy gets spent super fast in this game, very fun yet very limited.

It's good and alot of fun but it's a bit of a tedious grindfest. 150% item find and I found nothing after going through ten dungeons. I want to keep playing but it's just another pay to win type. I understand you need to make money but I can buy a full loadout of epic equipment and run through a great portion of the game in no time. It's definetly worth giving a try but unfortunetly it's not for me.

I fell in love with this game as soon as I opened it the first time. But there is a problem which forces me to give it a 2 star rating. It kicks me out of the game every 5 minutes and that way I can't get any progress done. I absolutely enjoyed the little playtime I got and I want to play it more but it won't let me. Great job otherwise devs!
Fun and amazing game, great time killer for me, I just love these pixelated games so much.. to be fair it sounds like it's more Terraria and pokemon mixed typa thing y'know.. 5 stars

Been playing this for about a week.  It's a lot of fun with a variety of different things to do.  Running out of energy for doing dungeons doesn't matter a lot as there are three or four other things to do in game that don't require energy.  Will be making a purchase to support the devs.  Good game!
description: Explore a vast new MMORPG world inspired by your favorite 8-bit & 16-bit dungeon crawlers.Bit Heroes captures that charm and nostalgia of your favorite RPGs, delivering them seamlessly to your mobile device.Collect and craft thousands of pieces of loot to increase your power. Build your team by capturing monsters and bosses to fight at your side in old school, turn-based combat. Prove you‚Äôre the mightiest hero in the land by competing in the PvP arena, Raids, and weekly events for awesome prizes! Take your most powerful friends and guildmates along to battle at your side!Key Features:*Retro dungeon crawling adventure!*A statue in the main town of the top global PvP player!*Six vast zones with over 70 randomly-generated levels and raids.*Thousands of mix and match pieces of loot to upgrade, craft, and recycle.*Capture and evolve over 100 creatures to fight by your side! (including powerful bosses).*Equip fantastic pets such as floating pizza, tiny unicorns, and more!*Team up with friends to tackle ultra-difficult dungeons to find great treasure!*Level up your guild to unlock a special shop with powerful bonuses.*Share stories and swap strategies with World Chat and Guild chat.*Original chiptunes soundtrack that sounds like it was ripped straight from a NES cartridge.PLEASE NOTE: Bit Heroes is free to play, but some extra game items can be purchased for real money. You can disable in-app purchases in your device's settings.A network connection is required to play.
descriptionHTML:
Explore a vast new MMORPG world inspired by your favorite 8-bit & 16-bit dungeon crawlers.

Bit Heroes captures that charm and nostalgia of your favorite RPGs, delivering them seamlessly to your mobile device.

Collect and craft thousands of pieces of loot to increase your power. Build your team by capturing monsters and bosses to fight at your side in old school, turn-based combat. Prove you’re the mightiest hero in the land by competing in the PvP arena, Raids, and weekly events for awesome prizes! Take your most powerful friends and guildmates along to battle at your side!

Key Features:
*Retro dungeon crawling adventure!
*A statue in the main town of the top global PvP player!
*Six vast zones with over 70 randomly-generated levels and raids.
*Thousands of mix and match pieces of loot to upgrade, craft, and recycle.
*Capture and evolve over 100 creatures to fight by your side! (including powerful bosses).
*Equip fantastic pets such as floating pizza, tiny unicorns, and more!
*Team up with friends to tackle ultra-difficult dungeons to find great treasure!
*Level up your guild to unlock a special shop with powerful bonuses.
*Share stories and swap strategies with World Chat and Guild chat.
*Original chiptunes soundtrack that sounds like it was ripped straight from a NES cartridge.

PLEASE NOTE: Bit Heroes is free to play, but some extra game items can be purchased for real money. You can disable in-app purchases in your device's settings.

A network connection is required to play.

comments: I wasn't expecting to like this game. But I LOVE it. I don't generally like FPS games and although that's a considerable part of this game, there's so much more. I love the horse racing and the mini quests that take you on scavenger hunts, exploring the two giant maps! I'm a big fan of the Old West and I'm a big fan of this game too. I've had it for about a year now and it still isn't old. The multiplayer is really fun too. Great game, especially for the (nonexistent) price!

Its a very addicting game! Good for a use of passing time by. Needs some work on mobile controls tho. But over all, its a fasinating game! üòÄ Has GREAT graphics and a spectacular gameplay! But, getting silver stars is just WAY to hard. There is almost NO possible way to get them. Please add more ways to get them. Like finishing certain missions.

Its great game but some of the issue that i dont like in this game is the stars. Its hard to gaining them plus its not free overall need to purchase! My guns is out of ammo and i was force to buy and it was not free. Also slots are expensive! Are you guys want to steal money from us or want us to play? I want it free to play overall. Please make the game more realistic than ever also graphic make it high detailed. Plus it crashed often when im playing what the heck is that?? Thank you. You guys did a great job but just that. Make that improvement please then i will enjoy the game fully without any payment made.

I would like to work with you guys, I got lots of ideas to help improve it and or make a new game.  Also there seems to be problems with the multi-player function, it was working two days ago and then it stopped,  and when I try liking on Facebook for 2 sherif stars it doesn't complete the action. Events don't work for me either.  But still it's a fun game kind of

Okay love the game, good gameplay, I just think with size if the game the graphics could be better  And the aim button should be moved from the left side to the right side of the screen. Its kinda hard to ride a horse chasing a werewolf when the aim keeps getting in the way.. Overall 8/10

The game is okay? Ang the graphics and controls are super natural I love Gameloft company because the games made are so very addicting playing plz update? This showdowns Gang  I'm gonna rite this again right now?

descriptionHTML:
Explore a truly enormous and open Wild West frontier full of cowboys, bandits and more…unnatural enemies in this third person shooter adventure game.

Play for free: Make your enemies pay!

Buck Crosshaw never shot a man who didn’t deserve it, but now he’s an outlaw who had to fake his own death and escape to Arizona. But in escaping one evil, Buck is about to face another, for an ancient and wicked force stirs in the hills of this mysterious region.

A WILD FRONTIER
Freely explore an open world set in Arizona and Oregon full of events, mystery and challenges for you to discover as you become completely immersed in the story and the action. But don’t be fooled by this land’s beauty - outlaws, vampires & many other unnatural foes lurk in every shadow.

ACCEPT THE CHALLENGE
Take on 40 missions with a great variety of tasks for you to overcome. You’ll race horses, take out robbers, fend off waves of enemies and more along the way!

SADDLE UP
In this kill-or-be-killed land, you’ll need to unlock all 8 different horses, 19 weapons and a wide selection of clothes, ammo and other items to help you on your adventure.

PLAY FOR FREE
Free games have never been this deep or fun! It costs you nothing to download and play the game to the end!

comments: Well after playing all the battleships games on Google play store I must to say that his one is the best of all. The game have the best graphics, the best gameplay and one of the most important things in my opinion there is a lot more ships and different types of ships than the other games. So if you enjoy playing games about battleships I recommend you to play this one instead of the others. The only negative thing that I found is the lack of ships in some countries except for Japan and USA, it would be great if they add all ships that are present in the PC version.

Excellent Game overall. Good graphics and controls (once you get used to how a ship moves) feels very real. Gameplay is fair but challenging and is addictive when trying to LVL up. Costs are reasonable but bonus cold be higher for premium account when compared to console prices. Customer service very good. I had a loading issue and advice was prompt and issue is resolved. Would edge about 4.7 out of 5 for me.

Fun game at first and got all the way to a tier V battleship!! It was fun until I started going against OP destroyers. I can broadside that tiny ship two of three times but it doesn't matter. Couple of torps and down I go. They move faster than i can track. Will be going back to Battle of Warships.

The game in general is great but torpedoes are just too powerful. I can't even hit the destroyers with their speed but now with their infinite torpedo supply that always seems to reload faster than my guns I can't even stand a chance? No fun at all. If anything you should follow battlestations Midway and Pacific. They're models completely balanced everything. Torpedoes were powerful there but they took awhile to reload and were finite. Thus you couldn't just spam. If you missed you lost out and had to do it the old fashioned way. Either nerf torpedoes or buff BBs cause otherwise it just isn't fair.

Very well executed port of a good game. Mostly sane monetization. The only problem I see is the premium price. In desktop version it is slightly less than 10$/month which is on the cheap side for MMO and makes a very good proposition. Mobile version is almost 30$/month which is frankly too much. I may consider 10$, or even 15$ per month (same as AAA MMO games on desktop with a ton more content), but not twice the price, especially for a mobile time killer.

Please give us the option to disable Auto Target Tracking in settings.  The auto tracking can cause you to fire at ships your not wanting to target, especially if there lined up side by side. And cause your shots to fall way short or too far if the enemy ship is coming straight towards you. If love to have the ability to disable this feature in the settings.

A truly free-to-play game. No timers, energy bars, fuel—play as much as you want and whenever you want.

comments: Hey... I would give this game 5 stars but there is 1 main -VE POINT. FUEL takes TOOOOOOOO LONG TO RECHARGE.  The point of this game is to playyyyyy the game. I don't want to keep waiting. I downloaded your great game TO PLAY it. Please try to solve this issue. I will definitely give you 5 stars if you fix this. Please listen to us and read our comments. Most of us are mentioning this 1 -ve point. Thank you

Great game but seriously?  The feul tho.  It takes 30 minutes to charge and it's only 5 as the limit.  Cmon that's bad!  I love this game and it has great graphics and it's a great time killer but please make the fuel like to 10 or make it 10 minutes to recharge.  If so I'll rate 5 star$

This game deserves to be the best game of the year. Its so simple and yet mesmerizing. It is also very fast so you won't get frustrated and could play this game for hours (or until the fuel runs out :-P). This game is quite exciting and the visuals are also nice. This game deserves more than 5 stars. The music blends in quite well and jobs make it more fun. Their are many sources from which you can get rewards which makes it easy and challenging to play. I love this game. Also you can buy more fuel slots in the shop for 100 diamonds. Its expensive but I don't need it beacuse I have to keep track of the time and only play until the fuel runs out.

Really good idea let down massively by the developers. Progress is extremely slow due to fuel taking so long to recharge and having to use gems to buy new vehicles. So unless you want to spend all your money on a free game, it doesn't really feel like you're getting anywhere.

Not too bad. I would have like to see the car while playing, and the graphics could be a touch better. I would honestly like an option between dragging your finger and using buttons on either side of the screen. That alone would have given this a 5-star rating from me

It shouldn't be easier to level up rather than actually playing game. I wouldn't say that the gameplay is difficult to play, but the purposefully placed trucks that shoot you is a bit ridiculous. Other cars are in the way which ultimately eliminates you before you can attack the shooting trucks. There really is no challenge except trying to beat your previous score. I give this game an eh out eh.
description: THEY TOOK YOUR CITY. descriptionHTML:
THEY TOOK YOUR CITY. THEY SHOULD’VE TAKEN YOUR CAR!

Reclaim your No.1 position as you blast past other players and outrageous gang bosses in Fastlane: Road to Revenge!

Pick-up this FREE classic arcade shooter and play anytime OFFLINE!

BUST OUT THE BIG GUNS
• 20 exotic cars to collect and upgrade.
• 10 unique & powerful UAVs.
• Game changing vehicle transformations to rain destruction on your rivals: Talon Gunship, Vulcan S-22, Tempest C-3.
• More gear and gadgets than Elon Musk!

CHALLENGE PLAYERS WORLDWIDE
• Blast your way past players the world over.

comments: I am so high on Candy Crush I downloaded this game thinking it would be just as fun. There are so many ads it takes away all the fun from the game. It seems like every 2 minutes there's one popping up and it takes forever to get rid of them. I would not recommend this game.
The game is fun, but by there is Soo much going on with rewards and goals and extras. I honestly have no idea what's going on on the game map. THE SHEER AMOUNT OF ADS IS INSULTING.

Love the game but when connected to internet u get bombarded with flashing ads which makes the game keep restarting over and over. Makes it unplayable.  Can't get past first tournament can't get daily reward.
I like the game but the amount of ads are so annoying. It's hard to enjoy a game when you keep getting bombarded with ads every other second.
Fun game but shuts down A lot!!!  Must then wait for it to re load. Very annoying. Any ideas why?
It would be great if ads didn't pop up every 30 seconds. Too annoying

comments: So far, not bad.  Update:  gathered enough parts to repair the university and it won't unlock.  I emailed the developer and haven't heard back.  It is such a cool concept with little to no support or point.  Why gather the materials if we can't use them?  Plus, it took weeks to get the stuff.  Like most cool games, nothing more than a good concept.

You had my attention, and now you have my money. Yes, this is a good game. However, it costs too much real money to advance this game. There are many missing pieces and too much to acquire to be able to progress. Maybe instead of making it so in depth, take it down a notch. Let people use junked cars to fix cars and sell them, if this is already an option make it easier to do so. I think this is a good game just too in depth and not enough give to make it entertaining and fun at this time.

Great game with good potential. I love it. But there are still some minor bugs the car baler somtimes acts weird. And the dismantling process sometimes goes reverse. And then there is the part of collecting building materials. It is too hard and we need to be able to get building materials from elsewhere than the scrap cars. All of them including wood, bricks, and concrete. I am looking forward to the car repair function.

The game is over good. It's definitely fun for your car enthusiasts but I am now level 11 and I can't obtain "glass" to build any buildings... The game is getting boring because I can't move up, it's pretty much scrap cars and sell parts... I don't want to rate this game too high because I believe it still is a work in progress, but yes it's a good game and I would recommend it

It's a decent concept. Good time killer for a little while. I don't know why all these games take energy. Just let me play the damn game. And the constantly fluctuating prices to sell the parts got old REAL QUICK! Apparently the creators of this game have never been to a salvage yard in their life.

Great time killer! Simple to play, though a few information/help would be nice for a few items, the auto sell option and the bailer so you know exactly what they do.  The developer does listen to the players and fixes things! Only true issues that I have are 1)the materials needed to build the buildings in incredibly high, not really obtainable for game play, even for someone who would play constantly
description: Want to start your own vehicle business? If you love vehicles and automobiles, you will love this virtual business game of vehicles. It is unique and extremely entertaining.Junkyard Tycoon is a game where you start your own garbage garage, buy vehicles or vehicle parts, detach vehicle parts, sell them and make profit. While you slowly make good business out of junk vehicle parts, you become a junkyard tycoon.Just keep buying and selling vehicles or vehicle parts. The twist of the game is that you can make profit while selling different vehicle parts. You can buy Car,Truck,Motorbike,Boats  at scrapyard prices and you will be able to sell vehicle parts individually to make good money. It is a perfect way to test your business and money making skills. ‚ÄúJunkyard Tycoon‚Äù is the best time management game for unlimited fun and salvage yard business.The game is all about right set of Wreckers business skills needed at the right time.! Get ready for the most amazing vehicle business game where you can buy junk cars, trucks, vans, or any other moving parts of vehicles and test your business skills to become a real Magnate. Focus and play carefully! This is an amazing business strategy game.Decide on your business strategy to balance out your income and expenses. The Wrecking Yard economy game is really fun with thrilling sound effects and beautiful game graphics. Download the game and start your own Scrapheap Challenge.************************SAY HELLO************************We are constantly working hard on making the ‚ÄúJunkyard Tycoon‚Äù game better and more entertaining for you. We need your constant support to get going. Please feel free to email us for any queries/suggestions/problems or if you just want to say hello. We would love to hear from you. If you have enjoyed any feature of the game, do not forget to rate us on play store and share among your friends.

comments: I have loved Hot Wheels for years and this is a good game. Fun and challenging. However I have been a bit frustrated because sometimes I just explode for touching a wall like on level 6. Awesomeüòí Not to mention I sometimes just hit a ramp and don't reach the end and fall into a void. Also fix your Poppa Wheelie's handling. You killed it, literally. Just try and fix your game a bit and I will give a 5.

The game is good. There are problems though. D-muscle is absolutely useless. It's the worst car in the muscle set and has no business being the fourth car in that set. The final upgrades for the fourth car on all sets are far too expensive. It requires an insane amount of grinding to unlock the last cars. The prices of supercharged upgrades are all over the place. Why do all of Haulinator's cost 100 coins while Dune It Up's cost 1000-2000?

Good graphics. If you fail and do exact same again you may pass level if you level up car, you end up failing sooner and have to slow down but after trying 7 r 8 times gets annoying and the level up car is worse than your basic car. Too frustrating so deleting

Game would be good if the dev's took time to work out the huge amount of bugs. Everytime I run this, I get 3 races deep then everything stops responding. Running it on Samsung Galaxy S9+ with perfect cell service. All the buttons click but do nothing. Uninstalled.

Horrendous abuse of in game ads like I've never seen before in an app. At some points, you literally cannot proceed until you open the play store. The game races are short balancing acts wherein you simply try to keep your car on its wheels. Do not download, and do not let your kids start playing.

My 2 almost 3 year old and I really like this game. It's pretty fun BUT it seems to freeze up after a few races and I have to shut the game off and restart it to play more. This obviously frustrates little man and I'm sure I'm not the only one this has happened to. Other than that, we think it's a great game.

comments: Update! I wish the game wouldnt shut down when you swap apps, like messenger or texting.  I lost so many matches because this game cannot stay open in the background. Yet every single other game i play can easily, btw i use a galaxy s8+..shouldnt be issues

The last update simply is a ripoff with devaluating the currency and more pay to win. furthermore the explanation on the forum is simply ridiculous and kind of shows that they think their players must be idiots. Used to be a fun game though.
Continued to improve, but don't let it get you twisted. Ai not always fair, but still fun.
Its great.  I go HARD!  They work to fix glitches.  I win some,  you lose some!

If you've played any D3 game before, you've played them all. The AI is horrendous in it's mana drop fairness (i.e. you get a single drop of mana, next move the AI cascades practically the whole screen) The entire mechanics are based on P2W. If you like the actual card game, DON'T PLAY THIS GAME.

This is an intricate card game where you build your decks and match them against decks other players have built. The mechanics are simple, the complexity comes from combining cards that play well together.
description: Magic: The Gathering and the original match-3 RPG are re-imagined in Magic: The Gathering ‚Äì Puzzle Quest, a deck building, strategy and match-3 game Kotaku says, ‚Äúis a marriage of two distinct games into a unique new experience.‚ÄùLATEST FEATURES‚Ä¢ Booster Crafting ‚Äì Create your own booster packs to complete card sets.‚Ä¢ New Card Sets ‚Äì Collect cards from Ixalan, a swashbuckling dinosaur walking world filled with unknown treasures and perilous creatures.‚Ä¢ New Battles Await ‚Äì Play new events and improved rewards.MAGIC: THE GATHERING ‚Äì PUZZLE QUEST FEATURESCollect & Craft CardsCollect some of Magic: The Gathering‚Äôs deadliest spells like Star of Extinction and creatures like Kopala, Warden of the Waves. Now with Booster Crafting, create your own booster packs to add to your collection. Build the ultimate deck and face off against people from around the world.Match to Cast SpellsMana gems are the core of your strength and power. Match-3 or more to collect enough power to cast deadly spells and creatures.Play with FriendsJoin a coalition and play with your friends to win bonus rewards in tournaments. Band together and fight opponents from around the world!Win Rewards and Climb the LeaderboardsEnter daily events and player-vs-player (PVP) tournaments and challenge your decks against others from around the world. Climb the leaderboards and collect a multitude of rewards to build even better, more powerful decks!Recruit Your Champions for BattleThe mighty mages and warriors of Magic: The Gathering are your heroes in battle. Pair them with your very best deck and enter the arena fully prepared to decimate the competition. Each Planeswalker comes with unique abilities to activate that enhance your cards or wreak havoc on your opponents. Build up their levels and watch their abilities grow into an unstoppable force.
descriptionHTML:
Magic: The Gathering and the original match-3 RPG are re-imagined in Magic: The Gathering – Puzzle Quest, a deck building, strategy and match-3 game Kotaku says, “is a marriage of two distinct games into a unique new experience.”

LATEST FEATURES
• Booster Crafting – Create your own booster packs to complete card sets.
• New Card Sets – Collect cards from Ixalan, a swashbuckling dinosaur walking world filled with unknown treasures and perilous creatures.
• New Battles Await – Play new events and improved rewards.

MAGIC: THE GATHERING – PUZZLE QUEST FEATURES

Collect & Craft Cards
Collect some of Magic: The Gathering’s deadliest spells like Star of Extinction and creatures like Kopala, Warden of the Waves. Now with Booster Crafting, create your own booster packs to add to your collection. Build the ultimate deck and face off against people from around the world.

Match to Cast Spells
Mana gems are the core of your strength and power. Match-3 or more to collect enough power to cast deadly spells and creatures.

Play with Friends
Join a coalition and play with your friends to win bonus rewards in tournaments. Band together and fight opponents from around the world!

Win Rewards and Climb the Leaderboards
Enter daily events and player-vs-player (PVP) tournaments and challenge your decks against others from around the world. Climb the leaderboards and collect a multitude of rewards to build even better, more powerful decks!

Recruit Your Champions for Battle
The mighty mages and warriors of Magic: The Gathering are your heroes in battle. Pair them with your very best deck and enter the arena fully prepared to decimate the competition. Each Planeswalker comes with unique abilities to activate that enhance your cards or wreak havoc on your opponents. Build up their levels and watch their abilities grow into an unstoppable force.
developerAddress:
11500 W. Olympic Blvd., Suite 460
Los Angeles, CA 90064

comments: RE-REPOST, Been playing for a while.  been attacked 10 times in 3 days, all i do is heal troops, boring! If you like healing troops all the time this is the game for you. Continually attacked, too many good games to even waste your time. There needs to be something better for healing troops, when your attacked its too hard to get back in the game.
Terrible customer service. Game crashes all the time and then you get attacked and zeroed while you are unable to log back in. And customer service can care less! Do not spend a penny on this game!
It has gotten to a point where it freezes on the loading screen "connecting to Google play games" and just loops there forever unless I force close the app. Please fix this issue.
It's pretty fun once you get past all the setting your base up.. and down to the actual fight..
It's a pretty good game I'm just starting it so I can't tell very much it's just like a couple other games build your troops Bill your armor and it's okayl
You gave the super power users an imortal power. You had them spoiled. Make the game balance. Add weapons that can be use by small.players to them so that they can be hurt also.
description: Become a general in the greatest war the world has ever seen! Join the largest WW2 strategy MMO game in the world!  FEATURES‚úî Build historical WW2 panzers and aircraft belonging to Allied and Axis powers‚úî Develop your base, research new military technologies and get involved in the world warfare‚úî Explore the Front Map to gather resources, scout enemy generals or defeat rebellious armies‚úî Use brute force and subterfuge to defeat enemy players‚úî Become part of history of the Second Great War by conquering the Atomic Facility‚úî Choose a General to represent you on the battlefield from Patton to Rommel‚úî Call your friends to arms and forge Alliances to win the great war‚úî Chat in real time to discuss war strategy with allied generals‚úî Join troops with allied generals, create massive marches and lead an army war in a World War 2 game‚úî Save the day by choosing the right time to attack or retreat, to wage war or make peace‚úî Level up your Commander to turn him into a hardened WW2 veteran‚úî Follow the call of duty in explosive daily events‚úî Compete with enemy and allied generals for the top spot in the events‚úî Do your duty and place your country‚Äôs flag in the world rankings‚úî Command vehicles based on your strategies: the impenetrable armor of the King Tiger panzer, the agility of the Spitfire or the explosive power of the B-17 Flying Fortres‚úî Be a general among historical leaders like Eisenwhower, Patton, Rommel, Rokossovsky and Montgomery‚úî Visit famous landmarks such as Stalingrad,  Peenemunde, Monte Casino, Dunkirk or meet Wojtek the Bear‚úî Complete hundreds of Missions to collect massive rewards‚úî Use FREE Speed Ups to develop faster and trump your enemies‚úî Become a VIP player and gain explosive bonuses‚úî Discover countless strategies and diplomatic choices!Join a world of war and test yourself against real players worldwide in the most addictive army game online! descriptionHTML:
Become a general in the greatest war the world has ever seen! TRAIN massive armies of panzers and aircraft, go to war with thousands of REAL players, form great alliances, and develop your own strategic center of operations. Join the largest WW2 strategy MMO game in the world!


FEATURES
✔ Build historical WW2 panzers and aircraft belonging to Allied and Axis powers
✔ Develop your base, research new military technologies and get involved in the world warfare
✔ Explore the Front Map to gather resources, scout enemy generals or defeat rebellious armies
✔ Use brute force and subterfuge to defeat enemy players
✔ Become part of history of the Second Great War by conquering the Atomic Facility
✔ Choose a General to represent you on the battlefield from Patton to Rommel
✔ Call your friends to arms and forge Alliances to win the great war
✔ Chat in real time to discuss war strategy with allied generals
✔ Join troops with allied generals, create massive marches and lead an army war in a World War 2 game
✔ Save the day by choosing the right time to attack or retreat, to wage war or make peace
✔ Level up your Commander to turn him into a hardened WW2 veteran
✔ Follow the call of duty in explosive daily events
✔ Compete with enemy and allied generals for the top spot in the events
✔ Do your duty and place your country’s flag in the world rankings
✔ Command vehicles based on your strategies: the impenetrable armor of the King Tiger panzer, the agility of the Spitfire or the explosive power of the B-17 Flying Fortres
✔ Be a general among historical leaders like Eisenwhower, Patton, Rommel, Rokossovsky and Montgomery
✔ Visit famous landmarks such as Stalingrad, Peenemunde, Monte Casino, Dunkirk or meet Wojtek the Bear
✔ Complete hundreds of Missions to collect massive rewards
✔ Use FREE Speed Ups to develop faster and trump your enemies
✔ Become a VIP player and gain explosive bonuses
✔ Discover countless strategies and diplomatic choices!

Join a world of war and test yourself against real players worldwide in the most addictive army game online! PLAY NOW!

comments: Love  the game, prefer it over other  similar  games  ie..candy crush. This is better by far. Some  levels  are very challenging. My only complaint  is  when you  spin the wheel 99% of the time  you get coins..no wheel barrels or anything helpful. Still love it though!

Fun game. It will give you a pass to the next level when stuck in a day or so, unlike Candy Crushtration. Whatever you do, do NOT log into Facebook to get free stars. It renders the game unplayable due to constant log in prompts. It cuts your play off mid-move causing you to uninstall out of sheer maddening frustration.

If you love games like Farmville and Candy Crush Saga then you will love this game. Not only is the game a matching game it also has a farming twist in it. You get to take care of animals as well. Also I have only seen 1 ad so far and I'm on level 15.

This game isn't bad at all except for the fact that certain parts require internet connection, and still doesn't work properly when connected to wi-fi. Also it has a horrible glitch problem, I've had to force close the app numerous times. I'm over it.

Match 3 games are my favorite types of mobile games and this one is an exceptional one because it stands out from the others with it's gameplay and visuals. Like I already said, match 3 type games are my favorite kind and  this is one of the better ones that I play. The only problem I really have is that it likes to freeze up and pause on me quite often but I don't really think the game is to blame, at least not solely,l. I think it has a lot to do with the fact that I fill my devices up to the max with misc. Junk.

Love the game, in fact it's my favorite. However it freezes constantly. You lose lives..it knocks you out all the time. I have been playing this games for years and it still freezes and crashes! PLEASE FIX THE BUGS!!

descriptionHTML:

comments: I hate to say it but what I thought at first was a cool extra is now ruining the game. It's no longer competitive on skill, it's just about how much you are willing to pay to get upgrades which negates any skill involved. It's just a money grab. If you don't pay and upgrade you lose!  Simple as that. So if you want a game with skill this is no longer it. If you want a game to empty your wallet to feed your ego then this is the game for you!

Super glitchy!!! Love this game but I'm getting crazy annoyed!! Lost my lucky spins used one and it took 4 off me!!! The game has done this multiple times!! It needs to bed fixed, remove all the bloody adds.

Could you guys maybe cool it with the damn ads? I can't even navigate the menus now without a 60% chance of getting a 15 second video about some crappy game with "war", "clash" or "clans" in the title...  Other than that, the gameplay itself is ok. Aside from maybe the lowered necessity for Tetrises because of power-ups or the annoying-ass "some pieces are affected by gravity, but we won't point it which ones until you cause them to drop by attempting to set up your next move" mechanic.  Seriously though, those ads after EVERY GAME NOW are cancer on toast. Knock it off.
To many cheaters on the tournaments and no way to report them. Doesn't even make sense why they would cheat, it's obvious when you can watch the games. Spoils it so much for others
Been playing this game for long time and am on level 191. It seems ur always gona hav and giv problems ! WHY won't it go to level 192 even tho I've cleared 191
This gameplay makes Tetris way too easy. There is a swipe option for traditional feels but no one will win any tournaments or achievements with that.

comments: Loved this game. The game is so addictive and enjoyable. I think the best ever football game to come across. BUT I HAVE ONE PROBLEM WITH THIS GAME. AFTER BUYING COMPETITIVE SQUAD THE GAME BECOMES SO EASY SUCH THAT I WIN BY A MARGIN OF 10 GOALS PER GAME. SO KINDLY, KINDLY.. DEVELOP TWO LEAGUES WHERE TO WIN A GAME SOMEONE MUST SWEAT even if you have all players rated 90%.hope for consideration during next update.

There's always a bug when there's about to be substitution of players causing the players in possession of the ball to run like headless chicken. Pls fix that. Add SULLEY MUNTARI of Deportivo La Coruna to the game pls. 'Need FTS18 with embedded dream league soccer ffs! Seems many players who have their current teams in the game are missing. Lawrence Ati of Sochaux in Ligue 1, Joe Dodoo, and many more. A quick update with massive changes will be great 'cause the game currently sucks!!!

Everything is good. But one thing. I have 6 created players in my team and I don't get new players for 5-6 season. Please make a "Create a Player" option under 'My Club' menu with more player editing options with a base rating of 60 or 70. Please add this feature then only I can create players same as the local leage in my region. It'd be so nice if you add that.

Look what I experienced. Dls needs development. The commentry needs more reasonableness and intelligence. The behaviour of each player, at least the famous ones should be unique. Controls need more improvement. Add real team logos for the opponent teams. Update players team data according to the recent transfers. And one more issue, while playing local multiplayer we need an extra device to connect two phones. This is a bad experience. If we can connect with each other simply by connecting wifi and hotspot of the two phones respectively, it would be great and simple.

This game is awesome overall. But some changes could be made like adding German league players (especially AUBAMEYANG though he's moved to England) and when you face them leagues top players( in the game) you could add the legends like Pele, Maradona, Ronaldo, Ronaldinho and others. Hoping to see these changes in the next update. Thank You!

I will love it if i can send players on loan and be paid some coins instead of directly selling them off. Also switching players for a few or no coins will be great. Since players like pogba likes changing his hairstyles, it will also be great to effect some changes in some players hairstyle. More leagues are needed, if possible, German,  Chinese, Nigerian and south African league. Lastly, commentators find it difficult to call the name of a created player, work on these and this game will be perfect.  Thanks

descriptionHTML:
Your world is in chaos! Your once great kingdom now fights for its life against a scourge of mighty monsters! Treasure-rich lands need a hero forged in fire and magic; a giant among mortals with steel for muscles and courage for blood! Winning back these lands and restoring your kingdom to its former glory will require a brilliant strategic mind, deft battle skills, and the might of epic alliances. Are you the Hero your kingdom needs?

Kingdoms Mobile is the latest, innovative, real-time-strategy game from IGG, the award-winning makers of global hits Lords Mobile and Castle Clash.
● Command your own team of fearless Heroes! Send them into battle with millions of troops!
● Fight in unique, borderless battles wherever and whenever you want in a massive world of kingdoms!
● Perfect your strategy to survive! Only the most cunning of players will find victory!
● Learn from your mistakes! Re-live dynamic battle videos - no boring battle reports!
● Create or Join Guilds packed with players who share your goals and passion!
● Chat in any language! Communication is no longer a barrier with Kingdoms Mobile's built-in translation tool!
● Take Control of powerful cities as you rise to become the ultimate ruler!
● Build your own fortress and collect riches fit for a king!
● Only through power, respect, and allegiance will you win the ultimate fantasy strategy war!

Note: This game requires an internet connection to play.
Visit us on Facebook at: https://www.facebook.com/kingdomsmobile

Need more help? Email help.kingdomsmobile.android@igg.com with your IGG ID, we'll reply to you immediately!

comments: Fun, easy to play, complex to reach higher levels, this game has, so far, been great. No microtransactions (thus far) to continue playing, which is a huge plus. A few have stated a couple of bugs, which I agree with, adding only one other comment; I do wish their was an offline option for at least some gameplay. Online still necessary for a lot, but offline to run some dungeons. This could, in theory, help with some server space, as well.

This game is one of the best game I ever played in mobile. I love the graphic which is cute and there is so many content, so it's not boring. And another positive side, you can get the special currency easily in the game. It's not a p2w games ^^ but the sign board was one of the best micro transaction I've ever seen. Try it and you'll see.. it's a lot of fun ^^

I've been looking for a game like this for ages! I was a fan of Runestone Keeper and wanted something similar for my phone. These guys knocked it out of the park. I rarely spend money on phone games, but these guys deserve every penny and accolade coming their way. Fun and  simple, yet brilliant in execution and design. Tons of content already, and I can't wait to see what's next. Keep up the great work!

This game is so much fun! My only complaint is that the gear is gone when done with the maze, so you start it over. As well as "learning new titles". It gets kinda old having to start that over every time you beat a full maze. But that aside, this game is definitely addictive! Keep up the great work!

Your game is amazing. You guys are amazing. After everything you went through, you deserve these stars at the very least. Your game isn't pay to win, it's just a grand experience and I love it.  One of the BEST games on the market easily.  Keep up the good work, you're all doing fantastic.  Respect

I've been playing like nine months and it's very addictive you really grow and have many choices. It's truly free to play and gems are everywhere. Buying a signboard for real money is the best bang for your buck and a lizard if you feel like buying something else.  Totally recommend it. I only hate getting creator gumball is so expensive other than that it's a great game. It's a game that goes as fast or as slow as you feel like playing.

Visit http://qcplay.helpshift.com/a/gumballs-dungeons or https://www.facebook.com/gumballs.dungeons or contact us in game by going to Settings > Guide.Forums & Guide:English:    https://goo.gl/ecChhsWiki:http://gdmaze.wikia.comTerms of Service:http://rs.qcplay.com/html/Terms_of_service.htmlIt's necessary to use the below permissions:RECORD_AUDIOThere is a 'Voice Chat' function in the game, this function allows users to send the voice messages to each other, so it's necessary to use the RECORD_AUDIO permission.The video below shows how it works in the game:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KqNb75QXq8g&feature=youtu.be  GET_ACCOUNTSIn order to allow users to sign in the game with Google account, it's necessary to grant access to the GET_ACCOUNTS permission when signing in with google at the first time.
descriptionHTML:
Brand new Adventure & RPG game of 2018. FREE to Play Now! (Game for free)

DESCRIPTION
This is a mysterious adventure. How long can you survive during the unknown journey? Enter the Gumballs & Dungeons!Start off a great adventure with world wide players,lead your Swordsman,Demon Hunter,Mage and Death Knight to beat the Evil Dominator of the Erathia continent.

FEATURES
● Explore the Gumballs & Dungeons with world wide players,challenge friends and check leaderboards and achievements
● Experience more than 12 different game maps and hidden stages, including Magic Forest, Sage's Tower, Dracula's Castle, Skeleton Island ...
● Build and upgrade your GUMBALL Fleet,go to the celestial city, challenge world wide players and win resources to upgrade your fleet.
● Collect powerful new gumballs and upgrade existing ones,including Mage, Swordsman, Odin, Vampire,Zombie ...
● Upgrade your Alchemist Workshop which can produce coins and resources constantly
● You can also read many wonderful stories that have more than 100,000 words in the game

SUPPORT
Are you having problems? Visit http://qcplay.helpshift.com/a/gumballs-dungeons or https://www.facebook.com/gumballs.dungeons or contact us in game by going to Settings > Guide.

Forums & Guide:
English: https://goo.gl/ecChhs

Wiki:
http://gdmaze.wikia.com

Terms of Service:
http://rs.qcplay.com/html/Terms_of_service.html

It's necessary to use the below permissions:

RECORD_AUDIO
There is a 'Voice Chat' function in the game, this function allows users to send the voice messages to each other, so it's necessary to use the RECORD_AUDIO permission.
The video below shows how it works in the game:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KqNb75QXq8g&feature=youtu.be

GET_ACCOUNTS
In order to allow users to sign in the game with Google account, it's necessary to grant access to the GET_ACCOUNTS permission when signing in with google at the first time.

descriptionHTML:
Can you infect the world? Plague Inc. is a unique mix of high strategy and terrifyingly realistic simulation.

Your pathogen has just infected 'Patient Zero'. Now you must bring about the end of human history by evolving a deadly, global Plague whilst adapting against everything humanity can do to defend itself.

Brilliantly executed with innovative gameplay and built from the ground up for touchscreen, Plague Inc. from developer Ndemic Creations evolves the strategy genre and pushes mobile gaming (and you) to new levels. It’s You vs. the world - only the strongest can survive!

◈◈◈ #1 top game globally with 200 million+ games played ◈◈◈

Plague Inc. is a global hit with over half a million 5 star ratings and features in newspapers such as The Economist, New York Post, Boston Herald, The Guardian and London Metro!

The developer of Plague Inc. was invited to speak at the CDC in Atlanta about the disease models inside the game!

▶ “The game creates a compelling world that engages the public on serious public health topics” – The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
▶ “Best Tablet Game of 2012” - New York Daily News
▶ “Plague Inc. will snag your attention in all the right ways and keep it there” - Touch Arcade
▶ “No denying Plague Inc.'s high-level of quality” - Modojo
▶ “Plague Inc. should not be as much fun as it is” – London Metro
▶ “Will leave you hoping to destroy the world, all in the name of a bit of fun” – Pocket Lint
▶ “Plague Inc.'s gameplay is infectious” - Slide to Play
▶ Winner – “Overall Game of the Year” – Pocket Gamer
▶ “Killing billions has never been so fun” – IGN

◈◈◈

Features:
● Stunning HD graphics with a highly polished interface (Contagion guaranteed)
● Highly detailed, hyper-realistic world with advanced AI (Outbreak management)
● Comprehensive in-game help and tutorial system (I am Legendarily helpful)
● 12 different disease types with radically different strategies to master (12 Monkeys?)
● Full Save/Load functionality (28 Saves Later!)
● 50+ countries to infect, hundreds of traits to evolve and thousands of world events to adapt to (Pandemic evolved)
● Full game support for scoreboards and achievements
● Expansion updates add the mind controlling Neurax Worm, the zombie producing Necroa Virus, Speed Runs and real life Scenarios!

Localised in English, German, Spanish, Brazilian Portuguese, Italian, French, Japanese, Korean and Russian. (more coming soon)

P.S. Give yourself a pat on the back if you got all the themed literature references!

Special sale price to celebrate being the 15th most popular touchscreen game of 2012!

◈◈◈

Like Plague Inc. on Facebook:
http://www.facebook.com/PlagueInc

Follow me on Twitter:
www.twitter.com/NdemicCreations

comments: This used to be a fun game to play but now the 15 min a day you can play is not so much fun.. energy takes to long to refill.. the rooms require to much to enter and the quest are almost impossible to fulfill.. it takes months cause you run out if keys and or energy before you can find anything.. I've played this game for years and other than graphics it was way more fun when it first came out.

I have loved playing for years however now have to wait a long time for keys to get into rooms and now the guild does not exist. Thinking of deleting game and finding another one. Not sure what level second floor applies either.

I like how the pictures change, doesn't make it too easy. Some of the quests are difficult to get through. Wish game would save across platforms so I don't have to start at the beginning when i get a new tablet or phone.

Earlier version would have gotten a higher rating. The new updates have screwed the game up. It now shuts down virtually every time you try to enter a room. Deleting the game - don't need the aggravation when trying to relax.
You only get to plays ar a time unless you pay for it

Game has become frustrating. Rewards from rooms is practically non existent as is trying to get keys for the rooms. Energy is also very slow to repl√®nish. Endlessly searching rooms for no reward using all my keys and resources is not a game I particularly want to play

descriptionHTML:
Meow there!

I’m in charge in the manor while my master is away! The name’s Joshua, nice to meowt you!
My master left a message for a certain "brave and clever detective", is that you? Come on, open the envelope and start your adventure in the manor. I bet there are more mysteries here than you expected.
Follow me! Let’s play the most mysterious hidden objects game ever. I’ll guide you through the secrets of Mystery Manor, and we’ll meet all sorts of fantastic beasts, from fierce monsters to spooky ghosts. We'll solve challenging puzzles, find hidden artifacts, uncover secret rooms, and complete exciting quests. It will be a neverending journey! My master keeps an eye on the mansion from afar and won’t ever let us get bored. There are always new quests, rooms, and characters that appear in the manor every once in a while!
Oh, and just in case — never ever touch my bowl in the kitchen!

Some great features highlights: 
✔ Explore an atmosphere of mystery.
✔ A captivating detective storyline.
✔ Beautiful hand-drawn graphics .
✔ A wide variety of objects to search and puzzles to solve.
✔ Search for objects in different modes: words, silhouettes, phenomena, and Zodiac modes. 
✔ Regular free updates full of new characters, rooms, and quests.
✔ Breathtaking mini-games and a Match-3 adventure.
✔ Help your friends and ask for their help in return.


✔ This game works offline without an Internet connection, so you can play it on the plane, on the subway, or on the road. Enjoy!

comments: Great game, me and the family enjoy it immensely and we have all made our contribution, thank you. The controls in card battles on the phone are too fiddly, considering there is a lot of unused space on the screen: this would have been developed differently if it wasn't attempting to mimic the desktop version. Lazy! Is the ".. playing over WiFi..." warning still relevant? Unlimited mobile data and 4g means many of us have as good a connection as fixed line. Love the game, thank you.

This is an awesome game I play it be very day and I had two games I would always play now I don't even play them at all because this game is so awesome and I kinda play it to much.  But I did get my last account deleted for some reason I was mad and couldn't get it back so I had to create a new one

Everytime I play a club arena game (free every 24hours) it will keep telling me i disconnected from the game while my Internet connection is fine. But when I play other normal arena games, it turns out fine. I find it very annoying because i have to wait 24 hours to play my favourite club games and it always disconnects, and it makes me mad. I hope you notice this comment and leave a reply... Please fix this... Thanks :(  Edit: It works fine now, thank you! :)

Very fun game, my most played game by far but the major issue in this game is hackers. You get good and start to play the end gamers and realize 90% of them are bots with millions of coins and as soon as the game starts you are sent balloons to your side that cannot be activated until round 15+! It's frustrating to earn my coins legit just to have them taken by all the hackers and bots. Ruins the game when makers aren't doing anything about it.
I LIKE IT BUT IT WOULD BE WAY BETTER IF U ADD MORE MONKEYS AN IF THE BATTLE THAT U PAY 100 TO GET 200 MEDALIONS WONT GO AWAY NUT STILL COOL PLZ ADD MORE STUFF LIKE MONLEYS
