comments: The graphic are great and the gameplay is fun but what kept me going was the writing. At first I was like uhhh another newspaper? Those don't do anything... But I kept reading and they are GREAT. On the lower side, the drones often clip in building and can't be clicked or you click straight on it but get sent to a building screen instead and by the time you get back, the fast drones are gone.

Soul eggs are incredibly buggy. On the higher level eggs you can go from earning 10s a sec to 1 a sec just by closing the app. The extra soul eggs through epic research when you prestige isn't clear enough and doesn't match the description. Later game is very much about waiting for a counter to hit one billion which means you don't need to open the app all that much. Other than that, it's ok.

Very good game overall, relaxing and good to play if you have a short period of free time. The only thing I would say is I wish opening the piggy bank didn't cost REAL money because I have thousands of golden eggs in it but I can't get them out because I don't want to spend money. Maybe make it that you have to spend TONS of the in-game money to open it. I would rate this 4/5 stars, as I thoroughly enjoy it.

Great stuff, cool graphics and awesome story writing. A nice time passing game. Would have given 5 stars if a little more improvement was made. Bug - When you tap on the box when it is being thrown by the courier van, the dialog shifts up to the to of the screen, overlapping the cash counter. Suggestion - The whole farm area should be easily scrollable. Also, you could put in an option to zoom out to fit the whole farm on the screen.

I play the game all the time, but it needs easier and faster prestige. Three days of waiting for the next egg is bs with a prestige score of almost 1,000,000. Also "silos" hardly earn anything. That's my main complaint. Fix it so they earn WAY more over non play or I'm done and I've actually spent money so if you still want that, fix it.

Fun and simple game that lets you gradually grow your farm at your own speed. This is a game you can play from once a week where you collect the money you've collected offline, buy upgrades, then leave the game for another week; to spending a few casual hours of hunting for the drones that give you extra money and gold eggs which are the games micro-transaction currency to buy permanent upgrades that help your farm grow faster. It not so much a race as it is just enjoying your farm steadily grow over time.
description: In the near future, the secrets of the universe will be unlocked in the chicken egg. You have decided to get in on the gold rush and sell as many eggs as you can. Hatch chickens, build hen houses, hire drivers, and commission research to build the most advanced egg farm in the world.An incremental (clicker) game at its core, Egg, Inc. uses many elements from simulation games that give it a unique feel and play style. Instead of menus, you are presented with crisp and colorful 3D graphics and a delightful simulation of a swarm of chickens. In addition to choosing your investments wisely you must also balance your resources to ensure a smooth running and efficient egg farm.There is something for everyone here:Casual players love Egg Inc's laid back feel and beautiful appearance. Take your time to build a wonderful egg farm and explore all the content.More experienced incremental (clicker) players will love the emergent gameplay and depth afforded by the different play styles needed throughout the game. To reach the ultimate goal of having a ginormous egg farm with an astronomical value, you will need to balance strategies throughout many prestiges to make best use of your time.Features- Simple, Casual gameplay with opportunities to challenge yourself- Chicken swarm!- Dozens of research items- Dozens of missions- Many different hen houses and shipping vehicles- A "Nested" Prestige system has the game always feeling new- Wonderful 3d graphics with pixel perfect UI and shadows- Google Play Games Achievements, Leaderboards & Quests!
descriptionHTML:
In the near future, the secrets of the universe will be unlocked in the chicken egg. You have decided to get in on the gold rush and sell as many eggs as you can.

Hatch chickens, build hen houses, hire drivers, and commission research to build the most advanced egg farm in the world.

An incremental (clicker) game at its core, Egg, Inc. uses many elements from simulation games that give it a unique feel and play style. Instead of menus, you are presented with crisp and colorful 3D graphics and a delightful simulation of a swarm of chickens. In addition to choosing your investments wisely you must also balance your resources to ensure a smooth running and efficient egg farm.

There is something for everyone here:
Casual players love Egg Inc's laid back feel and beautiful appearance. Take your time to build a wonderful egg farm and explore all the content.

More experienced incremental (clicker) players will love the emergent gameplay and depth afforded by the different play styles needed throughout the game. To reach the ultimate goal of having a ginormous egg farm with an astronomical value, you will need to balance strategies throughout many prestiges to make best use of your time.

Features
- Simple, Casual gameplay with opportunities to challenge yourself
- Chicken swarm!
- Dozens of research items
- Dozens of missions
- Many different hen houses and shipping vehicles
- A "Nested" Prestige system has the game always feeling new
- Wonderful 3d graphics with pixel perfect UI and shadows
- Google Play Games Achievements, Leaderboards & Quests!
developerAddress:
20665 4th St #101
Saratoga, CA 95070
recentChanges: - Minor improvements and crash fixes
summary: Build an enormous egg farm!
title: Egg, Inc.

comments: I have a question. I have a tablet and a phone, i want to play on my phone with stuff that i have on my tablet. On tablet i am loged in with a google paly account, when i login to same account on my phone it doesnt ask me to download other chapters and i dont have any items or achivements. Is there any way to fix it or to make it work? PS: Its a realy good game, its my style. In MY OPINNION its batter than Shadow fight 3.

Not the master. But I had got with the achievement "thaught the teacher". After defeating hermit now I am used to magic. Only in few minutes I can earn money and upgrade​ my gear. Such a wonderful game it is. Even if the meter hangs to impossible I can beat the competitors. Very nice game used to play it often. At lesiure time I think spending​ in it is the best. As you can earn  daimonds  by just watching the ads.

The AI spam SO much! All they do is throw a suriken at you till you die. They won't even let you get up! 2 hits and I die yet I hit them like 10 times! There should be unlimited energy who wants to spend $20 for unlimited energy. Plus the controls are trash.

I love this game. I've never been good at fighting games like Tekken or soul Calibur but this game is a very simple take on the genre. I love how very martial arts based this game is and the hit boxes on the characters are quite accurate and simple to understand as well as the moves. Being a martial artsist my self this game has given me an outlet to mentally practice distance management, fake outs and strategy as well as practicing to be like water. The famous Bruce Lee saying. Love this game. Also the rank up system and the grinding isn't too over bearing or tedious and makes it fun through and through.

Great game, my only problem is that it took a long time grinding for the money you need to buy items. It took me about 5 hours of grinding just to upgrade each weapon/armor, 6 hours to buy new ones. Still a great game, loved the way it's in shadows, making it harder to tell who you are.

Game is awesome. But for past 2 days whenever i open the game, it closes after intro showing that unfortunately SF 2 has stopped. Pls do something as i dont want to uninstall it. Also I hv sent feedbacks 2 to 3 times but no reply or fixation. Do something about it.
description: The sequel to the famous Facebook smash hit with 40 million usersShadow Fight 2 is a nail-biting mix of RPG and classical Fighting. This game lets you equip your character with countless lethal weapons and rare armor sets, and features dozens of lifelike-animated Martial Arts techniques! Crush your enemies, humiliate demon bosses, and be the one to close the Gate of Shadows. Do you have what it takes to kick, punch, jump, and slash your way to victory? comments: Finally a mobile mmo that actually feels like a real mmorpg. Nice graphics, skills, open world questing, lots of players. Fights are engaging  and boss fights are spectacular and interactive. You do need a team for dungeons and raids as you can't just 1 shot everything, like in other mobile mmos. I've tried loads but this is the best by far! Keep it up!

Man, this is a perfect 5/7! Out of a crapton of Mu Origin game clones, this is even better than original! Polished graphics, nice player skills set, awesome UI items layout - everything is top notch! The only thing I can wish for is adding camera turn on top of player strafe via joystick. Thanks for the hard work, and please keep it up!

Great mobile MMO! Good graphics and narration so the story stays interesting. Additionally...SO much Co-op and PvP and a lot of things to give an edge. Not P2P dominated either so far. Obviously the grind to 55 is tough but I have a few characters on different servers there still very possible.

I think this game is amazing for an MMO mobile. It has a feeling of blade and soul and WOW and the graphics sre amazing on my Razer phone! Actually feels like a real MMO, and I like that there are character voices.  Only problem I am having is whenever I go to turn the Volume up or down all sound cuts out and won't come back on until i restart the game. So I need to pre-set my volume before launching the game and then not touch the volume while playing.

Love this games good graphic and updated.  But love warrior in any game but in this game warrior are weak in dps. Can u adjust skill  And i spend real money on top up every week but no legend reforge from bp.  How sad to my char. Legend are to far away to me full set legend. I play evryday not to miss anything on event

Overall game nya seru, story lore nya juga, banyak diversity dalam 1 class, hal yg bikin menarik sebenernya banyak hal yg bisa di laku in di game, ga selama nya soal "power character" tapi soal balancing stat sesuai kebutuhan dan juga path yg diambil. sistem dungeon yg berbeda difficulty juga seru a.k.a mythic (jadi inget main world of warcraft), tapi somehow sistem pvp kurang greget 4.5/5

descriptionHTML:
The Desolation Wall has fallen after 700 years of peace, it’s now up to you and your allies to battle the demon hordes occupying your land!

Adventure in this Vast 3D Fantasy Open World redefining the MMORPG experience on mobile. Start your journey by selecting either Ranger, Warrior, Mystic, Paladin, Elementalist Classes, each with their own distinct strengths and characteristics.

BATTLE SYSTEMS

•Join up to 40 guild mates as you take on bosses and collect loot in Dungeon Raids
•Prove yourself in Arena Battle with 1v1, 3v3, and 5v5 modes and participate to unlock powerful gear sets
•Show-off your superior skills and defend your glory as you take part in large scale battles
•Put your survival instincts to the test as you take part in Battle Royale mode

IMMERSIVE GAMEPLAY

•PC quality graphics to immerse you in this impressive MMO game on mobile
•300+ hours of gameplay including hundreds of paths for your hero
•Vibrant fantasy world with the ability to reach the coveted legendary status of level 55

CUSTOMIZATION

comments: This game is amazing. It has GREAT graphic quality, AMAZING game mechanics, and one of the BEST multiplayer trade systems I've ever seen in a game. BUT the support and appeals system is terrible. I've been contacting appeals for 2 weeks about my accidental ban with no reply I've spent well over 800 bucks so I'm not sure what to do now.

Such an amazing game. Been playing since 2013 and loved every bit of it. There's still some work to be done with the whole system. An event that happened on 20/1/2018 my clans banks (Biggest bank on arawn- Braves and resurgence) had there passwords changed by an ex resurgence general. Chief of resurgence got it back then on the 20th OTM gave it back to the scammer! That me me furious. Otherwise the game is great.

If you are into getting better equipment all the time, then this can get boring quick... I was loving it at first but getting better equipment is based SOLEY on npc merchants and quests... Theres fishing and cooking, but you cannot make gear.. No magic item drops... The equipment system in this is very linear..

Dissapointed. One thumb mobile are terrible at getting issues resolved. Recently there's been a duping scandal where many innocent people have been caught in the cross fire, including clan banks stocked with several years of raid spoils. How they don't have measures in place to deal with these kinds of issues is beyond me.

I only just started, and the games itself is wicked cool, but even after the tutorial, I just can't figure out how to use the player chat. It sort of glitches out and won't let my type anything. Is this a game problem, or a mistake on my part?

I usually don't do reviews, but this game definently deserves it! Easy to pick up and get sucked into. Good amount of classes to choose from and customization is very refined. And finally, an mmorpg that doesn't contain a bunch of anime freak characters and outrageous weapons and armor. Such an enjoyable game.

comments: Brings Back Fond Memories I love this game! I spent countless hours playing this in the early 2000s. The controls are easy enough to understand and the text is legible on my LG V10. I don't if I'd be able to read it on a smaller screen, they are not kidding when they say this is meant for tablets. If you've got a tablet or phablet I can't recommend this game enough.

A classic perfectly adapted to the phone platform This game is a MUST-have for any rpg lover. The D&D mechanics may seem i bit weird in the beginning, but you will learn in time. The replayability value of this game is almost infinite. Personally I have never played any kind of game that would allow me to play as many hours in so many different ways. The game excels in its easy to handle mechanics, fun dialogue, compelling story, great ammount of side-quests that are actually enjoyable. Hands down best Apk for this platform. Worth every penny.

Great Classic CRPG BGII was definitely a breakthrough in its time, but it still holds charm and depth that many newer games can't even touch. I have this game for the Samsung Galaxy s7 Edge and I can tell the chip set on the phone is grinding gears with the games engine. It's playable but only when the right character menu is minimized but it still gets choppy when multiple spells are being  cast. With the specs on the s7 this shouldn't be the case. Hey Developers any input/ advice on how to solve this issue?

Amazing! There's a lot to love.  First, if you played the original, this is just as good with extras.  Granted, it's a bit harder to see everything, but it's what happens when you take a computer game and make it available for a phone.  Beamdog has brought additional characters, adventures, magic items, portraits and voices to the game to expand the character creation.  Some expansions are dull (like the arena unless you love grinding) but more of this rpg is on the way.  It's truly the best classic game reborn.

I have a special request. I have purchased very possible version of the bg series, and have played as long as the game has existed. Call me a war vet asking for a wheel chair ramp but could you guys implement the imput of  points or the option to roll. 20+ years of rolling for stats has earnt me the option. Other than that perfect game, worth every licence for every platform. Either let us input stats with option to roll or make a shadowkeeper for android please.

Game is great, as I've played it on another device. However on Note 8 it does not take up the whole screen, and the usable screen is significantly smaller than on s7 edge, and is barely playable. When I force it to full screen in settings, then touching on sides of screen are not recorded accurately. For example, when I try to resize the text box, it toggles AI instead. Makes the game virtually unpayable.
description: Kidnapped. Imprisoned. Tortured. The wizard Irenicus holds you captive in his stronghold, attempting to strip you of the powers that are your birthright.Can you resist the evil within you, forge a legend of heroic proportions, and ultimately destroy the dark essence that haunts your dreams? Or will you embrace your monstrous nature, carve a swath of destruction across the realms, and ascend to godhood as the new Lord of Murder?Baldur‚Äôs Gate II: Enhanced Edition includes the original Shadows of Amn campaign, as well as the following expansions:* Throne of Bhaal: Travel to Tethyr in this thrilling conclusion to the Bhaalspawn saga, and delve into the treasure-filled halls of Watcher‚Äôs Keep!* Fist of the Fallen: Help the Sun Soul Monk Rasaad find peace in his quest for vengeance, and determine the fate of a heretical sect.* The Black Pits II: Gladiators of Thay: Explore the tactical depth of high-level Dungeons & Dragons combat. Turn your captors against each other while you dodge traps and battle for your life against Demi-Liches, Mind Flayers, and the legendary Githyanki.Baldur's Gate II: Enhanced Edition also offers the following premium content available for purchase:* A Price Paid in Blood: Join the Blackguard Dorn in carving a swath of destruction across the Realms, as he struggles to appease the increasingly bloody demands of his dark patron.* A Voice in the Dark: Recruit the mysterious Thief Hexxat and take up her mission of retrieving long-lost artifacts from tombs as far away as Zakhara.* In Defense of the Wild: Protect the innocent and stand with Neera the Wild Mage against a ruthless school of Red Wizards.Note: All translations are text only. Voice-overs are played in English.
descriptionHTML:
Kidnapped. Imprisoned. Tortured. The wizard Irenicus holds you captive in his stronghold, attempting to strip you of the powers that are your birthright.

Can you resist the evil within you, forge a legend of heroic proportions, and ultimately destroy the dark essence that haunts your dreams? Or will you embrace your monstrous nature, carve a swath of destruction across the realms, and ascend to godhood as the new Lord of Murder?

Baldur’s Gate II: Enhanced Edition includes the original Shadows of Amn campaign, as well as the following expansions:

* Throne of Bhaal: Travel to Tethyr in this thrilling conclusion to the Bhaalspawn saga, and delve into the treasure-filled halls of Watcher’s Keep!

* Fist of the Fallen: Help the Sun Soul Monk Rasaad find peace in his quest for vengeance, and determine the fate of a heretical sect.

* The Black Pits II: Gladiators of Thay: Explore the tactical depth of high-level Dungeons & Dragons combat. Turn your captors against each other while you dodge traps and battle for your life against Demi-Liches, Mind Flayers, and the legendary Githyanki.

Baldur's Gate II: Enhanced Edition also offers the following premium content available for purchase:

* A Price Paid in Blood: Join the Blackguard Dorn in carving a swath of destruction across the Realms, as he struggles to appease the increasingly bloody demands of his dark patron.

* A Voice in the Dark: Recruit the mysterious Thief Hexxat and take up her mission of retrieving long-lost artifacts from tombs as far away as Zakhara.

* In Defense of the Wild: Protect the innocent and stand with Neera the Wild Mage against a ruthless school of Red Wizards.

Note: All translations are text only. Voice-overs are played in English.

descriptionHTML:
Explore the glamorous world of Talking Angela! Adopt baby Angela and make her your very own virtual pet. She's all yours to look after as she grows from kitten to cat. Just watch – she’ll become your new best friend!

Play addictively cute mini-games and collect coins to get cool items for Angela. You’ll just LOVE her wardrobe. That’s where you can DRESS HER UP IN THE LATEST FASHIONS, and then CHOOSE THE PERFECT PAIR OF SHOES to match her outfit. Her shoe collection is incredible! 👠👡👟

Know what else she loves? Makeup! 💄 You can GIVE HER A MAKEOVER whenever you want and make her feel super special. Just pick a lip balm, maybe give her a hint of eye shadow, some mascara, and voila! How cool is that?

Remember to collect coins! You can use them to MAKE ANGELA’S HOME CHIC AND COZY. You can also FEED HER HEALTHY AND DELICIOUS TREATS. 🍹🍉🍓 With your help, Angela can have a fabulous life!❤️

There are all-new cool features to enjoy in My Talking Angela’s latest update as well, including NEW REWARDS, STICKER SWAPS, GIFTS, EASTER DISCOUNTS, AND MORE! And don’t forget to add some seasonal sparkle to her life with the gorgeous Magic Sparkle Outfit. 👗 Make Angela your very own superstar!

Adopt Angela as your very own virtual pet and give her a fabulous life! Help her grow into a stylish city kitty. From teeth brushing to clothes shopping – she’s all yours!

Make Angela your very own superstar! Nurture her, sing to her, and feed her delicious treats. Just watch – she’ll become your new best friend!

Let your stunning sense of style shine and give Angela a makeover! Lipstick, eyeshadow, blush - you can customize her look to your heart's content! There are dozens of different colors to choose from so you can really express yourself!

You’re fabulous, so make Angela fabulous too! Dress her in the latest fashions and the cutest costumes, from beautiful ballerina outfits to punk ninja clothes! Complete the look by giving her the perfect hairstyle too! With over a million different fashion combinations, you can make her look however you want!

COLLECT STICKERS
As you help Angela grow and progress through the levels, you will collect super cool stickers that you can stick in your album and even swap with your friends. It’s loads of fun!

AND MUCH MUCH MORE...

comments: Addicting but not worth it. Everywhere in the game there are a bunch of Russian POS hackers. You can have a fully upgraded Battleship and a little tiny Destroyer or frigate will come along and one shot it with a main cannon from half the map away. This should not be possible. I tried using fully upgraded versions of Destroyers and frigates and I couldn't even scratch a normal battleship. As long as the Russian POS hackers aren't playing this game it's not worth it.

Amazing game if you like naval warships. UPDATE: As of Feb 17 2018, the new update has seriously increased the game content and fun level. UPDATE as of Feb 27 2018, Lowered my rating to 4 stars because there is a constant issue with the timers or something like that.  I login and collect the crate and start a module upgrading then login several hours late and is like no time elapsed in the game from the last time I logged in. This has happened several times in the past as well.

Best battleship game on Android hands down ! Better than wargaming ship game great controls great graphics !Fun to play good selection of warships and large maps and they keep on doing updates to keep it interesting! And the most important thing is the price of ships are fair keep up the great work . I love the last update with graphics and maps and ships. the only thing the Bismarck is under powered can you make her stronger because she was the pride of Germany and everybody complains she is not a good ship.She is a powerhouse thank you!

Definitely a good game and worth your time and money. Only issue that developers really need to attend to is how they select the team. You can't have 7 ships of high ranks against 5 or 4 ships of low rank. It makes a person want to delete the game even after spending money on it. Keep same ranked players together in a battle. Really irritating.

Fact need a good connection to keep control of your ships Now, I have plenty of $$$ nothing to spend on it. Waiting to get the last max destroyer ship i can get on the random container spin.  Also noted... I open up the app the next day and the container count down says 2+ hours. It should read 0 zero I would think.

This game is unbelievable! I wish that I knew about it a lot sooner. I love how the game was made for online use, but the offline bots you get to play without internet are just like real people! A good tip for new users though, you should turn off your WiFi to play with the bots. You'll fair better then. Also, I wanted to ask how we could change our nicknames? I'm just itching to do it!
description: Battle of Warships is one of the legendary mobile game about battleship and naval warfare. Navigate your unique ships that used in the WW1 and WW2. Improve on your own ship, increase health points, engine speed and turns. Customize navy army with the flag of your country. Get daily rewards, level up your skills and ship's characteristics. Become the God of War and war thunder with warship craft, battle with enemy for war and order. Try to blitz with artillery enemy‚Äôs airplane and jet wings. FEATURES:‚ú´ More than 20 unique battleships including the most legendary ones of the World War 1 and World War 2!YAMATO, Missouri, Bismarck, South Dakota and even Aircraft carrier (it includes air planes and jet)! Choose your destiny! Be commando of all of them in our ship games!‚ú´ A unique  update system for each ship of yoursHuge numbers of different weapons for improving your ship such as torpedoes, interceptors, missiles and so on for your battleship craft!‚ú´ Latest 3D graphics, corresponding to all the characteristics of the best mobile game!Super realistic boat gunship battle graphics, exquisitely crafted with attention to the smallest details for wwi and ww2 games genre.‚ú´ Touch control & several versions, including the gyroscope!Totally easy and intuitive control, just put weapons on enemy and push SHOT! Art of game that‚Äôs all you need to win in WW army games. Victory day not far off! ‚ú´ Weather change system  on the game maps! Fight day & night! Rain, sun, sunset and even snow. What kind of weather do you prefer in military games?‚ú´ Massive world  battlefield areaMountains and glaciers will be your companions in this navy games fleet! BoW is war games genre multiplayer games ocean wars simulator. Our war games is totally FREE for download.
descriptionHTML:
Battle of Warships is one of the legendary mobile game about battleship and naval warfare. Navigate your unique ships that used in the WW1 and WW2. Improve on your own ship, increase health points, engine speed and turns. Customize navy army with the flag of your country. Get daily rewards, level up your skills and ship's characteristics. Become the God of War and war thunder with warship craft, battle with enemy for war and order. Try to blitz with artillery enemy’s airplane and jet wings.

FEATURES:

✫ More than 20 unique battleships including the most legendary ones of the World War 1 and World War 2!
YAMATO, Missouri, Bismarck, South Dakota and even Aircraft carrier (it includes air planes and jet)! Choose your destiny! Be commando of all of them in our ship games!

✫ A unique update system for each ship of yours
Huge numbers of different weapons for improving your ship such as torpedoes, interceptors, missiles and so on for your battleship craft!

✫ Latest 3D graphics, corresponding to all the characteristics of the best mobile game!
Super realistic boat gunship battle graphics, exquisitely crafted with attention to the smallest details for wwi and ww2 games genre.

✫ Touch control & several versions, including the gyroscope!
Totally easy and intuitive control, just put weapons on enemy and push SHOT! Art of game that’s all you need to win in WW army games. Victory day not far off!

✫ Weather change system on the game maps! Fight day & night!
Rain, sun, sunset and even snow. What kind of weather do you prefer in military games?

✫ Massive world battlefield area
Mountains and glaciers will be your companions in this navy games fleet!

BoW is war games genre multiplayer games ocean wars simulator. Our war games is totally FREE for download.
